story:
El proyecto

Mi nombre es Blanca y quiero presentaros el proyecto que Andrés y yo iniciamos hace varios meses. Ambos queríamos encontrar un lugar hermoso para vivir, rodeados de naturaleza y tranquilidad, algo difícil de encontrar hoy en día. Queríamos crear un espacio no sólo para nosotros sino para cualquier persona que amara la naturaleza y que deseara inmersarse en ella, aprendiendo además cómo cuidar el medioambiente. Hace varios meses encontramos este terreno precioso, en un pueblito que es casi de cuento. Trabajamos mucho cada día para que este sea un lugar mágico. Ya hay varias personas por la región con proyectos de ecotecnias y nosotros queremos sumarnos a ellos, pero logrando llamar la atención de viajeros del mundo para que conozcan estos lugares. Nuestro trabajo es entonces construir unas cabañas y desde el ecoturismo generar conciencia medioambiental. Estamos a pocos pasos de hacerlo posible, ¡ayúdanos a lograrlo!

¿Dónde invertiremos el dinero?

El dinero se invertirá en terminar el baño de la cabaña de bambú, en hacer una cocina exterior y en el material para una cabaña más. Si no puedes ayudarnos económicamente, ¡ayúdanos a que corra la voz!

El proyecto
Mi nombre es Blanca y quiero presentaros el proyecto que Andrés y yo iniciamos hace varios meses. Ambos queríamos encontrar un lugar hermoso para vivir, rodeados de naturaleza y tranquilidad, algo difícil de encontrar hoy en día. Queríamos crear un espacio no sólo para nosotros sino para cualquier persona que amara la naturaleza y que deseara inmersarse en ella, aprendiendo además cómo cuidar el medioambiente. Hace varios meses encontramos este terreno precioso, en un pueblito que es casi de cuento. Trabajamos mucho cada día para que este sea un lugar mágico. Ya hay varias personas por la región con proyectos de ecotecnias y nosotros queremos sumarnos a ellos, pero logrando llamar la atención de viajeros del mundo para que conozcan estos lugares. Nuestro trabajo es entonces construir unas cabañas y desde el ecoturismo generar conciencia medioambiental. Estamos a pocos pasos de hacerlo posible, ¡ayúdanos a lograrlo!

¿Dónde invertiremos el dinero?
El dinero se invertirá en terminar el baño de la cabaña de bambú, en hacer una cocina exterior y en el material para una cabaña más. Si no puedes ayudarnos económicamente, ¡ayúdanos a que corra la voz!

story:
FIRST SOME SMALL TALK & LEADING IT IN

I was just procrastinating around on one Sunday evening, playing Gin Rummy on my Xperia and listening to Daft Punk. Then I thought of something.

What if I started a series of travel books... I'm a young Estonian writer - I published my first book in November 2012 about a lonely france-obsessed croissant, who, bullied by an army of pastry products, goes on an epic quest to demolish the borders between sweet and salty, accompanied by his creator Ulvi the Baker.

Travel books are a genre usually dominated by guidance - what places to see, what activities to do or what places someone saw and activities they accomplished. Therefore I decided to approach the matter a little differently. If You happen to be a Seinfeld fan then You know how Kramer had the idea to create a "Coffee table book about coffee tables". I can't say my idea is as ingenious but I'm gonna try to approach travelling from a more specific/material angle because when travelling, most people first see ’The Famous Church’, I first see the small kiosk beside ’The Famous Church’. I bet I’m not the only one.


IT'S ALL GOODS IN HONG KONG! - No. 1 travel book for stuff hungry tourists.

Too much talk is too much talk. What I decided to go after is this - IT'S ALL GOODS! - a possible series of travel books that focuses on the goods, the products, the stuff of one specific location.

The products that end up in this book must possess at least 1 of 2 factors - WOW or WTF. WOW-factor means that it looks cool or even astonishing - package design is uniquely eye-catching or the product itself stands out by its shape/size/texture etc. WTF-factor means that it delivers the surprise by weirdness - I'm sure You've heard of horse-flavoured ice-cream or Lay's chips that taste like chicken and Pepsi - these examples would qualify.


WHY START OFF WITH HONG KONG?

Because its tagline is "Asia's World City". Because the vast array of funky goods won't leave anyone empty-handed. Because it contains a blend of both asia and europe. Because I find it to be the best place to start this series (if it will become that).


DEFINING THE GOODS

Firstly – these goods do not have to be made in Hong Kong to end up between the covers of this book – they can be weird delicacies from Vietnam or extreme coolness from Antarctica – what matters is that one can get these items while shopping in Hong Kong. Finding a hugely versatile selection of all types of products from all over the globe is what makes up the essence of shopping, in this particular case, of shopping and discovering the goodies’ side of Hong Kong.

Secondly – the goods will be eatable/drinkable/usable, if one can perform any on these mentioned activities with it then it is sure to be a valued candidate. To clarify ’usable’ -  if I happen to find pogo sticks with wheels or a laundry detergent called ’Soap What?!’ then I see no reason why not to include them in the book.


INSIDE THE BOOK

So, the book itself will contain a lot of pictures but that's not all. I will definitely feel the need to accompany the whole adventure with a side of humorous shenanigans in the form of short description texts, purchasing locations, personal ratings etc. It'll be funny (but helpful), I can promise You that in a heartbeat. Here, some samples:

Some more 1st phase details:

- The book is going to be square-shaped. Think of a CD case, pretty much in the lines of that.
- Colourful full-page photo on every/every other page, superb quality.

- Hard-cover, pages printed on high quality paper.

- Initial plan is to include a 100 different goods, maybe more. 

- May add QR-codes to accompany each product, making them easier to locate.


ONCE AGAIN – WHAT IS IT & WHO NEEDS IT

All in all - this symbiosis of a travel&shopping guide/travel log/product design selection/humour book would make a perfect gift for anyone who is even slightly interested in what people of all sorts eat/drink/use i.e. everyone. Many people don't even notice the massive range of stuff surrounding us and stick with their everyday routine, while not even realizing the cute/weird/normal consuming habits of people around the globe.

STOP, NUMBER TIME!

Our funding goal of 6500 € should cover the book design, layout, photographing and printing phase plus some of the travel expenses, purchases during a period of 2-3 months.

The book will be put together during spring-summer 2014 and ideally printed in early fall. Our main goal is to get all done in October and shipped in time for Christmas 2014 (hopefully at least 2 weeks before christmas, so You can give them as gifts).


WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE

Check out the perks first, ones that include the finished book start from 22 €!

If you really can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please share this campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter or send to your email contacts who you think might be interested in this project.

The Indiegogo share tools on this site can help get the word out!


COMPLETED!

Cheers and thank you for reading.

Yours truly,
Marko Mörö Matvei.

story:
Our campaign has wrapped up.

Order your Kuna now at
store.getkuna.com

Thanks to everyone who contributed!

Kuna is a smart Wi-Fi camera with intercom, built into an outdoor light. It detects people coming to your home and lets you see and speak to them using your smartphone, from anywhere.


In addition to the camera and intercom, Kuna can act as an alarm siren and is a full-featured smart light. The Kuna app gives you full access to all of Kuna's features, whether you're at home, at work, or on the beach.   



“...a futuristic approach to security and break-in prevention.” -Brit + Co.


“The first step to protecting yourself and your home... is simply to make it appear that you're not an easy target. That's the idea behind Kuna.” -Popular Mechanics


“An affordable and aesthetic smart home product... you don't have to be an AV pro to install this” -Good Housekeeping


“...multiple features coming together... made smartphones so useful, and now the same thing is happening in home security cameras.” -The Verge



Burglars are looking for easy targets, which means empty homes or someone alone at home. They move through a neighborhood knocking at doors and seeing who answers. If no one answers, that's when they decided to break in. With Kuna, you can speak to a potential burglar and let them know that someone sees them. They will move on to an easier target, one where no one knows they're there.  



Kuna lets you answer your door with your phone, from anywhere, at any time. Speaking to potential burglars will deter them, but you never want to make yourself vulnerable by opening the door to a stranger. Now you'll never have to. And you can answer the door for your kids when they're at home and you're not, or for your elderly parents at their house. Or even if you're just feeling too lazy to get off the couch.

Kuna combines sophisticated computer vision with IR motion sensing to filter out false alarms like swaying trees, small animals, and passing clouds. You'll also be able to give feedback, and Kuna will use this to learn over time to improve detection accuracy.


Kuna is a drop-in replacement for your existing light fixture. You use your existing wiring and wall mounting, and connect Kuna to Wi-Fi with your phone. No drilling, no running wires, no hassle.

 

Kuna is more than a security system, it's a smart light too. You can control the light from your phone, set a schedule, or use the dusk-to-dawn or motion-activated modes.


Great design brings everything together in harmony, whether it's components within a product or a product within its surroundings. Your home is the most important place in your life, and lights are part of the face it presents to the world. 


We worked with an award-winning industrial designer to create different styles of Kuna with the same amazing functionality, so it complements the look of your home. Whether your style is mission or modern, colonial or craftsman, Kuna will be there for you.

Check out the Style and Color Upgrades section for more details on how to choose a particular style or color of Kuna.


One of the most popular requests we’ve heard is for a version of Kuna without the camera so that you can have pairs of matching lights at the door or around the house.

So we are pleased to announce that we will be producing a small batch of Kuna Companion lights! The Kuna companion matches Kuna visually, and connects wirelessly to Kuna so both lights will turn on and off in sync.  

Due to production constraints we’re only able to offer the Companion in very limited quantities right now, and only in the Craftsman model. The Kuna Companion Light requires pairing with a full Kuna light and will not function on its own. You can either add a Companion to your existing contribution for $79, or get a package with both for $228. Don’t wait, they’re going to go fast!




Here's a quick guide to the perks you'll be able to select from when you support our campaign. You can select the package you'd like from the list at the top right. Be sure to take advantage of the discounts available if you get more than one!

Note: If you'd like to get more than 2 units, you will need to first choose a 2-unit package, then return and make another pledge for more units.

The Traditional and Contemporary styles and bronze color are available as upgrade perks. If you'd like either of these styles, just choose a Craftsman perk package, then contribute again to select the appropriate upgrade. The bronze color is available for Craftsman and Traditional styles only. Each upgrade covers your entire order, so if you're getting more than one Kuna you only have to choose one upgrade package. You can change your mind at any time before the campaign ends!

  

Using Kuna to prevent break-ins is free and always will be. The Kuna app and main functions are absolutely free, and you can use as many phones as you like to receive alerts, see live video, and talk. 

After Kuna ships, we will introduce (completely optional) service plans including options for recording video to the cloud. They will be contract-free, voluntary, and you won't need to sign up for them to use the app or to use Kuna.


We've worked hard to make Kuna a reality, and we're close! We are already most of the way through the production process with our manufacturer, with hardware design finalized and most tests completed, including environmental tests.  


We want to bring preventive home security to the world, and we need your help to spread the word. By joining us, you not only become the first to get Kuna, you become part of a community of users, helping us shape the future of home security!    


We're a team of entrepreneurs and engineers, designers and dreamers, creators and craftsmen. Our partners include manufacturers that turn out millions of units of products every year, and the world's best video semiconductor company. We have a tremendous amount of experience building hardware and software, and we've all had our share of poor experiences with existing security systems. Now we're setting out to re-invent the home security system.
Sai-Wai Fu, Co-Founder & CEO
Digital video pioneer and entrepreneur. Led an Emmy award-winning team that enabled live digital TV broadcasting, and founded the consumer video startup YesVideo, which now has over 30,000 retail outlets.
Dr. Haomiao Huang, Co-Founder & CTO
Expert in robotics and intelligent systems. Conducted pioneering research in quadrotor drones at Stanford while getting his PhD in Aeronautics & Astronautics. Has built everything from drone autopilots and missile guidance systems to mobile apps.
Chris Hiszpanski, Embedded Systems
Systems hacker. Worked on Mars rover prototypes at JPL in high school. After graduating from Caltech, built sophisticated computer vision and image processing systems for the Department of Defense.
Tasos Ioannidis, Cloud Backend
Web backend guru. Administered website infrastructure for Greek Parliament, and has created numerous websites and web apps, including a highly popular geo-informational service site in Greece.
Anton Maslov, Mobile
Mobile and imaging expert. Founded early competitor to Adobe Photoshop, developed many mobile applications.
Hal Sampson, Hardware & Systems
Hacker extraordinaire. Has built everything from video-conferencing tools and video compression codecs to med-tech sensor systems.


We're hiring! We're actively looking for people to join us in creating Kuna and bringing it to the world. Drop us a line at jobs@getkuna.com and tell us why you want to work with us.

GENERAL QUESTIONS (preventing break-ins, our name)

PURCHASING & SHIPPING (styles, shipping, payment)

FEATURES (detection, specs, weather)

INSTALLATION & SETUP (power, Wi-Fi, lighting)

USING KUNA (apps, alerts, functionality)

PRIVACY (securing video)


GENERAL

How does Kuna prevent break-ins?

Most burglars are looking for easy targets, meaning empty homes or a vulnerable person alone at home. They find these targets by knocking at the door and seeing who answers.  Kuna lets you speak to a potential burglar from anywhere, without making yourself vulnerable. If you answer the door using Kuna, a burglar knows someone can see them and knows they’re there, and they will move on to an easier target.

What’s the difference between Kuna and other Wi-Fi cameras?

The biggest difference is that we’ve designed Kuna from the outset to be an outdoor, preventive security solution. Other cameras are designed primarily to capture a recording of a break-in as it happens. Kuna is designed to give you the ability to take action before that happens, whether that’s using Kuna’s 2-way audio, the alarm, or simply calling the police. We’ve optimized Kuna’s intelligence specifically to reduce false alarms in outdoor scenes. And by building Kuna into an easy-to-install outdoor light fixture so you don’t have to drill mountings or run wires, we’ve also made Kuna the easiest outdoor camera system to install.

Is Kuna still useful when I’m home?

Absolutely! Most burglaries occur when there’s no one at home, but the 30% that happen when someone IS home are the most dangerous. Kuna lets you answer the door without opening the door and exposing yourself or revealing where you are. If you don’t feel comfortable speaking, you can have a friend or family member respond for you, or just play a pre-recorded message. In addition, our testers have found that Kuna is also great for alerting them to visitors when they can’t hear their doorbell, or when a delivery person drops off a package without ringing the doorbell at all.

Does Kuna replace my existing security system?

It’s up to you! Kuna is complementary to existing security systems, because it is a preventive solution that protects the entries of your home from the outside. If you’re not able to respond to the alerts that Kuna sends, these other systems can still be useful for giving a notification after a break-in happens.

How many Kunas should I get for my home?

Again, this is up to you! Our recommendation is to have at least two: one for the front door and one for the back door. This protects the two most important entrances to your home. Most burglars check at the front door before going to the back door. So if you get an alert at the front door, then a few minutes later get an alert at the back door, you know this is a serious situation you should respond to. In addition, many of our testers also want to have Kuna at their garage doors to keep an eye on their cars.

Where can I learn more about burglars and break-in prevention?

There are many great resources on this. We’ll be gathering them and posting updates on our Facebook page and on Twitter, so follow us!  

Why did you choose the name Kuna?

Doesn't it just sound cool? Plus Kuna Peak is one of the highest peaks in Yosemite National Park, and we love that nice clean mountain air.  


PURCHASING & SHIPPING

How do I change my order/upgrade my perk/update my shipping address?

Just drop us a line at support@getkuna.com and we'll get back to you ASAP!

How do I order a particular style of Kuna?

The other style and color options are available as upgrade options after choosing a perk package. Simply choose one of the packages for the Black Craftsman style, and make your contribution. Then come back and select the upgrade perk of your choice.

How do I order more than 2 Kuna units?

If you're so excited about Kuna that you want more than 2 units, that's possible too! Simply select one of the double packages and make your contribution. Then come back and select another package to get more!

Is there a paid subscription?

Person detection and live video/audio are absolutely free and included with the Kuna unit. Additional features like cloud recording will require a small monthly service cost, but these are optional. You will always be able to use Kuna without paying a monthly fee.

Does Kuna work outside the US/Canada?

Unfortunately, right now we only support 110V power and shipping to US/Canada. For later versions we will definitely support international voltage and shipping. Make sure you sign up for our newsletter to keep updated.

Is shipping included?

Yes! The pledge price for each perk includes shipping.

Is there a warranty?

Every Kuna unit will come with at least a 1-year limited warranty. 

I’m a contractor/installer/builder. I’m interesting in re-selling Kuna. How do I get in touch?

Drop us a line at contact@getkuna.com


FEATURES

Does Kuna pan, tilt, or zoom?

You can adjust Kuna’s camera angle manually, up to 40 degrees left, right, and down. With the wide-angle, 116 degree lens, you can get all the coverage you’ll need to cover any door. Once it is set, you can lock the lens position with the locking ring. The Kuna app allows for up to 2x digital zoom so that you can see anything suspicious in greater detail.

Does Kuna have night vision?

Instead of traditional infrared light, Kuna’s light can be set to turn on when motion is detected, so there is always sufficient light to view and record any events of interest.

Is Kuna weatherproof?

Yes! We’ve designed Kuna to work in outdoor conditions with high temperatures, including direct sunlight, and be weather resistant. In fact, we’ve just passed our IP44 weather-proofing test.

Can I unlock my door with Kuna?

Not yet, but in the future we hope to enable Kuna to work with popular electronic door locks like Lockitron and other smart home appliances.

Will Kuna have an open API?

Great question! Right now our first goal is to make sure that Kuna delivers on the promise of being the first and best break-in prevention product. Once we are sure we’ve delivered on the basic functionality, we will work on releasing our API so other devices and services will work with us.


INSTALLATION & SETUP

How do I install Kuna?

Kuna installs just like any other light fixture. Just take down your old fixture and wire Kuna up to your existing power wires, then mount Kuna to your existing junction box.

How do I connect Kuna to the internet?

Just use your phone! The Kuna app will connect to Kuna via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), and display a list of Wi-Fi routers that Kuna sees. Then you simply select your router and provide the password, and Kuna will take care of the rest.

How is Kuna powered? What happens if power or Wi-Fi goes out?

Kuna draws power continuously from the wall power, so that we can provide high quality video and detection. If your power or Wi-Fi go out, Kuna’s cloud servers will detect that Kuna is no longer connected and send you an alert on your phone. Once power or Wi-Fi come back, Kuna will re-connect automatically and start working again.

Do I have to leave my light switch on?

Yes. Kuna uses the wall power continuously, so you will have to leave the light switch on. If you’re worried about your switch, we can recommend some light-switch guards from Amazon that will help you keep your switch from getting accidentally turned off. Check us out on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for more useful tidbits of advice.

What if I have 2 or more light fixtures on the same switch?

We recommend that if you have two or more fixtures on the same switch, you should simply get more Kunas (hey, there’s a discount)! You can adjust the cameras so that they point at different angles, for example having one Kuna looking at the door and another looking out toward the street.

How do I know if the Wi-Fi signal at my door is strong enough?

The best way to check is to use your cell phone. Connect your phone to your Wi-Fi network, then put it where you’d install Kuna and see if you get 2 bars of Wi-Fi signal or more. If it is too weak, we recommend you move your router closer or invest in a Wi-Fi range extender or new router. Check in with the Kuna Facebook page to see our recommendations for routers and range extenders that work well with Kuna!

How many Kuna fixtures can I install at my home?

There’s no limit! Install as many Kuna units as you like, and you can see and connect to each of them from your phone.


USING KUNA

How do I access Kuna’s features?

You access Kuna’s live video and audio using the Kuna app on your smartphone. After Kuna is released we will also develop the ability to use Kuna via a web browser, but we will focus on the phone first.

Will I be able to access Kuna from different phones?

Absolutely! You can log in to Kuna from any phone you like, as long as you have the Kuna app downloaded. Just log in to your account and you will receive alerts and be able to connect to Kuna.

What phones or devices are supported for connecting to Kuna?

Kuna supports all iOS devices running iOS 7 and above (iPhone 4S and above, iPad 2 and above). Kuna will also support Android devices supporting Bluetooth LE and Android 4.4 and above (Kit Kat).

What is Kuna’s range of detection?

This depends on the exact location and environment where Kuna installed, but Kuna is designed to detect anyone coming within about 3 meters (10 feet) to catch anyone coming to an entry.

How does Kuna learn to improve its detection accuracy?

You will be able to give feedback to Kuna regarding its alerts. If Kuna gets a particular detection wrong, you’ll be able to give the correct label. We will anonymously incorporate this input into Kuna’s machine learning algorithms so that it will perform better in the future.

How can I control what alerts I get?

Kuna’s alerts are fully customizable. In addition to being able to turn the alerts on and off and temporarily disabling alerts for a set period of time, you’ll be able to select specific alerts to receive. To start, Kuna will be able to distinguish between persons arriving at the door and immediately entering the house, persons departing the house, and persons arriving and waiting at the door. You’ll be able to customize your alerts to receive any or all of these alerts.


PRIVACY

Is my video secure?

Absolutely. Kuna uses the same SSL and AES encryption to secure its connections as used by banks and credit-card processing companies.

Kuna lets you answer your door with your phone, from anywhere, at any time. Speaking to potential burglars will deter them, but you never want to make yourself vulnerable by opening the door to a stranger. Now you'll never have to. And you can answer the door for your kids when they're at home and you're not, or for your elderly parents at their house. Or even if you're just feeling too lazy to get off the couch.







Kuna combines sophisticated computer vision with IR motion sensing to filter out false alarms like swaying trees, small animals, and passing clouds. You'll also be able to give feedback, and Kuna will use this to learn over time to improve detection accuracy.






Kuna is a drop-in replacement for your existing light fixture. You use your existing wiring and wall mounting, and connect Kuna to Wi-Fi with your phone. No drilling, no running wires, no hassle.
 






Kuna is more than a security system, it's a smart light too. You can control the light from your phone, set a schedule, or use the dusk-to-dawn or motion-activated modes.






Great design brings everything together in harmony, whether it's components within a product or a product within its surroundings. Your home is the most important place in your life, and lights are part of the face it presents to the world. 
We worked with an award-winning industrial designer to create different styles of Kuna with the same amazing functionality, so it complements the look of your home. Whether your style is mission or modern, colonial or craftsman, Kuna will be there for you.





Check out the Style and Color Upgrades section for more details on how to choose a particular style or color of Kuna.





One of the most popular requests we’ve heard is for a version of Kuna without the camera so that you can have pairs of matching lights at the door or around the house.
So we are pleased to announce that we will be producing a small batch of Kuna Companion lights! The Kuna companion matches Kuna visually, and connects wirelessly to Kuna so both lights will turn on and off in sync.  Due to production constraints we’re only able to offer the Companion in very limited quantities right now, and only in the Craftsman model. The Kuna Companion Light requires pairing with a full Kuna light and will not function on its own. You can either add a Companion to your existing contribution for $79, or get a package with both for $228. Don’t wait, they’re going to go fast!





















Here's a quick guide to the perks you'll be able to select from when you support our campaign. You can select the package you'd like from the list at the top right. Be sure to take advantage of the discounts available if you get more than one!
Note: If you'd like to get more than 2 units, you will need to first choose a 2-unit package, then return and make another pledge for more units.








The Traditional and Contemporary styles and bronze color are available as upgrade perks. If you'd like either of these styles, just choose a Craftsman perk package, then contribute again to select the appropriate upgrade. The bronze color is available for Craftsman and Traditional styles only. Each upgrade covers your entire order, so if you're getting more than one Kuna you only have to choose one upgrade package. You can change your mind at any time before the campaign ends!




  

Using Kuna to prevent break-ins is free and always will be. The Kuna app and main functions are absolutely free, and you can use as many phones as you like to receive alerts, see live video, and talk. 
After Kuna ships, we will introduce (completely optional) service plans including options for recording video to the cloud. They will be contract-free, voluntary, and you won't need to sign up for them to use the app or to use Kuna.





We've worked hard to make Kuna a reality, and we're close! We are already most of the way through the production process with our manufacturer, with hardware design finalized and most tests completed, including environmental tests.  





We want to bring preventive home security to the world, and we need your help to spread the word. By joining us, you not only become the first to get Kuna, you become part of a community of users, helping us shape the future of home security!    
We're a team of entrepreneurs and engineers, designers and dreamers, creators and craftsmen. Our partners include manufacturers that turn out millions of units of products every year, and the world's best video semiconductor company. We have a tremendous amount of experience building hardware and software, and we've all had our share of poor experiences with existing security systems. Now we're setting out to re-invent the home security system.




Sai-Wai Fu, Co-Founder & CEODigital video pioneer and entrepreneur. Led an Emmy award-winning team that enabled live digital TV broadcasting, and founded the consumer video startup YesVideo, which now has over 30,000 retail outlets.




Dr. Haomiao Huang, Co-Founder & CTOExpert in robotics and intelligent systems. Conducted pioneering research in quadrotor drones at Stanford while getting his PhD in Aeronautics & Astronautics. Has built everything from drone autopilots and missile guidance systems to mobile apps.




Chris Hiszpanski, Embedded SystemsSystems hacker. Worked on Mars rover prototypes at JPL in high school. After graduating from Caltech, built sophisticated computer vision and image processing systems for the Department of Defense.




Tasos Ioannidis, Cloud BackendWeb backend guru. Administered website infrastructure for Greek Parliament, and has created numerous websites and web apps, including a highly popular geo-informational service site in Greece.




Anton Maslov, MobileMobile and imaging expert. Founded early competitor to Adobe Photoshop, developed many mobile applications.




Hal Sampson, Hardware & SystemsHacker extraordinaire. Has built everything from video-conferencing tools and video compression codecs to med-tech sensor systems.




We're hiring! We're actively looking for people to join us in creating Kuna and bringing it to the world. Drop us a line at  jobs@getkuna.com and tell us why you want to work with us.









GENERAL QUESTIONS (preventing break-ins, our name)

PURCHASING & SHIPPING (styles, shipping, payment)

FEATURES (detection, specs, weather)

INSTALLATION & SETUP (power, Wi-Fi, lighting)

USING KUNA (apps, alerts, functionality)

PRIVACY (securing video)





GENERAL
How does Kuna prevent break-ins?
Most burglars are looking for easy targets, meaning empty homes or a vulnerable person alone at home. They find these targets by knocking at the door and seeing who answers.  Kuna lets you speak to a potential burglar from anywhere, without making yourself vulnerable. If you answer the door using Kuna, a burglar knows someone can see them and knows they’re there, and they will move on to an easier target.
What’s the difference between Kuna and other Wi-Fi cameras?
The biggest difference is that we’ve designed Kuna from the outset to be an outdoor, preventive security solution. Other cameras are designed primarily to capture a recording of a break-in as it happens. Kuna is designed to give you the ability to take action before that happens, whether that’s using Kuna’s 2-way audio, the alarm, or simply calling the police. We’ve optimized Kuna’s intelligence specifically to reduce false alarms in outdoor scenes. And by building Kuna into an easy-to-install outdoor light fixture so you don’t have to drill mountings or run wires, we’ve also made Kuna the easiest outdoor camera system to install.
Is Kuna still useful when I’m home?
Absolutely! Most burglaries occur when there’s no one at home, but the 30% that happen when someone IS home are the most dangerous. Kuna lets you answer the door without opening the door and exposing yourself or revealing where you are. If you don’t feel comfortable speaking, you can have a friend or family member respond for you, or just play a pre-recorded message. In addition, our testers have found that Kuna is also great for alerting them to visitors when they can’t hear their doorbell, or when a delivery person drops off a package without ringing the doorbell at all.
Does Kuna replace my existing security system?
It’s up to you! Kuna is complementary to existing security systems, because it is a preventive solution that protects the entries of your home from the outside. If you’re not able to respond to the alerts that Kuna sends, these other systems can still be useful for giving a notification after a break-in happens.
How many Kunas should I get for my home?
Again, this is up to you! Our recommendation is to have at least two: one for the front door and one for the back door. This protects the two most important entrances to your home. Most burglars check at the front door before going to the back door. So if you get an alert at the front door, then a few minutes later get an alert at the back door, you know this is a serious situation you should respond to. In addition, many of our testers also want to have Kuna at their garage doors to keep an eye on their cars.
Where can I learn more about burglars and break-in prevention?
There are many great resources on this. We’ll be gathering them and posting updates on our Facebook page and on Twitter, so follow us!  
Why did you choose the name Kuna?



Doesn't it just sound cool? Plus Kuna Peak is one of the highest peaks in Yosemite National Park, and we love that nice clean mountain air.  
PURCHASING & SHIPPING
How do I change my order/upgrade my perk/update my shipping address?
Just drop us a line at support@getkuna.com and we'll get back to you ASAP!
How do I order a particular style of Kuna?
The other style and color options are available as upgrade options after choosing a perk package. Simply choose one of the packages for the Black Craftsman style, and make your contribution. Then come back and select the upgrade perk of your choice.
How do I order more than 2 Kuna units?
If you're so excited about Kuna that you want more than 2 units, that's possible too! Simply select one of the double packages and make your contribution. Then come back and select another package to get more!
Is there a paid subscription?
Person detection and live video/audio are absolutely free and included with the Kuna unit. Additional features like cloud recording will require a small monthly service cost, but these are optional. You will always be able to use Kuna without paying a monthly fee.
Does Kuna work outside the US/Canada?
Unfortunately, right now we only support 110V power and shipping to US/Canada. For later versions we will definitely support international voltage and shipping. Make sure you sign up for our newsletter to keep updated.
Is shipping included?
Yes! The pledge price for each perk includes shipping.
Is there a warranty?
Every Kuna unit will come with at least a 1-year limited warranty. 
I’m a contractor/installer/builder. I’m interesting in re-selling Kuna. How do I get in touch?
Drop us a line at contact@getkuna.com



FEATURES
Does Kuna pan, tilt, or zoom?
You can adjust Kuna’s camera angle manually, up to 40 degrees left, right, and down. With the wide-angle, 116 degree lens, you can get all the coverage you’ll need to cover any door. Once it is set, you can lock the lens position with the locking ring. The Kuna app allows for up to 2x digital zoom so that you can see anything suspicious in greater detail.
Does Kuna have night vision?
Instead of traditional infrared light, Kuna’s light can be set to turn on when motion is detected, so there is always sufficient light to view and record any events of interest.
Is Kuna weatherproof?
Yes! We’ve designed Kuna to work in outdoor conditions with high temperatures, including direct sunlight, and be weather resistant. In fact, we’ve just passed our IP44 weather-proofing test.
Can I unlock my door with Kuna?
Not yet, but in the future we hope to enable Kuna to work with popular electronic door locks like Lockitron and other smart home appliances.
Will Kuna have an open API?
Great question! Right now our first goal is to make sure that Kuna delivers on the promise of being the first and best break-in prevention product. Once we are sure we’ve delivered on the basic functionality, we will work on releasing our API so other devices and services will work with us.



INSTALLATION & SETUP
How do I install Kuna?
Kuna installs just like any other light fixture. Just take down your old fixture and wire Kuna up to your existing power wires, then mount Kuna to your existing junction box.
How do I connect Kuna to the internet?
Just use your phone! The Kuna app will connect to Kuna via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), and display a list of Wi-Fi routers that Kuna sees. Then you simply select your router and provide the password, and Kuna will take care of the rest.
How is Kuna powered? What happens if power or Wi-Fi goes out?
Kuna draws power continuously from the wall power, so that we can provide high quality video and detection. If your power or Wi-Fi go out, Kuna’s cloud servers will detect that Kuna is no longer connected and send you an alert on your phone. Once power or Wi-Fi come back, Kuna will re-connect automatically and start working again.
Do I have to leave my light switch on?
Yes. Kuna uses the wall power continuously, so you will have to leave the light switch on. If you’re worried about your switch, we can recommend some light-switch guards from Amazon that will help you keep your switch from getting accidentally turned off. Check us out on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for more useful tidbits of advice.
What if I have 2 or more light fixtures on the same switch?
We recommend that if you have two or more fixtures on the same switch, you should simply get more Kunas (hey, there’s a discount)! You can adjust the cameras so that they point at different angles, for example having one Kuna looking at the door and another looking out toward the street.
How do I know if the Wi-Fi signal at my door is strong enough?
The best way to check is to use your cell phone. Connect your phone to your Wi-Fi network, then put it where you’d install Kuna and see if you get 2 bars of Wi-Fi signal or more. If it is too weak, we recommend you move your router closer or invest in a Wi-Fi range extender or new router. Check in with the Kuna Facebook page to see our recommendations for routers and range extenders that work well with Kuna!
How many Kuna fixtures can I install at my home?
There’s no limit! Install as many Kuna units as you like, and you can see and connect to each of them from your phone.



USING KUNA
How do I access Kuna’s features?
You access Kuna’s live video and audio using the Kuna app on your smartphone. After Kuna is released we will also develop the ability to use Kuna via a web browser, but we will focus on the phone first.
Will I be able to access Kuna from different phones?
Absolutely! You can log in to Kuna from any phone you like, as long as you have the Kuna app downloaded. Just log in to your account and you will receive alerts and be able to connect to Kuna.
What phones or devices are supported for connecting to Kuna?
Kuna supports all iOS devices running iOS 7 and above (iPhone 4S and above, iPad 2 and above). Kuna will also support Android devices supporting Bluetooth LE and Android 4.4 and above (Kit Kat).
What is Kuna’s range of detection?
This depends on the exact location and environment where Kuna installed, but Kuna is designed to detect anyone coming within about 3 meters (10 feet) to catch anyone coming to an entry.
How does Kuna learn to improve its detection accuracy?
You will be able to give feedback to Kuna regarding its alerts. If Kuna gets a particular detection wrong, you’ll be able to give the correct label. We will anonymously incorporate this input into Kuna’s machine learning algorithms so that it will perform better in the future.
How can I control what alerts I get?
Kuna’s alerts are fully customizable. In addition to being able to turn the alerts on and off and temporarily disabling alerts for a set period of time, you’ll be able to select specific alerts to receive. To start, Kuna will be able to distinguish between persons arriving at the door and immediately entering the house, persons departing the house, and persons arriving and waiting at the door. You’ll be able to customize your alerts to receive any or all of these alerts.






PRIVACY
Is my video secure?
Absolutely. Kuna uses the same SSL and AES encryption to secure its connections as used by banks and credit-card processing companies.

story:
A photo paints a thousands words. 

My recent trip to the orphange had opened my eyes. It saddens me that are many who needs our help as they are being neglected by society. Most of them suffered from brain damage and are just waiting for their time to end.  What made this unlike any other orphanage was that the orphanage housed deformed children who have been abandoned by their parents, with no one to care for them. 

The orphanage was over-crowded and lacked government funding. Many of these orphans do not have long left to live, yet they lacked basic necessities such as a bed to sleep on. I would like to return to vietnam using donations obtained, to build a room as well as purchase several beds for this orphanage.
Please donate generously so that we can provide them with basic necessities like beds and medical supplies.

Any amount will be greatly appreciated. Kindly spread the words by sharing this post.

Address: Co So Tu Thien Xa Hoi Phat Giao Chua KY Quang II
DC: 154/4A Le Hoang Phai -P.17-Q.Go Vap
DT.0903.005.442

story:
Sample Untouched Photos:



Who am I?

My name is Stephen Chui.

One day, I needed to find myself. Instead of taking a walk in the park or looking around in the bookstore,  I borrowed my friends bicycle and went on a journey that had accumulated 10,000 miles.

This little adventure has gotten me featured in local newspapers, magazines and television. They learned of my journey and followed my adventure. It was then they dubbed me "Super Printer Man".

關於我

我是Stephen

所有故事發生在我大學三年級的暑假，進入社會工作前的最後階段。

那時候我強烈地討厭過著將來只有上班及下班的悶蛋生活。

畢業後前路茫茫，每一個人也帶著無數問號走向人生的另一個階段。

但我選擇了先尋找自己對生活的答案，當時我向朋友借了一輛單車，展開了一場長途旅行，我希望進入另一個陌生的世界，不受朋輩及群眾壓力去選擇自己想要的生活。嘗試去了解自己想要一個怎樣的未來，我想知道我自己到底想要甚麼？我心底裡到底在渴求著甚麼？

至今累積的行程已經超過10,000公里。

我的冒險旅程吸引到本地報章、雜誌及電視台的採訪。


HKEJ News acticle


Metro Newspaper aka the 'Super Printer Man' article.


Asia Travel Magazine.


Interview on television. TVB




Previous Routes: 


2011: 

May 2011 - Aug 2011 China: Chengdu → Tibet : Lhasa (National Road 318)  → Everest Base Camp  → Nepal : Kathmandu) 

2011年5月-8月    四川成都 → 西藏拉薩(川藏南線) → 珠峰大本營 → 尼泊爾 : 加德滿都

2013:

Apr 2013- July 2013 ( China: Shinjang Kashgar → Pakistan :Islamabad ( Karakoram Highway) → Tibet : Lhasa (National Road 219)

2013年4月-8月  新疆喀什  → 巴基斯坦 : 伊斯蘭堡  → 西藏 : 獅泉河 → 西藏 : 拉薩 (新藏線)


Next Route:
2015:
January 2015 - April 2015
I will fly to Istanbul and start my 3 month long journey from there. The final destination will be Bandaar Abbas in Iran. After that I will take a boat to Dubai and hopefully return to Hong Kong from there. 
土耳其 : 伊斯坦堡  → 格鲁吉亞 : 第比利斯  → 亞美尼亞 : 葉里溫   → 伊朗  → 杜拜


What I Need 

The brunt of the funding is going to go towards to a decent bicycle. The bicycle's I had used before were borrowed from friends and family. Though it was good enough, I didn't feel good when I returned it with dents, scuff's and tires repaired dozens of times. 

If I'm lucky and get enough funding, I will purchase one of the new affordable Go Pro's. As you can see from the video, I had something similar but it was not as high resolution as I hoped for. 

If I'm lucky and get more than asked for, it will go towards a bike helmet and a warmer coat. I used a very thin one and almost froze to death. 


我需要：

一輪新單車，過往旅行用的單車已經被使用得傷痕纍纍，雖然它還可以再使用一段日子，不過單車旅行的強度太大，我擔心它捱不過即將來臨的5000公里，所以一架新單車是最迫切需要的

如果可以籌得多一點的贊助，我會購買最新的Go pro 4戶外運動錄影機，拍攝更高質素的影片。質素會比現在我的那條宣傳片更加細緻，我肯定可以拍到更精彩的畫面。

假若在最幸運的情況下，贊助充裕，我會買一些更好的保護裝備，例如一個更好的頭盔及防水性能更好的外套，過往因為預算的問題，難以購買專業一點的裝備，結果在旅程裡，其中一場大風雪下，我差點冷死在山上。


    Risks & Challenges

    There were times when I was afraid for my life when in Pakistan or Afghanistan. As I went through towns, my passport had been confiscated many times and I had to wait while they checked me for any weapons. All the while throwing my tent and things around. At one point, they were so fed up with their soldiers stopping me every 2 minutes, they picked me up and drove me across the village towards my destination. 

    I would like to continue my tradition of riding a bicycle and hope to inspire a generation who aren't afraid to drop what they're doing and just do something meaningful. Find who that someone is inside your heart and never stop looking! 

    I hope to share my journey with you and others along the way. I wish that I can give hope to all those people who aren't brave enough to just pick up a bike and ride towards the sunset!

    Dare to Dream!

    Thank you!

    Stephen Chui


    驚險事件：

    當我身在巴基斯坦時，我曾為自己的人生安全感到擔心。因為巴基斯坦中部為部落間的武裝衝突地區，常有脅持外國人質事件發生。當我穿越這地區時，經常會被軍警截停，每幾分鐘就要停下來檢查，我的護照差點被他們翻破。有時候，太危險的路段，警察會不容許騎車穿越，會直接把我趕上警車帶走。

    而當時每晚住的酒店也是由警方安排，因為塔利班恐怖份子就隱藏在人群中，在酒店大堂會有一個持槍警員守在大堂，在酒店門外亦會有兩位警員把守。每一晚的氣氛都非常緊張，我不會知道是否能平安渡過。

    我會繼續我的單車旅行，希望我的旅程可以啟發其他人勇於去做自己想做的事，那怕要付出一些代價。

    每個人心裡都會有一粒關於夢想的種子，你總會有一件很想做但可能沒能力又或不敢做的事。我們都害怕去實行這件看似不能完成的事。

    其實有時候，不需要考慮太多，想做就要去做。因為人生只有一次，錯過了，便恨錯難返。世界上有很多偉大的事，都源於一個瘋狂的幻想。

    我希望透過分享我的故事，我的旅程。給予你實現夢想的勇氣，你永遠不知道自己的能力，直到自己受到考驗。

    敢於追夢

    多謝

    Stephen Chui

    Note: If you have any suggestions on improving my perks, please let me know at SuperPrinterMan@gmail.com! Thank you!

我需要：
一輪新單車，過往旅行用的單車已經被使用得傷痕纍纍，雖然它還可以再使用一段日子，不過單車旅行的強度太大，我擔心它捱不過即將來臨的5000公里，所以一架新單車是最迫切需要的
如果可以籌得多一點的贊助，我會購買最新的Go pro 4戶外運動錄影機，拍攝更高質素的影片。質素會比現在我的那條宣傳片更加細緻，我肯定可以拍到更精彩的畫面。
假若在最幸運的情況下，贊助充裕，我會買一些更好的保護裝備，例如一個更好的頭盔及防水性能更好的外套，過往因為預算的問題，難以購買專業一點的裝備，結果在旅程裡，其中一場大風雪下，我差點冷死在山上。

  Risks & Challenges There were times when I was afraid for my life when in Pakistan or Afghanistan. As I went through towns, my passport had been confiscated many times and I had to wait while they checked me for any weapons. All the while throwing my tent and things around. At one point, they were so fed up with their soldiers stopping me every 2 minutes, they picked me up and drove me across the village towards my destination. 
I would like to continue my tradition of riding a bicycle and hope to inspire a generation who aren't afraid to drop what they're doing and just do something meaningful. Find who that someone is inside your heart and never stop looking! 

I hope to share my journey with you and others along the way. I wish that I can give hope to all those people who aren't brave enough to just pick up a bike and ride towards the sunset!
Dare to Dream!
Thank you!
Stephen Chui


驚險事件：
當我身在巴基斯坦時，我曾為自己的人生安全感到擔心。因為巴基斯坦中部為部落間的武裝衝突地區，常有脅持外國人質事件發生。當我穿越這地區時，經常會被軍警截停，每幾分鐘就要停下來檢查，我的護照差點被他們翻破。有時候，太危險的路段，警察會不容許騎車穿越，會直接把我趕上警車帶走。
而當時每晚住的酒店也是由警方安排，因為塔利班恐怖份子就隱藏在人群中，在酒店大堂會有一個持槍警員守在大堂，在酒店門外亦會有兩位警員把守。每一晚的氣氛都非常緊張，我不會知道是否能平安渡過。
我會繼續我的單車旅行，希望我的旅程可以啟發其他人勇於去做自己想做的事，那怕要付出一些代價。
每個人心裡都會有一粒關於夢想的種子，你總會有一件很想做但可能沒能力又或不敢做的事。我們都害怕去實行這件看似不能完成的事。
其實有時候，不需要考慮太多，想做就要去做。因為人生只有一次，錯過了，便恨錯難返。世界上有很多偉大的事，都源於一個瘋狂的幻想。
我希望透過分享我的故事，我的旅程。給予你實現夢想的勇氣，你永遠不知道自己的能力，直到自己受到考驗。敢於追夢
多謝Stephen Chui
Note: If you have any suggestions on improving my perks, please let me know at SuperPrinterMan@gmail.com! Thank you!

story:
Traveling these days is as exciting as ever - but definitely more risky.  Theft can happen in an instant and before you know it you are spending your holiday sitting at an Embassy or police station.

I invented the Ultra-Light Travel Bra because I love to travel but I want to be able to travel without having to worry about some one stealing my money or valuables out of my bag.  Sometimes I want my passport close on my body rather than in my back pack where it can be easily lifted.  If you travel often, you will know that loss and theft are a big concern and worth taking steps to prevent.

The Travel Bra is a travel accessory that I thought would be so obvious but when I tried to buy one, I couldn't find one to buy!  So I invented it.  A Travel Bra is an essential on any woman's packing list.

My name is Annie Holden and I am an anthropologist.  I often travel solo, so keeping my valuables safe can be an issue - especially in places like Africa, Asia, Europe - well, pretty well every where!

I wanted a better solution than a passport pouch which is uncomfortable and obvious.

So I worked with a lingerie designer to come up with the most comfortable, full support bra possible (no underwire!) that could carry my valuables.  We've designed, patented and manufactured a gorgeous garment that is soft and beautiful to wear whether the pockets are in use or not.

Now the Ultra-Light Bra is made and available and I am offering Indigogo backers the chance to buy one or more of these beautiful bras at a discount.

Keep valuables safe and don't spoil a holiday with loss or theft.

story:
About

My name is Antoinette Brock and I'm a writer and photographer with a spirit of inquiry to the unexplored areas of life.  Through my travels I have learned that to understand the world we live in we must first understand the people within it.  Well over half of the world's population is marginalized or reduced to the perimeter of society as insignificant.  People everywhere want to be seen and seen honestly and fairly because invisibility is a living death.  With your contribution you will help tell stories of the marginalized peoples who of which have been pushed to the edge of society as unimportant. I invite you take this photo/video journey with me.  

This project will take place in Southeast Asia (Thailand, Laos, Cambodia and Vietnam) and will span 2 months.  During this time I will document the compelling stories of some of the marginalized communities in Southeast Asia.      

Don.t Throw Away the Crust is a brand dedicated to documenting the compelling stories of the marginalized peoples of the world through editorial, documentary photography and video.  I use the word "crust" to correlate with the marginalized peoples of the world as something in society that gets thrown away or forgotten about, when actually "It's the Best Part."  

Backstory: A trip to Brazil in a cultural exchange program in 2006 shifted my perspective on travel.  I would no longer be content with staying in all inclusive hotels or sticking to tourist attractions (or something along those lines).  I left with a slice of Brazil I may have never known, for it not my peculiar experience.  It was unlike the postcard images of beaches, bikinis and white sand that I read about or saw on TV.  It was aspects of the overarching culture deemed "taboo." However they were people like anyone else, with interesting perspectives on life, families, values and customs.  Their story alike so many others in the same economic position was pushed to the side as unimportant.  And theirs like so many others, was a story worth telling.         


What I Need & What You Get

  • Funding will go to transportation, traveling to and throughout SE Asia.  In addition to transportation costs, funding will cover the production and distribution of the zine and docu-series.  As well as editing costs for the docu-series to ensure the best quality footage.  Funding will also cover some lodging and photography/filming tools necessary to provide the best variety of images and footage.        
  • The Zine:  A self-published photo book unlike any you’ve ever seen.  A selection of photos chronicling the stories of the people and essentially the larger culture they are apart of.  In a nutshell, it’s a tangible piece of my journey I share with you.   
  • The Docu Series:  A series of documentary style short videos offering you an authentic glimpse into the cultures of some of the marginalized communities in the world.  You will hear stories and experience a way of life unlike your own, unlike anything portrayed on the media.  A deviation of the exploitation of marginalized peoples, commonplace in today’s media.  Don.t Throw Away the Crust’s intention is to highlight the beauty, strength and creativity behind such cultures because we believe It’s the Best Part.

Impact

You will invest in the idea that this world exists in a diverse way, and overcome the impulse to yield to the homogeneity which is deemed "acceptable culture" in society.  With your contribution you are saying that you believe in a world where the wisdom of all peoples can contribute to our collective well being. 

Challenges

A challenge when documenting the stories of marginalized peoples, is that it often times involves traveling to rural areas of a country which may fail to have sufficient if any internet connection, therefore affecting my ability to update the website.  I am committed to updating the blog at least once a week but in the event that I am unable due to location, I will add an extra special blog post the following week!   

    Spread the Word! 

    If you are not able to contribute financially please spread the word to those who may be interested in supporting this brand.  

    • Please spread the word to your friends, families, friends of family, co-workers, colleagues...EVERYONE.
    • Share it on Google+, Facebook, Instagram, Tweet it! 
    • You can use the Indiegogo share tools as well!

    “You are what your deep, driving desire is. As your desire is, so is your will. As your will is, so is your deed.” ― Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

story:
The world's most versatile and technologically advanced insect repellent. We’ve reinvented insect repellent by integrating it into the ultimate travel outfit. With a cooling fabric that is also anti-bacterial, the garments were designed to adapt to extreme environments with high insect density. No matter if you’re hiking in the woods, into the jungle or on a fishing trip. NoBu.gs keeps you protected. Using the latest in performance fabric technology and proprietary insect repellent treatment that is tightly bonded to the fabric, the NoBu.gs travel outfit will give you the ultimate freedom to move around in comfort while staying protected.

 

Want to see it in action?

 

 

 

 

 All of our NoBu.gs travel packs are sent with a light-weight and convenient, drawstring, travel bag.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 *all zippers on the NoBu.gs cargo pants will be black in the final product.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our secret ingredient is not so secret; our clothes are treated with a small percentage of Permethrin. The EPA requires extensive research to prove a product’s ability to repel insects, and Permethrin has been safely used around the world as a registered EPA product since 1977, with an outstanding safety record.

The proprietary Permethrin formula is tightly bonded to fabric fibers—resulting in effective, odorless insect protection that lasts the expected lifetime of the garment. 

NoBu.gs repellent clothing with Insect Shield has been proven and registered to repel mosquitos, ticks, ants, flies, chigger and midges (no-see-ums). The EPA requires extensive effectiveness research and data to prove a product’s ability to repel insects.  

 

 

NoBu.gs apparel remains effective against mosquitos and ticks at a stunning 93%. There is no need to retreat, or reapply treatment like most tech repellent finishes such as water resistant fabrics to ensure effectiveness. Unlike traditional insect repellents, our repellency is near your skin, instead of on it, which can help alleviate concerns about overuse or misuse of insect repellent. Being bite free is as easy as getting dressed! 

 

 

   

 

We all know biting insects could potentially carry diseases. Although we can not guarantee you will not contract any insect born disease while wearing our garments, we can officially say it gives up to 97% additional protection.

   

 Obviously we are not building NoBu.gs by ourselves. We have a great team of experts across the field that help us with everything from product design to logistics. 

 

 

                                                 

EXCHANGE POLICY:

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then our hoodies, pants and socks shall fit you just fine. If you wish to exchange any item for any reason, We will let you do this, but since we are offering our products at bottom pricing we will have to have you pay for two way shipping. We won’t be able to accept returns, but we are sure you will be very happy with our products! 

SHIPPING:

We offer worldwide shipping to our International Backers. Although many countries like the USA do not charge on international drop shipments, International shipments may be subject to import taxes, duties and customs fees, which are levied once your package reaches the country of destination, and are the responsibility of the recipient. We will do our best to minimize any of these charges.

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

The Travel Bag Buddy keeps all your important items secure and accessible. No need to bring extra accessories, waste time repacking or worry about misplacing anything.  

 

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

Zip zip, clip clip!! It's that easy to switch from a luggage accessory into a convenient crossbody/sling to carry your items!

 

 

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

 

 

 

 

 

 

KEEP FOR REWARDS

 

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

 

*Animated GIF...may take a moment to load.

 

 

 

The Travel Bag Buddy team is dedicated to creating functional products that enables you to travel easier with less hassle. We have an amazing team of talented designers, videographers, photographers, prototypers along with a dedicated support staff for our IP Legal needs, logistics and more. We are passionate about traveling, design and connecting with amazing people around the world through our products.

We are committed to listening to your feedback, providing the highest level of customer support and always putting the end user experience before anything else.

Building a for-profit company to us, means the ability to impact a greater change in the world. From going 100% carbon neutral and creating sustainable multi-use products, we pledge to do our part in making the world a better place for us all.

 

The Fine Print.

Product Warranty: We believe in the quality and durability of the Travel Bag Buddy. If the item has any manufacturer defects and can't be fixed we will replace the product with no questions asked.

Return Policy: You have 30 days to return your product, no risk, no questions asked. If you are not 100% satisfied simply mail it back to us and we will refund you. We made an awesome product you will love so don’t worry!

Shipping Policy: When the campaign ends, we will gather your shipping information. Once your order is ready to be fulfilled, we will send an email with your tracking information, so you know it's on the way. We take full responsibility for delivering your item to the address provided. If an issue arises and the delivery can't be completed due to a wrong address, moved without notification or you are not available, the package will then be sent back to our warehouse. In this instance, it is the buyer’s responsibility to pay the shipping costs for the redelivery.

Customs, VAT & Duties: All items have to be sold as regular purchases and can't be marked as gifts. The price does not include any customs, VAT, GST or other taxes applicable to your country. We plan to ship the Travel Bag Buddy® worldwide. For the EU we will be shipping directly from the EU so you do not have to pay customs charges.

Here is an easy to use calculator to review the estimated costs. https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator.

International buyers will receive an email or letter from the proper authorities once it arrives at customs. We wish there was a simpler way, but the law requires everything to go through customs. After the customs payment is made the order will be sent for final delivery.

story:
Production, production, production.

It has been a long road, but we are finally there. We thought we would share a few pics and a video to whet your appetite. We hope you are as excited to receive your nomadplug as we are to ship it to you.

 
We will update you on the finished textures and packaging soonest. We cannot wait to share.
In the mean time here are a few pics of the molds and production run...
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You have to agree: the world has never been as borderless, flight tickets have never been as affordable, and the opportunities to work from anywhere as many. Our lives have become more global, more spontaneous: be it a business trip, vacation, or travelling whilst earning your living online.

This means the amount of mobile technology we’ve become reliant on having by our side is constantly growing: your phone, your laptop, and your camera are just a few of the items you have to keep charged on the go. 

Yet power outlets vary drastically between the different countries you visit.

In a world where technology is constantly evolving, there's a need for our lives to become more seamless. 

Meet the nomadplug - the last travel adapter you will ever buy. 

Modular, compact, functional and powerful - and it works in all 195 countries. The nomadplug adapter meets your every tech charging need.

Should you really worry about researching which plug adapters you’ll need in each and every country you visit, when you have so many other things going on in your life?

Say goodbye to your draw full of dusty, low quality travel adapters you've accumulated over the years, finally an adapter that's so compact, there'll be no need to unpack it in the first place.

The nomadplug is the perfect single solution to your tech charging ecosystem. Now you really can plug in anywhere.

Finding the correct travel adapter should be easy

You're about to board your plane to Myanmar. You're running low on battery for your phone and laptop. Suddenly, a question pops up in your mind: "what kind of plug sockets do they have in Myanmar?"

You start to worry about where you’ll be able to find the right adapter and hope that your phone will survive till that moment.

With nomadplug, situations like this will be a thing of the past. 

What makes the nomadplug travel adapter unique is that it works in all 195 countries around the world - the first of its kind. It provides business professionals, working nomads, and passionate travellers with the ultimate convenience.

Here’s why nomadplug is the last adapter you’ll ever buy

Complete Durability

The superior quality materials ensure that the nomadplug is set to effortlessly withstand daily use. Durability and simplicity are the cornerstones of the nomadplug.

The nomadplug is made out of multiple interlocking modules which are secured together with rare earth magnets. These magnets have been carefully selected and strategically placed to offer the perfect combination of durability and compatibility.

Your nomadplug can be configured in multiple ways without ever losing a part, while adapting to any situation you may encounter: in cafes, hotels, or airports.

Worldwide Modular Charging System

The nomadplug has you covered, no matter where you are, where you’re going, or what device you’re using.

Charge any of your devices in all 195 countries.

Dimensions (mm): 144 x 55 x 30

Accepted Voltages: 110V - 240V

Current: 15 Amp

Hertz: 50Hz - 60Hz

Compatible plug types: A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,O

Works in all 195 countries

Hinged connector for secure connections

Rare earth magnet interlocking modules  

*CE certification pending

When Style Meets Function

The nomadplug was created for the design conscious user. The superior materials and trendy colour options offer a premium look and feel.

With your nomadplug, being able to stay connected and charge your devices on the go has never looked so good.

    The Ultimate Versatility

    The nomadplug’s minimalistic and superior design make it easy to hold, store and use.

    It truly enables you to go anywhere without worrying if you will be able to use or charge your devices in any particular country, coffee shop or simply on the go wherever your life may take you tomorrow!

     

    Crafted for the best user-experience

    The clever design of the nomadplug combines adapters for all possible plugs in the world whilst still maintaining a sleek finish in a compact form.

     

    The type M module has a spring-loaded earth pin, allowing the module to stay slim but still work with type M connections. The other two modules on the adapter have multiple connectors on each and have been designed to keep the overall size as compact as possible.

     

    Here’s what the creator of nomadplug has to say

    Ryan Silberman, creator of the nomadplug, affirms that the nomadplug really is the world’s most universal travel adapter and will add immense convenience for all the digital nomads and passionate travellers out there.

    “Most universal adapters do not contain a type M adapter and therefore only work in up to 160 countries. This means that should a user wish to travel to a country utilising the type M adapter, an additional specific and usually very bulky adapter has to be purchased.”

    Ryan continues, “The design of the nomadplug overcomes the challenge of bulky travel adapters despite the very compact and appealing design, it keeps you ready at all times to charge your devices in all 195 countries in the world. One travel adapter, and quite literally a world of opportunities for the adventure seekers!”

    Creating the perfect travel adapter has taken almost a full year. This is our timeline. 

    Form meets function - The nomadplug adapter packs some smart features into a compact, well-designed package

    But we're not the only ones who like the idea of owning one travel adapter, we asked nomads around the world to give us their thoughts on the nomadplug. 

    Prototype phase

    We're pleased to inform: our initial prototype tests were a great success, the nomadplug is well on its way to full production. Here's a sneak peek into the prototype phase.

     

     

    What all of this means to you?

     

    If you count yourself in the category of frequent travellers and digital nomads, then nomadplug truly is a no-brainer for you.

    Being sure that you will be able to connect and charge your devices in all of the countries around the world while enjoying the innovation of nomadplug’s design makes you realize the following: it really will be the last travel adapter you’ll ever need!

    So, how can you get yours? (Early Bird Offer!)

    There will never be a better time to get yours than now.

    For the first 500 early birds out there that want to get their hands on their very own nomadplug, you can back this campaign - ensuring you’ll be one of the first in the world to own the revolutionary nomadplug and at a discounted rate of only $99!

    After this Indiegogo campaign closes, the retail price for the nomadplug will be $150.

    As an indiegogo perk special, we're also offering a limited edition bespoke nomdplug - customised with a text engraving of your choice. Backers who choose the bespoke nomadplug perk will be contacted directly to confirm their desired inscription prior to shipping.

    nomadplug: the ideal option for a gift to your business partners and leisure travellers alike!

    Back the nomadplug campaign today, and you’re ready!

    Only a single question remains: WHERE TO NEXT?

    Facebook : Nomadplug | Twitter: @nomadplug |  Instagram: @nomadplug
story_txt:
Production, production, production.
It has been a long road, but we are finally there. We thought we would share a few pics and a video to whet your appetite. We hope you are as excited to receive your nomadplug as we are to ship it to you.

 
We will update you on the finished textures and packaging soonest. We cannot wait to share.
In the mean time here are a few pics of the molds and production run...
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

You have to agree: the world has never been as borderless, flight tickets have never been as affordable, and the opportunities to work from anywhere as many. Our lives have become more global, more spontaneous: be it a business trip, vacation, or travelling whilst earning your living online.
This means the amount of mobile technology we’ve become reliant on having by our side is constantly growing: your phone, your laptop, and your camera are just a few of the items you have to keep charged on the go. 
Yet power outlets vary drastically between the different countries you visit.
In a world where technology is constantly evolving, there's a need for our lives to become more seamless. 

Meet the nomadplug - the last travel adapter you will ever buy. 
Modular, compact, functional and powerful - and it works in all 195 countries. The nomadplug adapter meets your every tech charging need.
Should you really worry about researching which plug adapters you’ll need in each and every country you visit, when you have so many other things going on in your life?
Say goodbye to your draw full of dusty, low quality travel adapters you've accumulated over the years, finally an adapter that's so compact, there'll be no need to unpack it in the first place.
The nomadplug is the perfect single solution to your tech charging ecosystem. Now you really can plug in anywhere.


Finding the correct travel adapter should be easy
You're about to board your plane to Myanmar. You're running low on battery for your phone and laptop. Suddenly, a question pops up in your mind: "what kind of plug sockets do they have in Myanmar?"You start to worry about where you’ll be able to find the right adapter and hope that your phone will survive till that moment.With nomadplug, situations like this will be a thing of the past. What makes the nomadplug travel adapter unique is that it works in all 195 countries around the world - the first of its kind. It provides business professionals, working nomads, and passionate travellers with the ultimate convenience.


Here’s why nomadplug is the last adapter you’ll ever buy
Complete Durability
The superior quality materials ensure that the nomadplug is set to effortlessly withstand daily use. Durability and simplicity are the cornerstones of the nomadplug.
The nomadplug is made out of multiple interlocking modules which are secured together with rare earth magnets. These magnets have been carefully selected and strategically placed to offer the perfect combination of durability and compatibility.
Your nomadplug can be configured in multiple ways without ever losing a part, while adapting to any situation you may encounter: in cafes, hotels, or airports.

Worldwide Modular Charging System
The nomadplug has you covered, no matter where you are, where you’re going, or what device you’re using.
Charge any of your devices in all 195 countries.
Dimensions (mm): 144 x 55 x 30
Accepted Voltages: 110V - 240V
Current: 15 Amp
Hertz: 50Hz - 60Hz
Compatible plug types: A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,O
Works in all 195 countries
Hinged connector for secure connections
Rare earth magnet interlocking modules  
*CE certification pending

When Style Meets Function
The nomadplug was created for the design conscious user. The superior materials and trendy colour options offer a premium look and feel.
With your nomadplug, being able to stay connected and charge your devices on the go has never looked so good.

Form meets function - The nomadplug adapter packs some smart features into a compact, well-designed package
But we're not the only ones who like the idea of owning one travel adapter, we asked nomads around the world to give us their thoughts on the nomadplug. 

Prototype phase
We're pleased to inform: our initial prototype tests were a great success, the nomadplug is well on its way to full production. Here's a sneak peek into the prototype phase.





 

 

What all of this means to you? If you count yourself in the category of frequent travellers and digital nomads, then nomadplug truly is a no-brainer for you.

There will never be a better time to get yours than now.

story:
Well, not any more. We have developed the Crua Clan modular series with the user in mind. Versatility and Quality are key. 

  • Use the Crua Duo by itself as a lightweight hiking tent, or 
  • Join it to the Crua Core to use as a bedroom 
  • Add the Crua Cocoon for an insulated sleeping environment - regulating heat, noise and light 
  • Use each tent by themselves at any time, or together when required

The Crua Clan series brings with it a new age in tent design.

Amazing versatility...

 

 

 

 

 

You can now use one system to meet all of your camping needs. And with the Crua Clan series of tents you can be sure that you have an answer for every trip, in any weather. Remember, our insulated Crua Cocoon will:

  • Keep you cooler in the summer & warmer in the winter 
  • Muffle noise transfer in and out of the tent
  • Block light from getting in (you can allow some light in if preferred through vents and door)

Make your own Clan system as big or as small as you like...

 

 

 

 

As seen on...

 

 The thought process behind the design...

 

 

 

 

Crua Clan dimensions & weights, and Crua Core easy set-up and features...

 Crua Duo easy setup and features...

Crua Duo connection & Crua Cocoon easy setup with features...
