story:
UPDATE: 1800+ backers on Massdrop! 

 

S35VN Steel, Titanium Frame Lock

Custom-knife feel at a production-knife price. That’s the idea behind the Massdrop x Ferrum Forge Falcon. Designed by Ferrum Forge Knife Works, a two-man operation out of San Diego known for producing small batches of custom knives, this folder is small enough to take anywhere, yet rugged enough to open boxes, cut rope, slice food, and much more. The blade is made from S35VN stainless steel for excellent edge retention and resistance to corrosion. It flips open effortlessly thanks to the caged bearing system—a mechanism used in nearly all of Ferrum Forge’s custom knives. The 6AL4V titanium handle is both lightweight and strong. Bead blasted to a smooth gray finish, it complements the satin blade nicely. A 3D-machined titanium clip is reversible for righties and lefties.

 

Purpose-Driven Design Elements

The Falcon’s 2.9-inch drop-point blade features a sizable choil for index finger placement when choking up. The spine has a concave cutout offering a natural thumb rest for a forward grip. As far as hardware, the Falcon has been crafted with the best materials on the market. Thanks to titanium’s spring properties, it makes for a safe and reliable frame lock that is almost impossible to accidentally disengage. The hardened steel lockbar insert won’t wear out in the long haul, drastically increasing the folder’s longevity. Holding the knife together is a titanium backspacer, bead blasted in gray. Also notable is the titanium clip, which has been adjusted for tension so that it stays put on the go, but it won’t rip your pants apart when taking out the knife.

A Closer Look at S35VN Steel

Developed by Crucible Industries (one of the leading manufacturers of specialty steels for the cutlery industry) and Chris Reeve (arguably the most famous knifemaker in the world), S35VN is perhaps the most balanced blade steel ever created in terms of all-around performance. It’s made through a process of powdered metallurgy known as CPM, which results in near perfect consistency in the distribution of carbides. Compared to conventional melting practices, the CPM process produces a steel characterized by superior dimensional stability, grindability, and toughness. This folder boasts a blade with remarkable edge-holding ability and wear resistance, placing the Falcon on par with knives vastly more expensive.

About Ferrum Forge

Founded in 2009, Ferrum Forge started from humble beginnings in Eliot Williamson’s garage in Southern California. Using found pieces of steel like old files and leaf springs, Eliot gradually taught himself the art of knifemaking and metallurgy. As his skills and passion grew, so too did the demand for his work. Luckily, Eliot’s brother Chris joined the team in 2012 to help expand Ferrum Forge to what it is today: a small operation dedicated to designing and producing custom knives through a rigorous process of development, machining, iteration, and quality control.

 

About Massdrop

Founded in 2012, Massdrop creates high-quality, custom gear, apparel, and products inspired and designed by our online communities. We provide millions of members a place to connect, discuss, buy products together, and learn about the things that are important to them. Last year we launched 15+ community designed products and delivered on all pre-orders within 30 days of the estimated ship date. https://www.massdrop.com/about

Community Reviews

"I had the pleasure of test-driving this knife. I can tell you it oozes quality and precision craftsmanship. The action on this beauty is phenomenal. You won't be using it much for cutting stuff because as soon as you flip it open you'll get the irresistible urge to close it, just so you could flip it open again." - Theroc, Massdrop community member

"...this is a much more well-rounded style of blade that I very, very seriously doubt will come across any cutting task that this won't satisfy." - Jim Skelton, YouTuber

"This is a really great deal in that you are getting S35VN steel with titanium handles and you are paying just over $100." - EverydayTacticalVids, YouTuber

"...when you put together three industry icons' heads together to design and produce a knife, you can bet the result is nothing short of extraordinary." - Everyday Carry

"To me, this seems like a no-brainer. This is a great knife and with premium materials at an amazing price." - Cuylar, Massdrop community member

"There's a reason why so many people have gotten in on this drop. It's a fantastic EDC knife for not only knife collectors but someone who wants a rock solid EDC knife." - Living Survival, YouTuber

Falcon Development and Delivery Timeline

 

Specs

  • Produced by Massdrop
  • Designed by Ferrum Forge
  • Manufactured by WE Knife
  • Blade: S35VN stainless steel
  • Finish: Satin
  • Handle: 6AL4V titanium
  • Frame lock
  • Finger choil
  • Jimping
  • Titanium backspacer
  • Ceramic detent ball
  • Reversible titanium pocket clip for tip-up carry
  • Blade thickness: 0.158 in (4 mm)
  • Handle thickness: 0.45 in (1.1 cm)
  • Blade length: 2.9 in (7.4 cm)
  • Closed length: 3.9 in (9.9 cm)
  • Overall length: 6.8 in (17.1 cm)
  • Weight: 3.6 oz (102 g)

  • Warranty: WE Knives lifetime materials and workmanship guarantee via Massdrop

Included

  • Zippered carrying case
  • Polishing cloth

Estimated Ship Month: November 2017

Producing knives is time consuming. Every piece is carefully CNC'd and finished through a variety of steps—from grinding and polishing the blade to bead-blasting and anodizing the handle. This process will take roughly 110 days before the product is sent to our fulfillment center in New Jersey, where it will be packaged and distributed to the community.  

Risks

For a project like this, the risks can be categorized as follows:

Product risk: Will the product do what it says it's going to do?
There are no product risks with the Falcon. It is a precision-crafted pocket knife meant to be used daily for a variety of cutting tasks.

Production risk: Is it possible to scale production for this product?
WE Knife Co. produces tens of thousands of precision quality knives every year. All of them, including the Falcon, have a lifetime guarantee against manufacturing and material defects.

Operational risk: Can you make sure the product is delivered?
Massdrop is comprised of more than 100 dedicated employees tasked with managing the global operations and logistics of producing products. Last year Massdrop shipped hundreds of thousands of orders successfully.

story:
Order now!

 

 
Click here to watch the video.
 

The Pull Up Suitcase is a handy tool to help you organize any travel chaos. The collapsible suitcase enables you to systematically pack your clothes and personal items in separate compartments, which is the best way to guarantee that your trip is perfectly organized. 

Our convenient packing cubes help you to fulfill your individual, storage-related wishes. Using the mobile drawers, everything is neat, tidy and at your immediate disposal.

Everyone who travels a lot can relate to this: Traveling is nice, but it also bears a few challenges. However, the right equipment can help you overcome them smoothly. Imagine that you have arrived in a hotel room and would like to access the contents of your suitcase.

A conventional suitcase would have to be be placed on the ground and opened. The space is limited. You would have to unpack your entire suitcase and put the contents into the storage spaces of the hotel room. This is time-consuming and annoying.

With the Pull Up Suitcase, this does not pose a problem for you. 


Your patented suitcase functions as a mobile closet. Just pull the top upwards and you can access all the packing cubes containing your belongings straightaway. Everything is at your disposal immediately and neat and tidy - just like at home. And it doesn't matter how big or small your hotel room is.  

Speaking of neat and tidy; Surely you must know the feeling when you are searching for something specific in your suitcase or your travel bag. Where do you usually end up finding it? At the very bottom. Now picture this situation with the Pull Up Suitcase: You look into the convenient packing cubes inside the suitcase, use the mobile drawers, and, in the blink of an eye, you have already found what you were looking for.  

There's plenty of things you want to take care of on the way. Your luggage is no longer part of it. Because no matter how often you look for something, take it out of your suitcase or pack it up again: The contents always remain just as perfectly tidy as before. Everything is neatly stowed away and well organized. That's how it has to be. 

Traveling with the Pull Up Suitcase is nothing short of ingenious. Everything about the suitcase is different, yet intuitive. Packing the Cubes was a new experience for me yet fun because everything had its own place.

For this vacation the whole family had their own suitcase, and the difference in functionality and ease of accessibility of the Pull Up Suitcase was clear not long after landing. While my sons with their regular suitcases were awkwardly fishing out their swim trunks in the parking lot, I simply pulled up my Pull Up Suitcase to take out my swim trunks.

At the hotel I don’t have to unpack, instead the suitcase is my closet. Our little mascot had its own place in the closet as well and was always smiling at us. It didn’t take long until I couldn’t imagine a vacation without this Suitcase that had turned into a valet stand.

The best part happened shortly before my departure in the Florida Airport. The lady at the check-in counter asked me about the design of my suitcase, so I told her about my new suitcase and all its advantages. I showed her the Pull Up technique – awesome! – it was like we were in a commercial! She got her coworker right away and presented the suitcase, meanwhile the people in line behind me saw it and promptly wanted to know where they could buy it. I was happy – a great vacation in the USA.

One big and significant difference is already clear when we start packing: while my partner has to place her suitcase on the bed in order to pack it, because there is not enough room in the bedroom, I conveniently put my suitcase next to the closet and simply repack the shelves. I’m already done when she’s still tediously packing her suitcase.

At the ferry terminal, the English weather is already awaiting us – I quickly and simply open my suitcase to take out my rain jacket. It’s amazing to have a Pull Up suitcase! On the ferry I realize that I left my laptop charger in my suitcase - I’m so glad I put it in my Pull Up and not in any other suitcase, since there wouldn’t be enough room to open a conventional suitcase here, in between all the car rides.

At the hotel – while my partner is still unpacking her suitcase in order to get out her evening attire and annoyed with the lack of room between the bed and the wall – I’ve already pulled up my Suitcase and am now relaxed and waiting for her to be done. How have I ever travelled without the Pull Up?!

In the morning, we’re traveling to our second destination, I put my Travel Kit in my suitcase and I’m ready to go in a matter of seconds, while my partner’s suitcase has already been taken over by chaos after the first night. I’m certain that this is going to be a relaxed vacation for me.

Our CEO Matthias demonstrates how to correctly open the Pull Up Suitcase in the video below:

How to open the Pull Up Suitcase:

1. Pull the switch on the TSA Lock upwards and downwards to release the zipper ends.  

2. Ensure that the telescopic handle is fully collapsed. Move the zipper around the whole body of the suitcase until it is fully open.

3. Push and hold the 2 buttons on both the left and right side of the lid.

4. Hold the 2 handles on the side of the lid firmly. Pull up the whole top part of the suitcase at the same time until it locks into place. 

5. Open the zipper on the front of the case. The content is now accessible.   

How to pack the Pull Up Suitcase without video editing:

 

From socks to shirts, our packing cubes organize everything inside the Pull Up Suitcase. This makes packing a lot easier, especially when packing and repacking the suitcase during travel.  

See in a video how to pack for a 7-day business trip:

The following packing cubes are complimentary with every Pull Up Suitcase: 

The Dopp Kit offers a quick and easy way of storing your toiletries. The Small Box provides a separate compartment for your underwear, socks and other small items. While the three Big Boxes provide space for your T-shirts, trousers and sweaters, the Shoe Bag is a designated space for your shoes. Your suit coats and shirts find room in the Garment Bag. 

Pack everything up: Documents, your laptop or business cards can be stored in the convenient outside pocket, where they are always ready to hand when you may need them. 

There is no such thing as too much of a good thing: The extra wide Telescopic Handle allows for a better and more stable handling of the suitcase. 

Handy and comfortable: You can carry your suitcase by the handles on top as well as at the bottom of it. A little helper, just in case: the side handle. That way you can easily load it into the car or gather it from the baggage conveyor belt.  

Your desk to go: No matter whether you would like to quickly jot something down, put down your laptop or simply eat something on the way, the flat top surface serves as your table for any purpose.  

Travel safely: Due to the 360-degree wheels, your suitcase is not only extremely flexible, but also safe, since the wheels function as reflectors in the dark.

We have 3 warehouses worldwide that allow us to offer low-cost domestic shipping to all EU countries, USA, Canada, Mexico, China, Hong Kong and Singapore. Customers with a shipping address in any of these countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got that covered. Customers from all other countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. 

Download material about the Pull Up Suitcase

Please help us grow the Pull Up Suitcase community. Click on the button below and tag a friend or family

We aim to attain an upscale and unique travel experience for a global community by supporting our traveling customers at any time and place. 

We are fortunate to have resources to a worldwide operating network of specialized professionals who work every day to make our products the best they can be.

The main focus of our company is to cater to our customers' needs and wishes in a consequent and reliable manner. Our aim is to develop products with the ability to solve actual problems in peoples' day-to-day lives.  

Our home base lies in the innovation location - the Black Forest - Germany. We pride ourselves on the highly competent team we have built, which unites all branches and areas of competency of production and distribution.
story_txt:
Order now!
 


 

Click here to watch the video.
 


The Pull Up Suitcase is a handy tool to help you organize any travel chaos. The collapsible suitcase enables you to systematically pack your clothes and personal items in separate compartments, which is the best way to guarantee that your trip is perfectly organized. 
Our convenient packing cubes help you to fulfill your individual, storage-related wishes. Using the mobile drawers, everything is neat, tidy and at your immediate disposal.



Everyone who travels a lot can relate to this: Traveling is nice, but it also bears a few challenges. However, the right equipment can help you overcome them smoothly. Imagine that you have arrived in a hotel room and would like to access the contents of your suitcase.
A conventional suitcase would have to be be placed on the ground and opened. The space is limited. You would have to unpack your entire suitcase and put the contents into the storage spaces of the hotel room. This is time-consuming and annoying.
With the Pull Up Suitcase, this does not pose a problem for you. 

Your patented suitcase functions as a mobile closet. Just pull the top upwards and you can access all the packing cubes containing your belongings straightaway. Everything is at your disposal immediately and neat and tidy - just like at home. And it doesn't matter how big or small your hotel room is.  
Speaking of neat and tidy; Surely you must know the feeling when you are searching for something specific in your suitcase or your travel bag. Where do you usually end up finding it? At the very bottom. Now picture this situation with the Pull Up Suitcase: You look into the convenient packing cubes inside the suitcase, use the mobile drawers, and, in the blink of an eye, you have already found what you were looking for.  There's plenty of things you want to take care of on the way. Your luggage is no longer part of it. Because no matter how often you look for something, take it out of your suitcase or pack it up again: The contents always remain just as perfectly tidy as before. Everything is neatly stowed away and well organized. That's how it has to be. Traveling with the Pull Up Suitcase is nothing short of ingenious. Everything about the suitcase is different, yet intuitive. Packing the Cubes was a new experience for me yet fun because everything had its own place.For this vacation the whole family had their own suitcase, and the difference in functionality and ease of accessibility of the Pull Up Suitcase was clear not long after landing. While my sons with their regular suitcases were awkwardly fishing out their swim trunks in the parking lot, I simply pulled up my Pull Up Suitcase to take out my swim trunks.At the hotel I don’t have to unpack, instead the suitcase is my closet. Our little mascot had its own place in the closet as well and was always smiling at us. It didn’t take long until I couldn’t imagine a vacation without this Suitcase that had turned into a valet stand.The best part happened shortly before my departure in the Florida Airport. The lady at the check-in counter asked me about the design of my suitcase, so I told her about my new suitcase and all its advantages. I showed her the Pull Up technique – awesome! – it was like we were in a commercial! She got her coworker right away and presented the suitcase, meanwhile the people in line behind me saw it and promptly wanted to know where they could buy it. I was happy – a great vacation in the USA.One big and significant difference is already clear when we start packing: while my partner has to place her suitcase on the bed in order to pack it, because there is not enough room in the bedroom, I conveniently put my suitcase next to the closet and simply repack the shelves. I’m already done when she’s still tediously packing her suitcase.At the ferry terminal, the English weather is already awaiting us – I quickly and simply open my suitcase to take out my rain jacket. It’s amazing to have a Pull Up suitcase! On the ferry I realize that I left my laptop charger in my suitcase - I’m so glad I put it in my Pull Up and not in any other suitcase, since there wouldn’t be enough room to open a conventional suitcase here, in between all the car rides.At the hotel – while my partner is still unpacking her suitcase in order to get out her evening attire and annoyed with the lack of room between the bed and the wall – I’ve already pulled up my Suitcase and am now relaxed and waiting for her to be done. How have I ever travelled without the Pull Up?!In the morning, we’re traveling to our second destination, I put my Travel Kit in my suitcase and I’m ready to go in a matter of seconds, while my partner’s suitcase has already been taken over by chaos after the first night. I’m certain that this is going to be a relaxed vacation for me.Our CEO Matthias demonstrates how to correctly open the Pull Up Suitcase in the video below: How to open the Pull Up Suitcase:1. Pull the switch on the TSA Lock upwards and downwards to release the zipper ends.  2. Ensure that the telescopic handle is fully collapsed. Move the zipper around the whole body of the suitcase until it is fully open.3. Push and hold the 2 buttons on both the left and right side of the lid.4. Hold the 2 handles on the side of the lid firmly. Pull up the whole top part of the suitcase at the same time until it locks into place. 5. Open the zipper on the front of the case. The content is now accessible.   How to pack the Pull Up Suitcase without video editing:  From socks to shirts, our packing cubes organize everything inside the Pull Up Suitcase. This makes packing a lot easier, especially when packing and repacking the suitcase during travel.  See in a video how to pack for a 7-day business trip: The following packing cubes are complimentary with every Pull Up Suitcase: The Dopp Kit offers a quick and easy way of storing your toiletries. The Small Box provides a separate compartment for your underwear, socks and other small items. While the three Big Boxes provide space for your T-shirts, trousers and sweaters, the Shoe Bag is a designated space for your shoes. Your suit coats and shirts find room in the Garment Bag. Pack everything up: Documents, your laptop or business cards can be stored in the convenient outside pocket, where they are always ready to hand when you may need them. There is no such thing as too much of a good thing: The extra wide Telescopic Handle allows for a better and more stable handling of the suitcase. Handy and comfortable: You can carry your suitcase by the handles on top as well as at the bottom of it. A little helper, just in case: the side handle. That way you can easily load it into the car or gather it from the baggage conveyor belt.  Your desk to go: No matter whether you would like to quickly jot something down, put down your laptop or simply eat something on the way, the flat top surface serves as your table for any purpose.  Travel safely: Due to the 360-degree wheels, your suitcase is not only extremely flexible, but also safe, since the wheels function as reflectors in the dark.We have 3 warehouses worldwide that allow us to offer low-cost domestic shipping to all EU countries, USA, Canada, Mexico, China, Hong Kong and Singapore. Customers with a shipping address in any of these countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got that covered. Customers from all other countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. Download material about the Pull Up SuitcasePlease help us grow the Pull Up Suitcase community. story:
USAKW aims to create a new industry for the USA, and Key West and the world.

Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel will establish a new source of revenue to help fund coral reef restoration technology for Planet Ocean.

Never before has anybody in the USAKW or on Planet Earth ever built an affordable underwater luxury hotel on private property near Key West.  One day in the very near future, hopefully you will make your journey to Key West - America's Paradise - and hopefully take the one hour tour and end up staying for that night.  Again, if we have a vacancy a guest room will be available to our IndieGOGO supporters! Meals and taxes are not included.

When the Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel USAKW  is fully funded by IndieGOGO, then we will offer a discounted rate to the people who helped fund us.  This will be our on-going thank you to the IndieGOGO supporters! Today is the day to help fund the fabrication of the world's first affordable underwater luxury hotel. This creates a new industry!

Our MADE IN USAKW, with new USAKW jobs will shine a new light on the USAKW!

USAKW.com = PlanetOceanUnderwaterHotel.com. 
USA Key West - formally known as The Conch Republic.

INTERNATIONAL FUNDING OFFERING
Our USAKW prototype underwater testing in Key West will provide an opportunity for you to have a Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel in your geographical tropical island area.  Please show your trust, support and share our offering with ALL of your friends and family. We will ship international.

USE OF THE FUNDS
Our first round of funding will fabricate one 12' x 18' steel cylinder and three sheets of thick acrylic. This is being fabricated at the nation's leading above and below ground tank manufacture facility in Orlando.  This prototype will provide for our testing of the various support equipment. 

This prototype will quickly help fund the second round offering via our mega metro slow tour from Orlando down A1A to Key West via 18 wheeler.

Our D.C. lawyers have submitted to the United States Patent and Trademark Office the nation's first "underwater hotel" design.  We are doing everything in our legal powers to help eliminate the risk and to insure we will always remain number one on the planet. 

MADE IN USAKW for Planet Ocean!

We are on schedule for an united IndieGOGO success!

Put our southern Florida based specially selected manufacturers to work and we will prove that our Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel is safe and very luxury oriented.

This is the scheduling process to begin steel fabrication.

Upon funding, we will be placed into the 14 to 16 week contractual agreement for the 12' x 18' steel cylinder fabrication process.  This will include placement of the three sheets of thick acrylic and pressure testing for each guest room. 

We hope to see you one day in the future at the Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel and personally thank you for your trust and support.

2050 is nearing - help today for tomorrow.

Seventy-five percent of the world's coral reefs are currently threatened by local and global pressures, according to a comprehensive analysis released by the World Resources Institute, along with the Nature Conservancy, the WorldFish Center, the International Coral Reef Action Network, Global Coral Reef Monitoring Network, and the UNEP-World Conservation Monitoring Center, and a network of more than 25 partner organizations, including NOAA. For the first time, the analysis includes threats from climate change, including warming seas and rising ocean acidification.

The most immediate and direct threats arise from local sources, which currently threaten more than 60% of coral reefs. Local threats include impacts from fishing, coastal development, and pollution. Left unchecked, the percent of threatened reefs will increase to more than 90% by 2030 and to nearly all reefs by 2050.

Governments have ignored the marine biologists’ on-going warnings about the severe loss of coral reefs, failed to educate their citizens, and the result is our coral reefs are ALL dying.  Today it is estimated that 60% of the coral reefs are dead and most of the remaining 40% are dying. 

Tony Webb, Managing Director for Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel, searched for the world’s best coral reef restoration technology, and found it in Biorock® Technology. Invented by the late Prof. Wolf Hilbertz and Dr. Tom Goreau, this revolutionary technology allows corals to grow many times faster than conventional methods, and to resist environmental stresses that would otherwise kill them.  As a result entire coral reefs can be kept alive when they would die from high temperatures, and restored in a few years in places where there has been no natural recovery. Literally, this technology is our best hope to help save Planet Ocean from impending worldwide coral reef extinction. 

Approximately 100 yards off the coast of Lauderdale-By-The-Sea in Southeast Florida there is a new Biorock coral reef that has now has the highest live coral cover in Florida.  This provides visible proof that Biorock works in Florida, just as in hundreds of reef restoration projects all around the world.

Because of massive lack of funding to support the building of new coral reef systems in impoverished third world countries and islands, Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel project will donate a portion of its profits  to the Global Coral Reef Alliance, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization working with poor fishing villages around the world to help them restore and maintain their fisheries. 

Now is the time for the world to help fund the prototype for Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel.

Years ago, Lee Iacocca, former CEO of Ford and Chrysler led the nation to crowdsourcing to restore The Statue of Liberty,  and $200 million was raised. Through generous support from the public, Lady Liberty now stands majestically renewed in New York harbor. It was Iacocca's vision, like Tony Webb's that our national monument was preserved for posterity. Now our coral reefs need our help! 

We are seeking funding though the Indiegogo crowdsourcing fundraising Internet platform, because venture capitalists, banks, and investors lacked the vision to restore coral reefs, and none took the time to listen.  Now we are turning to the people and if the people want this then the people will have it.

Now there is another person who can and will make a difference and that is YOU.  For as little as $10.00 you can show your support or purchase other Indiegogo perks at the Planet Ocean Underwater Hotel page. All of our world-wide work is 100% dependent on your support.

story:
Join us so we can finish marketing our product to the world and developing our company website with a new online member booking portal. We couldn’t do it without your backing.

                                           

Freedom Resort Club principals Robert and Jason are offering an unprecedented opportunity to become a member of Freedom Resort Club. This opportunity allows our members to stay in 4 or 5 star resort condos for less than an average hotel stay.


Freedom Resort Club is offering a "Wholesale Rate" that saves new members roughly 80% off standard pricing that they would ordinarily pay for the same resort stay. This means anyone who signs up has access to over 3500 resort destinations worldwide and can now book resort weeks for a fraction of the retail price. 


Working with other travel clubs in the past, the founding members of the new Freedom Resort Club have collectively sold over 18,000 memberships. Those memberships ranged from $5,700 -$12,000 each; now they have come together in a collaborative effort to launch a new product that offers condo resort vacation packages for a fraction of what a similar membership could sell for today. 


A typical family would stay in either a 4 star hotel room for an average of $199 per night or in a 4-5 star resort condo renting at an average of $2750 per week.


As a member of Freedom Resort Club you and your family have the opportunity to stay in that same resort condo for a fraction of the cost. Our members can stay at these resort condos that normally rent for $2750 per week for a reduced rental fee of $42 to $71 per night. We are excited to offer these wholesale rates to our members worldwide.


 By becoming a member you are able to take advantage of our 50% discounted memberships during our prelaunch period.


1.     Bronze Membership $477  50% off enrollment fee for only $238

Bronze Members get access to one resort condo week per year.

 The weekly rental fee for a One Bedroom is $298, Two Bedrooms $398, and Three Bedrooms $498. Prime season travel may have a surcharge from $100-$200. Memberships will become fully active on or Before January 01, 2015 at which time you will be able to book your vacations online or contact customer service for support. Once memberships are fully active members will pay monthly maintenance dues of $27 a month. 


2.    Silver Membership  $777  50% off enrollment fee for only $388

Silver Members get access to three resort condo weeks per year.

The weekly rental fee for a One Bedroom is $298, Two Bedrooms $398, and Three Bedrooms $498. Prime season travel may have a surcharge from $100-$200. Memberships will become fully active on or Before January 01, 2015 at which time you will be able to book your vacations online or contact customer service for support. Once memberships are fully active members will pay monthly maintenance dues of $37 a month.


3.     Gold Membership  $977  50% off enrollment fee for only $488

Gold members get unlimited travel throughout the year. Plus Gold Members can add up to 6 family members or friends to share membership benefits.  

The weekly rental fee for a One Bedroom is $298, Two Bedrooms $398, and Three Bedrooms $498. Prime season travel may have a surcharge from $100-$200. Memberships will become fully active on or Before January 01, 2015 at which time you will be able to book your vacations online or contact customer service for support. Once memberships are fully active members will pay monthly maintenance dues of $47 a month.

4.     If Your Not Ready To Buy. Reserve You Membership $49 Reservation fee 

Reserve your membership for our launch date of 01/2015 and you will be rewarded with 7 night resort stay. You will get a certificate that offers you 7 night resort accommodations in one of over 2,000 resorts worldwide. Chose from thousands of US destination and hundreds of international destinations. 

The $49 reservation fee will be applied to your membership. You will also receive a 25% discount off the published membership fee by purchasing your membership by 02/1/2015.





Does this sound to good to be true? Well its not!! What most people don’t know is that most resort condos experience a 40-50% vacancy factor. Freedom Resort Club has the option to purchase millions of resort condo weeks at a below wholesale rate. We then pass on these savings to our members, which in turn benefits the resort by our members using their amenities. 



THE PERKS -


Unlike other membership travel clubs, the Freedom Resort Club allows members to travel where they want and when they want. Simply, other travel-based clubs do not compare. Other clubs require you to pay unreasonably high membership fees upfront, only permit members to travel to select locations, and travel to those locations on pre-determined dates.

Freedom Resort Club principals believe travel should be exciting and fun as well as affordable. Equally as important, they believe members should have a number of options to select their ideal vacation resort.

In addition to the wholesale discount program, new members have the option to buy-in and become a Founding Member at a cost of 50% off the normal rate that will be advertised in the future. This offer is part of the Freedom Resort Club Pre-Launch Program, shown above is how much money you will save.

In addition to the savings on your Membership, new Founding Members also receive a complementary 7-night 8-day resort accommodation package. This certificate will be emailed to you within 7 days after Indiegogo campaign is complete. Pick from over 2,000 destination (Subject to Local Tax). 


THE IMPACT -

The Freedom Resort Clubs management understands that travel costs have risen dramatically. Along with gas, food, hotels, etc. Inflation has played a part in the increased costs of traveling. Unfortunately, for most families, their income has not increased at the same rate. With this in mind, the Freedom Resort Club has decided to make a sorted effort to once again make vacations affordable for families by making it feasible to stay in beautiful 1-4 bedroom resort condos while allowing members to take full advantage of Freedom Resort Clubs plethora of amenities.

will be advertised in the future. This offer is part of the Freedom Resort Club
Pre-Launch Program, shown above is how much money you will save.
In addition to the savings on your Membership, new Founding Members also receive
a complementary 7-night 8-day resort accommodation package. This certificate will be emailed to you within 7 days after Indiegogo campaign is complete. Pick from over 2,000 destination (Subject to Local
Tax). 



THE
IMPACT - 
The Freedom Resort Clubs management understands that travel costs have risen
dramatically. Along with gas, food, hotels, etc. Inflation has played a part in
the increased costs of traveling. Unfortunately, for most families, their
income has not increased at the same rate. With this in mind, the Freedom
Resort Club has decided to make a sorted effort to once again make vacations affordable
for families by making it feasible to stay in beautiful 1-4 bedroom resort
condos while allowing members to take full advantage of Freedom Resort Clubs
plethora of amenities.

story:
Cleaning your grill just became easy.

Grill Rescue uses steam to clean your grill. Not aggravated forceful brushing.

THE PROBLEM:

You know the pains of cleaning your grill. So well, that you tell yourself you like the "flavor" it gives when you don't. You know the frustration of attempting to clean your grill with a dirty, rusted, metal bristle grill brush. Is that really the best we can do? I don't think needing a tetanus shot after grilling is satisfactory. Or even good enough..

WARNING - SHOCKING FACT: In a 12 year span, there were an estimated 1,698 grill brush injuries in the United States alone. That's over 130 injuries per year in a single country. Are you next to eat your wire bristles?

So, ask yourself: Is my grill brush really worth it?

We know you settled for your current grill cleaner. That's Okay. 

You can say goodbye to eating wire bristles, wood shavings, and stone powder. 

Do any of these look familiar? Point to the one you have. Now get your filthy fingers off your screen. 

We have solved all the problems with these grill cleaners and made the grill brush of your dreams. Seriously, this thing rocks.

The biggest issue with current grill brushes are that they simply don't work. On top of that, you have to deal with a number of additional problems. 

  • They break easily and get stuck in your food. 
  • They are not sanitary. 
  • They are always dirty (how do you clean your grill with a dirty cleaner?). 
  • They leave a nasty residue on your grill or just move the mess around.

Why do you deal with this? Because there's no other option!

 THE SOLUTION:

Grill Rescue uses steam to clean your grill. Yes, to actually clean your grill.

Using Grill Rescue is so simple to use and will save you loads of time you could spend eating your food.

Step 1. Preheat your grill to a minimum of 400 degrees Fahrenheit. For safety, turn off the burners once your grill is hot. 

Step 2. Dunk your brush, or run it under water. 

Step 3. Gently wipe away the nasty gook that's been building up.

Grill Rescue gets in all the grooves for a super clean grill. We've designed our brush heads to fit in all grill grates. 

You might be asking yourself, wouldn't this brush get super dirty after cleaning a really nasty grill? YES! Grill Rescue has to get dirty to get your grill clean.

Most grill cleaners just stay dirty. Not Grill Rescue! We've thought of that too.

Put your detachable brush head in your dishwasher or washing machine. Now it's clean and ready to clean more BBQ rib gook. It was made to be reused for up to 100 washes (on average during testing). After that, just grab your 2nd brush head, snap it on your Grill Rescue, and you're good for another 100 cleans!

 

THE PROCESS: 

Designing the world's best grill brush was very difficult. Wanting something better than what's currently on the market is easy, creating it is hard. It took nearly 2 years to design and create the perfect version of Grill Rescue.Take a look below and get a 30 second view of the last 2 years creating the perfect grill brush.

We created Grill Rescue out of frustration of a dirty grill. No grill cleaner could clean our grills well enough. We soon found there was an even bigger issue. People are swallowing metal bristles that break off the most popular grill cleaners. Thousands of people are being sent to the Emergency Room in excruciating pain and getting immediate surgery to remove these metal pieces from throats, stomachs, and even hearts. This is when we knew we could make a real difference. 

Hundreds of news videos and thousands of articles and Facebook posts flood the web of people getting severely injured from grill brushes. We are going to put a stop to this for good and get your grill cleaned in the process. Grill Rescue is not only a life saver, it truly is the world's best grill brush!

REWARDS: 

TIMELINE:

WHO ARE WE?:

Scott is a South Florida Firefighter and the inventor of Grill Rescue. Scott is currently completing his Bachelor's in Business Administration at Florida Atlantic University. He is a full-time Fire Fighter and Paramedic for Broward Sheriff's Office Fire-Rescue since 2012. Scott is involved with the Technical Rescue Team and also part of The United States Task Force II Team, which helps with many natural disaster missions.

In his free time, Scott spends time developing and constantly bettering Grill Rescue. He really enjoys the Florida weather and takes full advantage of scuba diving, fishing, and grilling up all his catches. 

Anthony is a Business Consultant and co-creator of Grill Rescue. While the majority of Anthony's time is spent on branding and marketing Grill Rescue, he is also responsible for all the events, video, imagery, and design.

Anthony spends his free time volunteering as a mentor to aspiring entrepreneurs. Oh yea, and he loves to grill! Due to the beautiful year round Florida weather, Anthony can grill nearly every night of the year.

story: .

As seen on:

The Wuvo Spot is a simple and affordbale way to keep track of your items. Just stick it to your keys, wallet, glasses, luggage, headphones or whatever you don't want to lose, and Wuvo Spot does the rest.



Did you know that an average person spends over 10 minutes a day just looking for stuff they've misplaced? If you're late for work or are hurrying up for a hot date--those 10 minutes count.

Point is, we've all been there. We've been late on dates and important meetings because of the simple, annoying fact that we can't seem to find where we last left our keys. 


That's why we've spent a great deal of effort, research and personal experience to design the Wuvo Spot - a unique Bluetooth item finder that helps you locate your misplaced items.



In a Nutshell: Why the Wuvo Spot?

  • Super Affordable
  • Increases Recovery Chance Of Lost Items
  • Saves You Valuable Time
  • Replaceable Battery
  • Free Shipping Worldwide


Track your stuff at less cost.

The Wuvo Spot IS the most affordable tracker in the market (it's about 30-60% cheaper than most trackers, actually). Still, that doesn't mean we'll force you on a subscription to buy a new one once the battery runs out--unlike some guys out there.


On top of that, there really are some things you don't want to lose:

Not Your Ordinary Tracker: Wuvo Spot

Most trackers ignore 2 things. 1) It can run out of batteries.  2) The power of traditional offline lost and found community. With the Wuvo Spot, anybody worldwide (with or without the app) who finds your lost item can easily reach out to you just by visiting Wuvo's lost & found website. In just 2 simple steps, it makes a difference to the owner.  

There's so many good samaritans around the world who is willing to go the extra mile in returning it to the owners. So we're making it easy for these good-hearted finders to do the good deed as well.



Helping Lost Items Find Their Way Home

The most common reason that lost items are not returned to their owners is the inability to identify the owner of these lost items. Wuvo changes that and makes it easy for the finders to contact their rightful owners directly.
See, the Wuvo Spot has a range of a hundred feet. Every user with the Wuvo app installed on their phones extends that range by an extra 100 feet. While the technology is super helpful here, the lost & found feature makes it even better. It increases and extends the recovery rate of your item indefinitely. Anyone around the world outside our Wuvo community can also play a important part in returning your lost item to you.


How it works

Every Wuvo Spot has a unique ID code printed on the back. This unique code allows anyone who finds your Spot to reach out to you just by filling out a form on our website.

Once the finder enters their details and notes on your lost item, a notification containing all these critical information is then sent immediately to you. You'll receive a notification on the app and also in your email. From there you can contact the finder directly through phone, SMS or email and arrange for it to be returned to you. It’s super easy, direct and immediate. 



In addition, Wuvo protects the security and privacy of the user through the ID code system. Each code corresponds to an item and can only be interpreted when it is marked as lost by the owner. Thus ensuring that the identity of the owner is never disclosed to the finder.

The Wuvo Community

Aside from The Spot's lost & found feature, every person who has the app installed on their phones can also act as a finder once you mark your item as lost. 

Once they come near your item, the Wuvo app will anonymously send your item's location to the cloud. You then get notified where your item is last seen. 



The Wuvo App

A tracker wouldn't be what it is if you can't find your lost item yourself. That being said, the Wuvo Spot can track your valuables up to a range of 100 feet. What's more is that you can track anything: your keys, wallet, or even that pesky TV remote. 



Clean & Minimal Design

We wanted the Spot to be something that we'd love to attach to our stuff. That's why we designed it in a way that it's both clean and elegant. Heck, we wouldn't be surprised if you used it as a bag charm. It does make a chic-looking accessory.



And just in case you want to get technical:



Project Timeline

We're excited to share with everyone how Wuvo got started from scratch. The joys, tears, fun and the whole process of our journey from concept to prototype to manufacturing and to the final product. It's not easy, but we managed to "survive" without becoming a coffeeholic or alcoholic. :)

Don't take our word for it.
We've launched our first batch of early adopters and sold out within the first few days. Here are some reviews from people who have tested the early betas of the Wuvo Spot. 



About Us

We could write a long and formal description about the company, its amazing team … but do you really care? If you don't, we can just skip the unicorns and rainbows. Otherwise, read on. :)

Founded by 2 rebels, Sam Wu and Steven Chen in 2013. Wuvo is a San Jose, CA technology startup made up of a passionate small team of geeks, introverts, extroverts, right brains, and left brains -  all with a shared passion of building amazing products people would love to use. We'd always like to be different, which is why we also shot a controversial ad for the Wuvo Spot.


The video got us over 1 million views on Youtube and a few hundred thousand views on Facebook in just 2 weeks. Some people like it, some don't, so if you're easily offended please don't watch it :)


Press

To download our press kit, please click here. If you are a member of the press and can't find something you need, or if you want to speak with someone from Wuvo, please contact us at press@wuvo.com. 

Possible Risk & Challenges - Things To Bear In Mind

Just so we are 100% upfront, we've worked very hard developing the Wuvo Spot. However, there will always be improvements and innovations that we hope we'll be informed by your feedback. By pledging to support this innovation you are doing so with the understanding that this is a new product that you are making possible - allowing technology to be realized.

MANUFACTURING: We are working closely with a manufacturer who has been able to produce the Wuvo Spots at a high quality so we have already resolved some of the manufacturing challenges. However, if we were to instantly scale to a huge volume it will still require additional tooling and production equipment and this is where some delays could occur.

FULFILLMENT: We've fulfilled and shipped our initial batch of 5000 beta units within 48 hours from taking orders. Despite the best planning, there may be factors that we cannot control such as equipment malfunction, transport or supplier delays. 

SOFTWARE BUGS (MOBILE APPs): We've done our best in doing QA tests for our iOS and Android apps, however there will always be bugs, improvements and innovations that we can always improve on with your feedback. As a startup with limited resources, we've been able to push out new updates for our apps almost at a weekly basis. So if you found a bug while using the app, please let us know :)

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Extensive testing of the latest Wuvo Spot design has taken place over the past year and we think we have a product that is ready for the market. However better or critical adjustments may be made along the way (as we can’t think of everything). This will result in a better product but may delay production or shipment in some cases. Good or bad, that's why we always appreciate your feedback.


Still have some questions?

Why is the price so low for the Wuvo Spot compared to competition?
Wuvo is 100% committed to a world where there’s less lost and more found. Creating the most affordable lost and found platform plays an important part of it. Most options on the market now are far more expensive, limiting the ability for everyday people to have the opportunity to have. We hope the Spot would be the lost and found platform for the masses.

How can you keep the Spot’s cost so low?
This is where we need your help, by supporting us we will be able to place volume orders with the manufacturer -- thus keeping the price lower based on volume. This also goes back to Sam’s experience, having had years of experience in electronics sourcing and manufacturing helped. Win - win situation for everyone. Wuvo gets a happy new customer, the customer gets it for a very affordable price,  and the manufacturer is happy with the volume order. 

How do I pay for shipping?
You don't have to, we ship worldwide for FREE.

How many Wuvo Spots can a smartphone pair?
As many as you want!

What happens when the battery runs out?
You can switch it out with a replaceable CR2032 battery and you're good to go.

What is the range of the Wuvo Spot?
Wuvo Spot's range is approximately 100 feet (30 meters).

How does Wuvo Spot attach to items?
The back of the Wuvo Spot can be stuck to almost any surface. The device also has a convenient loop that can you can also attach to keychains.

Do I need a smartphone for Wuvo Spot to work?
Yes. As of November 2015, our latest compatible smartphones are:

- Samsung Galaxy S4/S5, Samsung Note 4, LG Nexus 5, Motorola Nexus 6, HTC One and LG G4

- for iPhones, the app is compatible with iPhone 4s, 5, 5c, 5s, 6, 6 Plus and 6s.

Other devices not listed here might not work properly with the Wuvo Spot. To ensure compatibility, your phone must have BLE or Bluetooth 4. An operating system requirement of either iOS 7 for Apple and Jellybean 4.3 for Android is also required..

Do I need to keep the Bluetooth on to use the Spot?
Yes, the Spot works similar to wireless headphones in that you'll need to have your Bluetooth turned on for it to work.

Do I need to keep location services on?
Ideally yes, for the app to work properly. But if you don't need the extra help with the last known locations, you can have it turned off.

Does it drain my phone's battery?
Unfortunately, yes. Any technology that connects to your phone will more or less drain it somehow. But we are working very hard to optimize the Wuvo app so we use as little power as possible. 

Do I need the app running in the background?
Yes, in order for the Wuvo app to monitor and track your devices you will need to have the app running in the background. It only notifies you when you your paired Spots gets out of range. Other then that it stays quietly in the background and doesn't interfere with anything.

Does it work with iOS or Android?
Yup. We support Android phones running on Jellybean 4.3 and up. However, we recommend version Lollipop 5.0 or later with BLE or Bluetooth 4.0. As for iOS, the Wuvo App runs on iOS phones running on version 7.0 and newer.

How is the Wuvo Spot different from other  products?
1) Offline Lost and Found: anyone who finds your Wuvo Spot can reach out and return it to you via our website.

2) Two-Way Technology: Find your item using your phone or find your phone using the Wuvo Spot.

3) Community Find: every person who has the app installed on their phones can also act as a finder once you mark your item as lost.

4) Separation Alerts: Notifies you when leaving an item behind as well as remembers where you left the item on a GPS map.

Can I use your product along with other Bluetooth accessories?
Absolutely! Wuvo Spot doesn't interfere with other bluetooth accessories.

Who did your video?
We had a great shooting time with Robert and his team and we absolutely love the videos he shot for Wuvo. We highly recommend them wholeheartedly to anyone! They're awesome!  http://www.robertmentov.com

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?
Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of questions, and are responding as fast as possible! 

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com.

For all other questions regarding Wuvo, contact us at delight@wuvo.com

Do I need to keep location services on?Ideally yes, for the app to work properly. But if you don't need the extra help with the last known locations, you can have it turned off.
Does it drain my phone's battery?Unfortunately, yes. Any technology that connects to your phone will more or less drain it somehow. But we are working very hard to optimize the Wuvo app so we use as little power as possible. 
Do I need the app running in the background?Yes, in order for the Wuvo app to monitor and track your devices you will need to have the app running in the background. It only notifies you when you your paired Spots gets out of range. Other then that it stays quietly in the background and doesn't interfere with anything.
Does it work with iOS or Android?Yup. We support Android phones running on Jellybean 4.3 and up. However, we recommend version Lollipop 5.0 or later with BLE or Bluetooth 4.0. As for iOS, the Wuvo App runs on iOS phones running on version 7.0 and newer.


How is the Wuvo Spot different from other  products?1) Offline Lost and Found: anyone who finds your Wuvo Spot can reach out and return it to you via our website.
2) Two-Way Technology: Find your item using your phone or find your phone using the Wuvo Spot.
3) Community Find: every person who has the app installed on their phones can also act as a finder once you mark your item as lost.
4) Separation Alerts: Notifies you when leaving an item behind as well as remembers where you left the item on a GPS map.
Can I use your product along with other Bluetooth accessories?Absolutely! Wuvo Spot doesn't interfere with other bluetooth accessories.
Who did your video?We had a great shooting time with Robert and his team and we absolutely love the videos he shot for Wuvo. We highly recommend them wholeheartedly to anyone! They're awesome!  http://www.robertmentov.com
If I have questions, how can I reach your team?Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of questions, and are responding as fast as possible! 
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com.
For all other questions regarding Wuvo, contact us at delight@wuvo.com

story:
A Tour Like No Other.

Sustainability Starts With You.

We love nature, and we're tired of pointing fingers. So we are making a stand, and taking responsibility for our own actions. We have found that environmental conservation comes back to our daily actions as humans, and we believe that taking small actions every day is the path to sustainability.

Some might say that one person can't make a difference, but we know better. Throughout history, the insight and ingenuity of a single Creative Animal has changed the world countless times. 

However, when a group of like-minded individuals stands together, exponential change can occur. So, we're searching for 1 million people who are up to the challenge to do what they can to live, work, and play more sustainably. 

The key word is "more." Everyone has a role to play, and every one of us has room to improve.  

As Americans, we are one of the most wasteful countries on the planet. We want to change that.

The average American consumes:

  • 100 gallons of water/per day
  • 200 pounds of plastic/per year
  • 30 kilowatt hours of electricity/per day

That's roughly double our closest competitor, the United Kingdom

  • 40 gallons of water/per day
  • 100 pounds of plastic/per year
  • 15 kilowatt hours of electricity/per day

Let's say that 1 million average Americans cut their usage in half – the results would be staggering. In one year, we would:

  • Save 18 billion gallons of water
  • Eliminate 100 million tons of (mostly single-serving) plastic waste
  • Reduce CO2 emissions by 10 million tons annually

 

50 Cities

We are planning to visit 50 cities over the next 18-24 months, plus a whole bunch of towns, parks, and places in-between. We knew early on in the planning process that we couldn't put a figure on all the places we would go, so we're only really counting the cities and Troop Members. But we will stop by our amazing national parks to show off the wildlife and wild places we're working to protect. We will go to the small towns and the farms that fuel America. And best of all, we'll be seeing you on the road in all the in-betweens. If you you see us, give us a honk, a wave, and snap a picture for social media and let us know you saw us rolling down the highway.

Why A Tour?

We know that nothing beats the impact of meeting people face to face. By visiting people where they live, work, and play – in schools, universities, festivals, businesses, and state capitols – we will maximize our reach. And to make it exciting for The Troop to follow the adventure, we decided that the only way to do it was a tour. 

By Joining The Troop, This Tour Belongs To You

Because we're a public non-profit, supporters of this campaign will be taking ownership of the tour. And we want to involve them in the planning process. We have specifically not planned our exact tour route to leave it open to public opinion. Think we should visit your local wildlife refuge and show off what the biologists are doing? Awesome. Think we should interview your favorite band and put a spotlight on their sustainability efforts? Great. Know a representative or senator who is going above and beyond to protect nature? We want to know.

What We'll Be Doing On Tour

We will be building a group of like-minded individuals: a community, a consortium, a consortium of 1,000,000 people over the course of the tour. This will be The Troop. We'll be searching for members in many ways, this Indiegogo campaign being one. From face-to-face meetings on college campuses, retirees passing us on the interstate (Tim tends to drive excessively slowly, ha ha!) to millennials finding us doing awesome things on the internet.

In addition to those things:

  • Speaking

    •  We love to speak to groups of all sizes, from school classrooms of 30 kids, to auditoriums of 1,000 or more. But what we love the most is meeting face to face and having one-on-one conversations. We'll be doing all of the above on the tour.

 

 

  • Filming 

    • We love to film interesting stories about our favorite wild animals and the people using their creativity to help protect the ecosystems we all share. Regardless of financial, political, or racial background, we know that a love for animals and nature is one thing that brings us together. We'll also share Tim and Steph's adventure on Tour and how they are trying to live, work, and play more sustainably. 

 

  • Open Houses

    •  We've found that a lot of people have seen or heard about how "Going Tiny" can help them live a more sustainable lifestyle. And while they've seen Tiny Homes on TV, online, or in a magazine, most people have yet to step foot in one. We want to give them the opportunity to see one in real life.

Why A Tiny House?

In planning the tour, we researched every type of RV as a mobile tour bus. We contemplated everything from van-life to behemoth Class A buses. We were stuck on a travel trailer for a long time, and we even thought about fixing up an Airstream. In the end, Stephanie woke up one day and decided, "Let's get a Tiny Home and get on TV." 

Everyone on the team thought she was crazy, mainly Tim. But just a few months and a few weary phone-dialing & email-typing fingers later, Tim and Steph were moving into a Tiny Home on Wheels provided by the awesome team at 84 Lumber | Tiny Living after wrapping up filming for HGTV and DIY Network's show, Tiny House, Big Living.

In the end, a Tiny Home not only could serve as a mobile tour bus, but it fit our message perfectly. On the tour, the Tiny Home will serve as a mobile metaphor of the "Tiny Home" that we all share: our planet. We want to show that by downsizing and living more sustainably, the Tiny Home can provide a healthier life and go further. Tiny Homes also can be more sustainable than a traditional RV by using wood construction instead of particle board and plastic. Without all of the toxic chemicals in the manufacturing process, it also provides a healthier home for its occupants.

Take a tour of the house and meet our Tiny Home Expert: Andrew Odom

You can also get something from Andrew Odom in the perks section: a copy of Turning Tiny hand-signed by the Tiny r(E)volution guru himself!

Have you ever wondered how other people chose to live a tiny house life? Curious to know more about the small-living paradigm that's reshaping the way we think, live and dream? 

With contributions by over 60 tiny house luminaries, this hardback book is a resource for those interested in the tiny house movement. (autographed by Andrew M. Odom)

This Is Where Indiegogo Comes In

As supporters of this campaign, you'll be some of the first to get this mission going. More specifically, we are asking for: 

  • Troop Members: As we mentioned above, we are looking for 1 million people who love nature, just like you,  to join us. 
  • As a Troop Member, we would be forever grateful if you will subscribe to our YouTube channel. Here's the deal: the more people subscribe, the more the algorithms favor our videos and, eventually, the more money we will raise through YouTube advertisers. If you don't have a dime to give to the campaign, that YouTube subscription will go a long ways, too.
  • In exchange for some awesome perks, we're looking for some money to get the tour rolling down the road and to help fund low-income schools that can't afford to bring in outside programming.
  • Our initial goal for this campaign is $25k. This isn't enough to cover everything we hope to do, so we're also searching for a like-minded Title Sponsor. 

 

What You Get For Backing Our Campaign: Perks!

Not only will you be a member of our Troop, you can get any of our awesome perks, from a sticker to a weekend in the Tiny House. Here are a few that might need some clarification:

Stickers

  • We did a poll to see which sticker people liked the most. The results were highly inconclusive, some of both the Rectangular Bumper Sticker and the Oval Sticker.
  • (Note: The die-cut one in the picture was our original mock-up; people wanted it to say, "I Am A Creative Animal")

 

Tour T-Shirts

  • We've had a crazy amount of requests for T-shirts with Carl, our mascot. (He's cute, right?!) The time has come for us to send Carl out into the world on our Troop Members. He will keep your chest company on any size organic cotton tee you'd like.
  • Don't worry if you order one now and another later. We'll ask you for sizes at the end of the campaign and ship them where ever you'd like.

 

Original Artwork

  • Get an original work of art by wildlife artist and Tour Host Timothy Davison. These are one-of-a-kind originals created with oil paint on wood panels and framed by Tim himself using the most sustainable resource he could find: downed tree limbs from the forest right outside the Tiny House.

Polar Bear

  • This original work of art was created with oils on a wood panel and comes ready-to-hang in a custom built frame. This sustainable frame is travel ready and comes ready for the walls of your tiny house (or big house). 
  • Measurements are: Painting: 6" x  12" Including Frame: 10" x  15.5"

Bullock's Oriole

  • This original work of art was created with oils on a wood panel and comes ready-to-hang in a custom built frame. This sustainable frame is travel ready and comes ready for the walls of your tiny house (or big house). 
  • You might recognize this fella from the video we made of our adventure in Dinosaur National Monument this last summer. These colorful birds are close relatives of the somewhat more famous, Baltimore Oriole.
  • Measurements are: Painting: 6" x  12" Including Frame: 9" x  16"

  • Watch the video that inspired the painting here:

Wood Duck

  • This original work of art was created with oils on a wood panel and comes ready-to-hang in a custom built frame. This sustainable frame was made using wood from Indian Springs State Park in Georgia, some say, it is America's first State Park. 
  • The painting was inspired by a photo taken on the Homosassa River while Tim and Steph were in search of manatees in western Florida this winter. 
  • Measurements are: Painting: 6" x  12", plus frame.

 

 
 

 

 

Without Further Ado, Here's The Full List of Perks:

 

 

 

Know a Company That Could Be Title Sponsor?

We are looking for a like-minded sponsor who is excited to help a whole lot of people live more sustainably. In exchange for the a great marketing opportunity and a great tax write-off, we will be able to take our inspirational and educational message to schools and universities at no cost.However, we know we can only do so much in the brief time we spend at a given place.

That's where technology comes in. Real change happens when a student is reminded of our message a few weeks or a few months after our visit by seeing one of our YouTube videos, blogs, or other social media posts. They might change their major after watching a biologist who is saving the coral reefs, or get inspired by a student project that is protecting local wildlife, or learn how to save energy on a daily basis: 

 

What We Would Do with Title Sponsorship Funding:

  • Offer all educational presentations on The Creative Animal Tour for free, courtesy of our new Title Sponsor
  • Hire support staff: 
    • Video Editor: Tim and Steph can only do so much. With the help of an additional video editor, our team can produce much more educational video content, something to keep motivating the entire Troop.
    • Public Relations/Marketing: to maximize the reach of the tour, Tim and Steph would rather go to schools and film content rather than make phone calls and write emails to set up future tour stops. 
  • The sky is the limit: beyond the necessities, our team is willing to do any number of exciting ideas centered on the tour.
    • Scholarships/grants: We would love to help younger Creative Animals accomplish their goals and see their innovative ideas through to fruition.
    • Develop a Mobile App for The Troop: We have been approached by several groups who suggest that a mobile app is the best way to engage The Troop.
    • Etc...

 

Meet The Team

  • Say hello to our Troop Leaders -

Stephanie Arne

Co-Founder | Board President | Tour Host

As a seasoned wildlife educator and the Host of Mutual of Omaha’s Wild Kingdom, Stephanie knows firsthand about non-sustainable human practices and how they impact ecosystems and the species they support. So she has made it her life’s mission to share what she has learned with as many people as possible.

stephaniearne.com

Timothy Davison

Co-Founder | Board Vice President | Tour Host

Wildlife artist, educator, and filmmaker, Timothy Davison, gained plenty of experience as an “on-the-road” speaker long before hitting the sustainability trail with The Creative Animal Tour. In addition to working with zoos, he’s crisscrossed the United States accompanied by wild-animal ambassadors and spoken to over a million people while presenting conservation-based programs at schools nationwide.

timothydavisonart.com

Laurie Holloway

Communications

With deep roots in journalism, Laurie brings a whole ‘nother level of awesomeness to the team. After a career as a newspaper editor, this public relations and communications guru has worked in both the medical field and the zoo world. Her love for animals and passion for communication helps the team hone our unique message for the world.

 

Andrew M. Odom

Tiny House Expert

With experience in the non-profit sector as well as a prominent role in the modern tiny house movement, Andrew understands living a sustainable lifestyle on a number of levels. Having lived in a tiny house on wheels, he also knows what living and traveling with few tangible possessions is like, and he enjoys teaching others how they can live big while living small.

The Board

 

Amanda Ka'ahanui -Program Specialist, Special Parent Information Network, Dept. of Health, Hawaii

Tim Zielinski - Financial Advisor

Athena Sparks - Southern Region Manager, Arizona State Parks

story:
Hi everyone!

I’m writing today to tell you about an amazing opportunity I’ve found out about and would like to take part in.  This summer I would love to be able to go to Costa Rica on a volunteer trip run by a program called Global Leadership Adventures (GLA).  The trip I’d go on, titled “Saving the Pacific,” would take me to the Osa region of Costa Rica where I’d be working to prevent grey water - waste water produced from activities like laundry and dish washing - from flowing into the Pacific Ocean.  

The trip lasts a total of fourteen days, and the bulk of that time will be spent building biogardens that serve not only to eliminate grey water, but also to provide a beautiful landscape for the community.  I will also be serving on an ongoing project to locate waste problems in the community through geospatial technology and (hopefully) have the opportunity to help build recycling centers to further prevent harmful waste from entering into the ocean.  On top of all this I get to surf (my favorite sport), snorkel, and zip line through the jungle. 

To do all these amazing things, though, I need to raise a total of about $4,000.  

To conclude: there are no words that fully express my excitement about this trip. I’ve only been out of the country a couple of times, and to fully immerse myself in a completely different culture would be incredible. 

Thanks again for reading this! :)

- Kate

I’m writing today to tell you about an amazing opportunity I’ve found out about and would like to take part in.  This summer I would love to be able to go to Costa Rica on a volunteer trip run by a program called Global Leadership Adventures (GLA).  The trip I’d go on, titled “Saving the Pacific,” would take me to the Osa region of Costa Rica where I’d be working to prevent grey water - waste water produced from activities like laundry and dish washing - from flowing into the Pacific Ocean.  
The trip lasts a total of fourteen days, and the bulk of that time will be spent building biogardens that serve not only to eliminate grey water, but also to provide a beautiful landscape for the community.  I will also be serving on an ongoing project to locate waste problems in the community through geospatial technology and (hopefully) have the opportunity to help build recycling centers to further prevent harmful waste from entering into the ocean.  On top of all this I get to surf (my favorite sport), snorkel, and zip line through the jungle. 
To do all these amazing things, though, I need to raise a total of about $4,000.  
To conclude: there are no words that fully express my excitement about this trip. I’ve only been out of the country a couple of times, and to fully immerse myself in a completely different culture would be incredible. 
Thanks again for reading this! :)
- Kate

story:
Hello,

   Aikido of Denton is a non-profit Japanese martial arts school that has been a part of the North Texas community since 1993.  A little over a year ago we moved from our original location to a larger facility.  As our space grew, so did the number of students.  Unfortunately, what didn't grow was the size of our training mat.  That's why we need your help to build a new training mat.

   Building a new mat with your help will provide for a greater training experience for our members and a more professional setting for new comers. Also, we host an annual summer seminar that draws in practitioners from all over the country.  With the addition of the larger mat, we can hold the seminar in our dojo.  This in mind, we are limiting the time of our campaign in preparation for this year's seminar.

   As a thank you for your generosity, we are offering gifts at multiple donation levels. And don't forget that since we are a non-profit, your donations are tax deductible.  Let your friends, family, and training partners know about this venture.  With your help, we can make this happen.

Thank you for all your support,

Aikido of Denton

story:
This Holiday Season, Give the Gift of Clean Water.

Karotan's families have been drinking out of a dirty well for nearly 20 years. Men, women and children walk over 3 kilometers several times a day to retrieve water from the only well in the area, putting their health on the line. In 2010 alone, 34 cases of serious intestinal infection were reported in and around the village. By diverting clean water from a nearby spring into a simple concrete basin, the risk of water-borne illness will be significantly reduced. In nearby Getap, three stone basins have been delivering a combined 8 tons of clean water to local residents since 2012. The Tufenkian Foundation would like to extend this success to Karotan by piping water from a natural spring 7.5 kilometers away into a new 50 ton basin. Once completed, it would provide clean water for 465 people in Karotan and neighboring Vardabats, Kumayri and Pakahan.

Job Creation

The proposed construction will employ about 15 workers from Karotan and nearby Ishkhanadzor village throughout the 8-week building period. 

Sustainability

All building materials used will come from Nagorno-Karabagh. With regular maintenance by the Kashatagh regional water department, the new water system will function for at least the next 50 years. Maintenance includes a bi-yearly deep clean of the entire water main.

About Karotan

Karotan and nearby Vardabats, Kumayri and Pakahan are the most densely populated and agriculturally rich villages in the Kashatagh province of Nagorno-Karabagh. 

Nagorno-Karabagh's History

Nagorno-Karabagh is a sovereign state located to the east of the Republic of Armenia. It is inhabited and governed by Armenians, who have lived in the region for centuries. Its independence is disputed by neighboring Azerbaijan, who fought the Armenians for control of the area during the Nagorno-Karabagh war of 1988-1994. 

Project Timeline

The basin will be fully operational in mid-2013.

----------

The ONEArmenia Mission

Our goal is to set a new standard for transparent giving. We are a non-profit platform that connects the global community with organizations and individuals who are committed to making a difference in Armenia.

Learn more at ONEArmenia.org.

 

Около 20 лет семьям из села Каротан приходится пить  воду из грязного колодца. Мужчины, женщины и дети проделывают путь в 3 километра несколько раз в день, чтобы набрать воды из единственного колодца  в округе, расплачиваясь за нее своим здоровьем. Только в 2010 году было выявлено 34 случая серьезной кишечной инфекции в деревне и ее окрестностях. Направив чистую воду из ближайшего источника в бетонированный резервуар можно значительно уменьшить риск заболеваний. В соседнем селе Гетап,  к 2012 году 3 каменных бассейна позволили местным жителям пользоваться чистой водой – в общей сложности 8 тонн воды к 2012 году. Организация Туфенкян хотела бы применить этот успешный метод  в селе Каротан, передавая по трубам, протяженностью 7,5 км воду из природного источника в новый 50 тонный бассейн. Заполненный резервуар мог бы снабжать водой 465 жителей Каротана и соседних Вардабатс, Кумайри и Пакахан.

Создание рабочих мест

Для предложенной конструкции потребуется около 15 рабочих из Каротана и соседнего Ишханадзора на 8 недель строительного периода.

Прочность конструкции

Все используемые строительные материалы  производятся в  Нагорном Карабахе.  При регулярной поддержке регионального водного отдела Кашатаха, новая система будет функционировать как минимум ближайшие 50 лет.  Поддержка включает в себя глубокую очистку воды два раза в год.

О Каротане

Каротан и соседние селы Вардабатс, Кумайри и Пакахан являются самыми густо-населенными и плодородными территориями Кашатаха, провинции Нагорного Карабаха.

История Нагорного Карабаха

Нагорный Карабах является суверенным  государством, расположенным в восточной части Республики Армения. Он населен и управляется армянами, которые уже веками живут в этом регионе. Его независимость оспаривается соседним Азербайджаном, который боролся с армянами за власть на этой территории в Нагорно-Карабахской войне 1988-1994 гг.

Временной график проекта

Бассейн будет полностью готов к использованию к середине 2013 года.

----------

Миссия ONEArmenia

Наша цель – установить новый стандарт для открытого дарения. Мы некоммерческая организация, которая связывает мировое сообщество с организациями и частными лицами, заинтересованными в позитивных переменах в Армении.

Узнайте больше на  ONEArmenia.org.
