story:
GIVING BACK TO LIFE AND MOTHER EARTH

IT'S TIME TO GIVE BACK TO LIFE

Would you join me on supporting Life ?

 

My Story:

Hello my name is Amura-An. I am an Intuitive artist, Alternative Therapist and healer, living in the U.K

I work with many groups of people from all kinds of backgrounds, belief systems to support their lives, dreams and projects, to inspire to motivate, and create new opportunities together. Couple of months ago I went to Peru for the first time, blending in with local people and the essence of the land, giving and receiving, also doing an energy & healing work with a wonderful group of Lightworkers. And the Land,The Pachamama is calling me back for my service and support again. The Mother Earth said " Come back we are not finished yet, in fact we have just started!!" What a fantastic invitation it was. However I wondered how I would be going back there ? This is how the invitation manifested itself. I have been received an invitation & chosen to go on such a wonderful & exciting journey, called "Amazon Expedition and Avatar trainings" organized by The Children Of The Sun's Foundation, our beloved Founder and Visionary Director, Tiara Kumara, to take place in Peru, Iquitos between April 13 - May 1, 2012.

This is a once in a Life Time Opportunity for personal growth and transformation and also for Humanitarian Service. I am taking a part in the April group -group of 12-15 of us- and the participants who were chosen from around the word for this expedition will be undergoing such physical transformation, Jungle dieta, within the Heart of The Amazon, the rainforest as well as supporting the Indigenous people of the Amazon assisting them for building a hospital in their local area. During our time in the Amazon, we are hosted by "CASA SHIPIBA", a special Shipibo Indian family and their supporting pueblo village. We will be Living and Training with the Shipibo.

The Shipibo are an indigenous people living along the banks and tributaries of the Amazon River.

 

The Impact: GIVING BACK TO LIFE. The Life and the Spirit of The forest, Indigenous People ,who have been providing us the most vital part for our existence so unconditionally for centuries since the beginning of Life on this planet, now deserve more of our attention, contribution, support and Love. Rainforests are so vital and precious for our Planet, for us, for life. They are the source of Life which keeps us alive!! and we would not survive without them. Therefore every penny, no matter how small or big it is, will contribute tremendously to keep the rainforests and all its life alive. Since All life is interlinked and we are all connected to one an other, our personal experience and transformation will do a domino effect on all. On our return to our countries, we will transfer, transmit and share our experience, energy, knowledge ie the healing properties of plant medicine, healthier way of living to a wider reach, in our own areas and groups & family, networking this to all Lightworkers, healers, or to motivate one another just being a sample in our community.

So this is a journey of ALL of us, for ALL of us in Oneness. Your contribution and support is very important and precious since you will be adding the light of the World, to the tapestry which you are part of. "We receive as we give" according to the Universal Law and what we give always comes back to us in a perfect way. I will be cutting from every and any possible other areas of my life and expenses to prioritise this no matter what, to make this happen and see my self there within the Jungle to return the favour, to Life, to The Great Mother Earth and all her Life with passion, enthusiasm and endless Joy.

 Would you support me on giving back to LIFE and be prepared to receive thousand times thousand fold ?

 

Fundraising & Support for the Indigenous people and their Global Vision: I am aiming to raise $1800.

Each participant is charged with raising $1800 in support of this incredible humanitarian project. The cost and the donations will go towards all the expenses to build & maintain this ongoing program/project.

 *The funding & donations will help to bring the local people's global vision into reality. Funi, our Shipibo plant master guide who is the head of his Shipibo village, holds humanitarian vision for his work with the medicinal plants of the Amazon to help bring in medical services and eventually to fund the building of a hospital for this upper Amazon region.

 ** The donations also will be given to the tribe who has been building accommodations and preparing sacred loving space, food or plant medicine for all the current groups of 2012 and for future groups to accommodate this global project, personal and global transformation for our New bodies for our New World, New Earth.

 

 ***Donations can be made directly to the Foundation on my behalf if you choose so. Please find the link below:

http://www.childrenofthesun.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=435%3Aamazon-expeditions&catid=40&Itemid=207&lang=en

 

The Children Of the Sun foundation is a selfless humanitarian service to the mission of: World Transformation of Consciousness. The foundation is a global platform of unification serving as a bridge between consciousness paradigms by helping others into the higher dimensional system of New Earth energy. They are comprised of spiritually focused and consciously directed "Ambassadors of Light" serving, their mission is to help awaken as many people as possible to their highest human potential and to come together in harmony as one people, one nation and ONE FAMILY OF HUMANITY. They are accomplishing this through the actualization of our Global Vision. And I AM so proud of being one of them.

For detailed information of the Jungle Program please visit The Children Of The Sun Foundation's website : https://www.childrenofthesun.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=432&Itemid=207&lang=en

 

Thank you very much to all for reading so far, and for your support in advance

Love & golden Blessings

Amura-AN

"Ahum Premaâ€

story:
OUR MISSION

Wecycle Atlanta is a co-op bicycle shop that creates access to bicycles, local fresh produce, cycling and agricultural education to youth and low-income residents. 

The Story

After two years of running an award winning co-op bicycle shop and community service site from our founder's garage we were blessed to have launched a successful Indiegogo campaign that allowed Wecycle Atlanta to move into a store front in Atlanta's first suburban neighborhood, The Historic West End. It's a humble unit and in needs repair and renovations. With your help it can house Wecycle Atlanta's innovating and community building programming and engage youth and low-income residents in West Atlanta in an even more truly amazing way. 

The Programming 

WeCycle Atlanta’s “Do the Bike Thing Earn a Bike Program” presents cycling and healthy eating in an engaging way around the promotion of W.H.E.E.L.S. (Work Ethic, Health, Environment, Economics, Leadership and Sustainability). Programming includes a four course lesson plan that teaches safe cycling instruction, basic bicycle repair and bicycle advocacy. Service hours at Ashview Community Garden are required to complete the course. 

Program Highlight: 

- 300+ have earned bicycles to date.

- 2,000 +  combined community service hours from youth participants and volunteers

- Revitalized the Ashveiw Community Garden

- Piloted at the Harland Boys and Girls club and Morehouse College

- Provided full summer crops for community and youth participants for 2 consecutive years 

WHAT THE NATION IS SAYING ABOUT WECYCLE ATLANTA!

Atlanta Journal Constitution says " Wecycle Atlanta is Building strong communities and health kids"

Zagat  says - " Wecycle Atlanta is Redefining the food industry"

The Next Big Thing Movement says - "Wecycle is The Community's Pulse"

City of Atlanta - "Wecycle Atlanta is committed to providing access to healthy activities through meaningful community partnerships" 

Complex Magazine - "Wecycle Atlanta is changing the world"


WHAT WE NEED

$10,000 - Renovations: 

We need to make more space and install innovating bicycle repair stands and mobile storage units. The renovations that are needed are: Roof repair, wall rebuilding and demolition, and commercial sink installation. We plan to softly serve tea and to aid in prepping the food that we harvest in gardens that we serve.

$10,000 - Operation Expenses 

We need to secure what it would cost to successfully pilot our non-profit programming for 1 year. Operations include: Utilities, Lease, printed material, and other promotional expenses.  

THE OPPORTUNITY: A New Reality 

The Wecycle Atlanta co-op bike shop is directly across the street from the West End Park. With two elementary schools, and two middle schools within a mile radius of the bicycle shop it makes Wecycle Atlanta a central location to recruit idol youth through out the school year in a transforming and engaging program at the heart of West End. We stand to reach more youth and community member THAN EVER! 


HIGHLIGHT REEL: 

Wecycle Atlanta founder bikes "100" miles to MACON from ATLANTA to raise money for the Youth Hip Hop Conference and gives a speech to youth about GOING THE EXTRA MILE for what you believe in! 


Wecycle Atlanta Revitalizing The Ashview Community Garden!

VOLUNTEERS & DONATIONS

To donate bicycles or volunteer your services contact:Donate@WecycleAtlanta.org

Visit etsy.com/shop/DoTheBikeThingShop and support by purchasing WeCycle Atlanta apparel.

We will get to the next level of community impact with your help. 

Thank you for your donation and always #DoTheBikeThing!

OUR MISSIONWecycle Atlanta is a co-op bicycle shop that creates access to bicycles, local fresh produce, cycling and agricultural education to youth and low-income residents. 
The StoryAfter two years of running an award winning co-op bicycle shop and community service site from our founder's garage we were blessed to have launched a successful Indiegogo campaign that allowed Wecycle Atlanta to move into a store front in Atlanta's first suburban neighborhood, The Historic West End. It's a humble unit and in needs repair and renovations. With your help it can house Wecycle Atlanta's innovating and community building programming and engage youth and low-income residents in West Atlanta in an even more truly amazing way. The Programming WeCycle Atlanta’s “Do the Bike Thing Earn a Bike Program” presents cycling and healthy eating in an engaging way around the promotion of W.H.E.E.L.S. (Work Ethic, Health, Environment, Economics, Leadership and Sustainability). Programming includes a four course lesson plan that teaches safe cycling instruction, basic bicycle repair and bicycle advocacy. Service hours at Ashview Community Garden are required to complete the course. Program Highlight: - 300+ have earned bicycles to date.- 2,000 +  combined community service hours from youth participants and volunteers- Revitalized the Ashveiw Community Garden- Piloted at the Harland Boys and Girls club and Morehouse College- Provided full summer crops for community and youth participants for 2 consecutive years 
WHAT THE NATION IS SAYING ABOUT WECYCLE ATLANTA!
Atlanta Journal Constitution says " Wecycle Atlanta is Building strong communities and health kids"
Zagat  says - " Wecycle Atlanta is Redefining the food industry"
The Next Big Thing Movement says - "Wecycle is The Community's Pulse"
City of Atlanta - "Wecycle Atlanta is committed to providing access to healthy activities through meaningful community partnerships" 
Complex Magazine - "Wecycle Atlanta is changing the world"

WHAT WE NEED

$10,000 - Renovations: 
We need to make more space and install innovating bicycle repair stands and mobile storage units. The renovations that are needed are: Roof repair, wall rebuilding and demolition, and commercial sink installation. We plan to softly serve tea and to aid in prepping the food that we harvest in gardens that we serve.
$10,000 - Operation Expenses 
We need to secure what it would cost to successfully pilot our non-profit programming for 1 year. Operations include: Utilities, Lease, printed material, and other promotional expenses.  
THE OPPORTUNITY: A New Reality 
The Wecycle Atlanta co-op bike shop is directly across the street from the West End Park. With two elementary schools, and two middle schools within a mile radius of the bicycle shop it makes Wecycle Atlanta a central location to recruit idol youth through out the school year in a transforming and engaging program at the heart of West End. We stand to reach more youth and community member THAN EVER! 

HIGHLIGHT REEL: 
Wecycle Atlanta founder bikes "100" miles to MACON from ATLANTA to raise money for the Youth Hip Hop Conference and gives a speech to youth about GOING THE EXTRA MILE for what you believe in! 


Wecycle Atlanta Revitalizing The Ashview Community Garden!



VOLUNTEERS &
DONATIONS
To donate bicycles or volunteer your services contact:Donate@WecycleAtlanta.org
Visit etsy.com/shop/DoTheBikeThingShop and support by purchasing WeCycle Atlanta apparel.



We will get to the next level of community impact with your help. 
Thank you for your
donation and always #DoTheBikeThing!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

This is really the acid test, we will use this project to anticipate demand and objectively assess how serious the consumer wants this.

The funding will go in to fabrication of the first production run of frames, we've already paid for the prototype but a production run lowers the overall cost for everyone and makes the process far more slick. We need to invest in packaging and tooling as well as raw materials. If we overfund we will start full production, right here in the UK, and maybe even in the USA too to save on transportation as we already sell a quarter of our products to the USA and Canada.

Aside from the frame kit. We have custom artwork, blueprints, garments and more. We're also offering a few experiences that you'll enjoy (and so will we!)

IF we don't get full funding, our primary focus will be to fulfil our backers. Should we not be able to, we will offer an alternative product or refund. We are already an established business, we will look after you.

What do you get if I pledge for the frame?

SLEIPNIR 

180 travel front and rear. Hand fabricated in the UK. This thing is special. 

 

 

The Impact

We believe this will be our first full production bike. We have made over 300 frames over 10 different hardtail and full suspension designs, on top of 25 different prototype frame designs spanning several materials from humble steel to exotic titanium and carbon hybrids (Google "Sick Bikes Have Blue").

 

Some of our previous bikes

Have Blue (Titanium / Carbon hybrid)

 

4140 Wülf

 

Gnarcissist Luxe Titanium (Very special edition)

 

Gnarcissist Luxe Titanium

 

Hellhammer (27.5" DJ prototype)

 

DFA (Death From Above) Titanium FS Super bike

 

We believe the future of mountain bikes is gearbox based.

Our team has pushed geometry and long travel 29” platforms to the forefront of the industry. For such a small team, our influence is reaching even the largest of manufacturers.

This is the blueprint for every bike we make, you guys will be riding the leading edge of technology, this kind of bike has only been in the hands of the elite; now it's available to you.

We wanted to prove we could make an affordable, progressive bike in the UK, by working leaner and shipping direct to the customer, we make this superbike fantasy an affordable reality.

In the longterm this would secure manufacturing in the UK. 

 

If you would like more technical details and geometry, skip to the bottom. 

 

Risks & Challenges

As a collective, we are very risk adverse, we don't have any investors, bank loans or shareholders, so we are making for our audience, no one else.

That's meant we have become very good at identifying risks and weighing them up.

We have lots of friends who own larger bike companies, their connections and guidance have been instrumental in making sure we protect ourselves against risk. Should we have problems with raw materials, machining and fabrication? Then we have a list of mentors who will be able to step in to carry this over the line.

This frame was designed to be straightforward to fabricate, we have made far more challenging products using more unpredictable processes. We have the CNC routines production ready and material on stock to make the frames. If some unforeseen circumstance happens, we would have a multitude of options and suppliers to fall back on. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course not everyone can drop that amount of money on a frame. Like us and want to help?

Grab one of our smaller perks. 

It adds up fast!

Share this on your social media or even tell a friend in real life!

You wouldn't believe how much reach we get if people like, share and comment. Its all spreading the word. We are always so happy to see people rocking our stuff. 

Thanks for just stopping by!

Deep Tech.

For those who want to delve deeper.

 

F.A.S.T™ -

Fu*kin Active Single-Pivot Technology.

 

Our first prototypes had an array of complex linkages, and while the performance was marginally improved, we found with a high and active single pivot, you got rid of a lot of complex things to get damaged, a lot of needless bearings to service, the bane of every bike shop. So we focussed on a single row of oversized bearings doing the brunt of the work, but we also use needle bearings in the shock mounts to reduce breakaway force. And our isolated chain tension means no pedal / suspension conflict. This leads to an active rear suspension system geared for gravity. And we've all seen those recent world cup runs.

 

 

180/180 Optimised.

 

Next generation of Forks and Shocks now allow usable and reliable long travel options that blurs the line between a mountain bike and a pure downhill bike. On the fly climb switch means, whilst climbing this will never be a pleasure, you can climb to places few long travel bikes can reach.

If you think all that travel is excessive, so do we! But if you want to be the first person to carve a new trail or hit that drop. This will have your back. And its only 20mm more than a 160mm.

 

29”

 

For fast rolling and super monster trucking feel, nothing beats 29r wheels.

 

Silence is golden

 

No mech, no chain devices, no chain slap, no losing a chain... Ever! Perfect chain alignment, silent freehub. Focus on your run, not the clatter of your bike, become zen in the most challenging moments.

Every part of the frame is engineered to allow sniper levels of concentration.

 

Gearbox.

For something so complex to engineer, for the rider, a gearbox means a choice of 9-18 gears over an insanely wide ratio, A low centre of gravity and moving all that weight off your rear hub, and between your feet, which, actually adds to stability and traction. Go on, pick up even the fanciest of the fancy carbon rim, luxury hub wheel, and the most exotic 12spd cassette. That dinner plate size ring makes for a heavy and unstable mass right where you don't want it on a full suspension bike. Not only that but you can run a more sturdy singlepeed chain. Oh and servicing intervals of ten thousand miles per oil change. This bike is always ready when you are.

 

It's bullet time.

If you've not ridden an advanced geometry bike, you are in for an experience. Longer top tube, shorter stem, slacker head angle, steeper seat tube and lower centre of gravity. What does all this jargon add up to? A bike that feels that you are in it, not on it. Most test riders get the same feeling, that the bike feels like its slowing time down, more reaction time and more focus but faster times. Stability is the key. Without a twitchy front end you have less calculations to make, you can stay on line easier and hit speeds you never thought possible. In the air the bike is balanced with the rider leading to predictable take offs and landings. You can pick a line through root or rock gardens rather than just hitting and hopeing.

 

 

Future Proofing.

 

There was no point in building a bike that would become obsolete. We took onboard lots of real world rider concerns.

 

No weird standards.

 

ZS tapered headset, 31.6mm Dropper post, 142 Singlepeed hub (SS doesn't need boost as flanges are wide spaced), Post mount Disc. All these standards we expect not to change anytime soon.

 

Off the shelf bearings and fixtures.

 

We designed every part of the frame with simplicity in mind. The bearings and bolts found on the bike are common sizes and are all easily and affordably obtained.

 

 

Replaceable dropouts.

Not only good for damage control in the event of a bad accident. These replaceable dropouts allow future adjustment to the near endless wacky wheel standards the bike industry is so keen on. They hold our rear disc so if that changed in size or offset we'll be able to design a fix. You can even get modified versions if you have an unusual hub, like DH singlespeed / boost etc.

 

Open Source parts.

We will host the files, free to use, needed to create a replacement idler transfer ring, dropouts etc. You can buy replacement parts,from us, or any 3rd party that makes them, or make them yourself if you are handy**.

 

What if Pinion gearbox goes obsolete before frame does?

 

We chose the Pinion™ floorplan because we believe that the company is stable enough to continue growth and will last the life of the frame. Should in the very distant future the unthinkable happen. There is a plan B. We will generate a cradle )or more likely hassle Olsen bikes in to sharing theirs with us) to replace the Pinion gearbox with BB73. And this is where the replaceable dropouts come in. The frame will be designed to maintain, albeit suboptimal use, with a rear mech and cassette.

 

 

 

Warranty & Testing 

5 year manufacturers defect warranty with reasonable crash replacement costs.

Tested in the UK to meet and greatly exceed BS EN ISO 4210 Parts 1 to 9

 

** We are not responsible if your 3rd party or homemade part snaps. We should'nt have to say it but, its the law.

story:
This Is About Creating Entire Communities of 
                                     GrabGenies™


GrabGenie.com will be comprised of a nationwide community of GrabGenies™ that are literally everywhere, all the time, 365 days a year – made-up of everyday people in your community that have decided that they would like to make extra money while they’re out-and-about conducting their regular daily activities, by grabbing items at locations that they’re already at or near, for other people in their local area. 

Poised to become the most convenient go-to solution for grabbing items from stores, malls, and other locations, GrabGenie is the perfect remedy for those times when people simply don't have the time, transportation, or the ability to grab items themselves, or even when they just don’t feel like going to grab the item on their own!

GrabGenie.com will even provide an AWESOME solution for the state-to-state grabbing of items as well. So if a user needs something from the next state over or from a state on the other side of the country, IN JUST HOURS they could have their item - rather than waiting for next day delivery or 2-3 day delivery. In some situations, the store or business in the other state doesn't deliver out of state (such as a favorite local florist or small boutique or specialty shop) so you can only imagine the convenience of being able to easily tag GrabGenies in that state's location, and see if a GrabGenie is coming back their way in a couple of hours, and is willing to grab and bring the item with them!

Anyone, EVEN YOU READING THIS RIGHT NOW, who passes our ID verification process, can become a certified GrabGenie™! 

Pre-register for FREE to become a GrabGenie™ User or Certified GrabGenie™ here, at: www.GrabGenie.com

                As Featured On: 

    


The Power of GrabGenie™



How Does GrabGenie™ Work?

GrabGenie™ Convenience In All Types of Situations:

  • When you simply can't make it to the store, mall, dry cleaners, warehouse or other locations on-time or before they close, but need something from there desperately
  • When you're too busy or you're unable to go out and grab the items you need yourself because of work or your work hours, coaching your kids sporting events, or just the time consuming hard work of being mommy or daddy
  • When you need to do some holiday or Black Friday shopping, but don't want to brave the long lines, crazy mobs and bumper to bumper traffic yourself
  • When you don't have the transportation to go and grab an item yourself
  • When an item you want may be to far away - like in another state - and it's a bit unlikely that you will be able to grab the item from that distant location anytime soon

What Makes GrabGenie™ So Different?

  

GrabGenie.com – The epitome of convenience!


What About Safety & Security?

 


     More Ways To Contribute! 

GrabGenie.com is a community-based platform, and while monetary contributions will help to ensure our launch in all 50 states, we understand that not everyone can contribute money. So here are a couple of other ways you can contribute!

Pre-register for FREE to become a GrabGenie™ User or a Certified GrabGenie™ here: www.GrabGenie.com

Copy and Share our campaign link on your social media pages: igg.me/at/GrabGenie

Help Us Thunderclap Our Platform!

https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/11434-bring-grabgenie-to-your-state


Businesses Benefit Too!

GrabGenie™ helps your business find and locate GrabGenies™ that are at or near a location your business needs something from, to have the item picked-up and dropped-off to your business; or helps to locate GrabGenies™ close to your business in order to retain their services to deliver or drop off items to clients or customers from your business. ON TOP OF THAT, because we use geo-tagging technology, even if a GrabGenie™ cancels a grab™ at the last minute, you don’t have to worry about dealing with a pre-scheduling process, you can just tag another GrabGenie™ in your location or at the location you need to grab™ something from,WITHOUT EVER MISSING A BEAT!

  Contributions Will Also Help Us Go Mobile!

                        


What Will The Funds Be Used For? 

  • Marketing - (i.e. radio commercials, flyers, online advertising, explainer videos, street, etc.)
  • Infrastructure - Dedicated servers and back-up servers to handle the massive amounts of traffic expected to the site at one time, in order to guarantee 100% up-time
  • Development - We will be putting finishing touches on our mobile app development

story:
Follow Joe as He Finds the People Who Made His Fairtrade Hoodie.


Hi, my name's Joe!

Join me as I travel to India in February 2014 to find the people who made my Liminal Fairtrade Organic hoodie.

As part of the trip I'll be:

  • Finding the people who actually made my Liminal Apparel Fairtrade Organic hoodie
  • Seeing first-hand the lives of people who make Fairtrade clothes
  • Auditing the working conditions of Fairtrade and Organic-certified cotton workers

PLUS, in addition to that I'll also be:

  • Gathering information on the trip to assemble a 'Trace My Hoodie' Traceability System — the first of it's kind in New Zealand!
  • Once up-and-running, 'Trace My Hoodie' will allow any customer, via a QR code, to instantly see all of the people who made their hoodie, right from the cotton farmers to the seamstresses (See Toms Shoes' example)

Follow my journey this summer as I travel to the true 'coalface' of Fairtrade, and find out whether Fairtrade really makes a difference in the Developing World.


The Details.

  • 5 week journey across India, from 22 February to 1 April 2014
  • Visiting and documenting Liminal Apparel's entire Fairtrade Organic supply chain across India
  • Researching and creating NZ's first 'Traceable Fashion Garment', a Liminal Apparel hoodie
  • All funds raised, however much, will go to meeting the travel costs of the trip


Impact of the Trip.

  • Will create New Zealand's first fully Traceable Fashion Garment — from cotton farmer in India to the retailer in New Zealand
  • Auditing one of New Zealand's premiere Fairtrade Organic clothing brands


Ways You Can Help.

I simply won't be able to do this alone. Here's a couple of way's you can get involved:

  • Make a donation
  • Follow the journey on my blog
  • Share the blog with your friends

Follow my journey this summer as I travel to the true 'coalface' of Fairtrade, and find out whether Fairtrade really makes a difference in the Developing World.The Details.
5 week journey across India, from 22 February to 1 April 2014
Visiting and documenting Liminal Apparel's entire Fairtrade Organic supply chain across India
Researching and creating NZ's first 'Traceable Fashion Garment', a Liminal Apparel hoodie
All funds raised, however much, will go to meeting the travel costs of the trip
Impact of the Trip.
Will create New Zealand's first fully Traceable Fashion Garment — from cotton farmer in India to the retailer in New Zealand
Auditing one of New Zealand's premiere Fairtrade Organic clothing brands
Ways You Can Help.I simply won't be able to do this alone. Here's a couple of way's you can get involved:
Make a donation
Follow the journey on my blog 
Share the blog with your friends

story:
Get Year-Round Protection for Any Vehicle

Tough materials protect your car from falling objects, snow, hail, acid rain, bird droppings and more. As the world's first 4-season automatic car tent, Lanmodo Pro is simple to install and even easier to use.

 

Testimonials

See what some of our customers have to say about their original Lanmodo purchase. We're back with the bigger and better Lanmodo Pro for year-round protection for everyone's car!

 

As Seen In:

"I like that this not only protects your car, but can also do the same for people." - Gadgety News

"Protect your car from that impending hailstorm, or save time by not having to scrape snow." Gear Junkie

Click here for press materials

Key Features

Large Surface Area Provides Full Vehicle Coverage

At 15.7’, the bigger Lanmodo Pro is large enough to fully cover and protect sedans, trucks, SUVs, dune buggies, motorcycles and more.

We've designed the Lanmodo Pro to be large enough to protect any car yet still fit snugly in the back of your trunk.

 

Get Extreme Sunshade

There are 2 ways the Lanmodo Pro protects your car from extreme heat and keeps your vehicle up to 97°F/36°C cooler on hot days.

  1. The reflective polyester film on the canopy reflects sunlight to keep your vehicle incredibly cool
  2. The wind channels underneath the Lanmodo Pro canopy circulates so that hot air moves away from your car.

 

Robust Materials Protect From Any Damage

Fiberglass base and sturdy materials keep your vehicle safe from any damage. We tested it out by throwing bricks down on our car with the Lanmodo Pro on top of it. 

 

Designed For Cold Climates 

The special 3-layer PU silver coated canopy protects against frost or snow. Any frost or snow will come off with the wipe of a hand. 

 

Shaking System Removes Snow

We found that snow was another big problem for car owners and drivers in winter, especially trying to drive a car that's fully covered by snow. Our customers told us about having to clean snow off their car manually from front windows, side doors, back windows, even tires - a cold and time-consuming task each day. The Lanmodo Pro is back even better than ever. 

By getting an add-on perk, your Lanmodo Pro will come with a shaking mechanism that provides intermittent vibrations to remove any unwanted snow from the top of your car.

 

 

Ultimate Protection & Ease of Cleaning

The cutting-edge 3-layer PU silver coated canopy allows Lanmodo Pro to protect your car from acid rain, bird droppings, dust or sap and is incredibly easy to clean.

 

Strong Enough To Withstand 30mph Winds

Three windproof designs to make Lanmodo strong to withstand 30mph winds.

1. The Lanmodo Pro is secured to the roof of the car with a strength suction cup base. The suction base is strong enough to bear the weight of 70kg/154lbs.

2, Four windproof straps attach to front mirrors and door handles for car tent stability.

3. The two-layer canopy makes it so that any strong wind blows seamlessly through without pulling Lanmodo Pro off your car.

 

Anti-Theft Belt Keeps Everything Safe

Lanmodo Pro is designed with a double anti-theft system.

1. The anti-theft connector reinforced with steel cannot be easily cut. This belt is attached from the suction base to the front doors to keep the Lanmodo Pro in place.

 

2. The Lanmodo Pro is controlled by a wireless remote control to open or close it. Without the remote, the Lanmodo Pro is protected from being manually closed and removed from the car.

 

Incredibly Easy To Set Up

The Lanmodo Pro takes only 30 seconds to install and 8 seconds to fold or unfold with a one-touch wireless remote control.

 

What’s In The Box

Your order of Lanmodo Pro will come with everything you need for that family road trip or day in the snow.

What you get with your Standard Lanmodo Pro pre-order:

What you get with your All-In-One Lanmodo Pro pre-order:

With the all-in-one version, additional accessories transforms Lanmodo into various shelters for outdoor activities.

The possibilities are endless!

Customize Your Lanmodo Pro

Get the Lanmodo Pro protection you need in any style you want. Get the customization add-on perk today to reserve your Lanmodo Pro customization at 50% off the final price. At the end of the campaign we'll send out a survey to get additional information from you about your customization. Customizations are valued at $100+ depending on complexity. 

Technical Specs:

Perks

 

Canopy Colors

At the end of the campaign, we'll send out an email so that you can choose between black, white and navy colors for your Lanmodo Pro.

 

Early Concepts

Our team got tremendous feedback after launching the original Lanmodo and delivering that to hundreds of backers. Now we're back with the Lanmodo Pro, the culmination of cutting-edge technology and direct user feedback. Built entirely for the ease and convenience of our customers, our designs have been tested and proven. We’ve been working to perfect the technology and make sure it’s just right for you.

 

On Track To Deliver

 

Shipping

Where do we ship?

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Free shipping to US, add shipping for rest of world.

When do we start shipping?

We plan to ship the product in May 2018. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Trusted by Retailers Worldwide

Who We Are

The Lanmodo team designs and manufactures innovative auto gadgets to improve people’s daily life. The company is committed to research and development to bring customers the most effective protection for vehicles of all types.

 

FAQs

What is it?    

Lanmodo Pro is the World's First Four-Season Automatic Car Tent which provides
all-in-one vehicle protection, portable power source and travel shelter

What features are available?    

Lanmodo Pro comes with many features to protect your car. At 15' long, it is able to cover any vehicle and is made with a 3-layer PU silver coated canopy and fiberglass. The Lanmodo Pro also comes with windproof capabilities and the ability to fold down incredibly small to fit in any trunk. Included in your Lanmodo Pro pre-order is a wireless remote and anti-theft straps.

Why do I need this?

Whether you're parked in your driveway, out for a day at the beach or running errands at the mall, the Lanmodo Pro always has you covered. Last year we released the original Lanmodo and found our customers (thousands of people around the world) have used their Lanmodo to protect their car from extreme heat all the way through to monsoons. We're back with the Lanmodo Pro to provide bigger and better protection for all four-seasons - winter, spring, summer or fall. 

Why crowdfunding?

We have spent extensive research and testing to bring forth the absolute best solutions to create the finest product with additional multi-functions such as a car tent, beach umbrella, camping tent, etc. We are excited to share this innovation with the world and make it available on Indiegogo. We believe that this crowdfunding platform is the best way. Through the financing process, we hope to find backers who would become our loyal customers and supporters. By launching this new product with Indiegogo, every step of our progress is inseparable from your support and we would love to get your kindly suggestion and feedback. We are open to more input and have many other ideas for function options. We are excited to have your support so we can develop more features for the future.

How do I charge it?    

You can plug Lanmodo Pro into the wall with the wall charger or charge on-the-go with the car charger. Both are included with your pre-order.

How long does it take to charge?    

Lanmodo Pro takes about 3-4 hours to fully charge. The LED charging light will turn from red to green when the battery is fully powered. The rechargeable battery is made with low power consumption technology, one charge will last you up to 45 days.

How do I set it up?    

Take Lanmodo Pro out of the carry case, place the suction cup on the center of the roof, click "open" on the wireless remote and you're done!

Is there a warranty?    

Each Lanmodo Pro comes with 1 year limited warranty. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. What’s more, Lanmodo Pro's parts can be replaced easily. The friendly Customer Care team at Lanmodo will provide detailed videos and instructions if anything needs replacing. 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?    

Please reach out to our Customer Care team on the comments section of this Indiegogo page for any other inquiries you may have!

story:
Our Story 

Heartbreaks are not always bad! 

 Two years ago, I was going through a crushing heartbreak, when I was a college student looking for the American dream that was going to dental school at that time. 

Things were not going to get any harder for me at that moment!

As an immigrant student, living alone on the other side of the world and having been emotionally vulnerable for a while, I realized I wanted a fresh start. I knew there was something I had to do for myself to get back on my feet better than ever before.

So one day a friend of mine invited me to a backpacking trip, and I went. I had never been on a camping or backpacking trip and I did not have any gear, nothing. Not even a backpack! I used my college backpack to pack a couple of items I've just had and hit the road. A normal person would think about buying the gear before the trip, but at the time, as a student I couldn't afford any gear. 

I just went on the trip and I had a BLAST. It was one of my happiest two days of life spent in the woods. We swam in the lake, set fire, sang and danced under the stars.

No doubt I froze to death at night because I didn't have the right gear and I had a super uncomfortable sleep but the joy was to resolve all the discomfort. 

 After that first trip, I knew I have found my element. I started  borrowing my friend Ashkan gear and kept going on backpacking trips. The more I spent time in nature, the more peace I felt within myself. I started to feel happier and more content. I tend to lean toward enjoying life and even relishing every hurdle that comes with it. Nature has been the best therapy I could ever ask for!

As Albert Einstein says " Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better."

 

The joy was overwhelmingly beyond words that I wanted others to feel it too. 

 

As much as I wanted to take everyone with me to an adventurous night out in the woods, I couldn't persuade people to spend hundreds or even thousands of dollars to buy the gear.

Backpacking gear is very costly.  One sleeping bag could cost $500 or a backpack could get $300 out of your wallet. And these are just the basic stuff!! Pro backpackers know this well; it is the Right Gear that makes the journey easier and more enjoyable. Even if you are going to the most beautiful place in the world but your shoes kill you or your backpack isn't the right one for you and it gives you a bad  backpain,  you're not going to enjoy your trip much. Most likely, you might even hate it. But  who hates a nice night out sitting around the fire  toasting  marshmallows and sleeping under the sky, counting the stars?! Yeah, no one.

 

 

So we decided to make a platform that is capable of connecting people who are looking for gear to those who have those gear in their own neighborhood and community. (Both individuals and stores could be suppliers) 

 

Hi. We are Neda & Reza, Share Adventure and Gear team and we are excited to tell you about our platform SAAG.

 

 Our mission is to build a cloud-based outdoor gear supply company with a national reputation for stress-free accessibility to items at a lower cost with wider variety and outstanding customer service. So next time you decide to go explore nature but you don’t have a gear or two or you do not have any gear at all, do not worry!  We got you covered!

We have named our company SAAG ”Share Adventure And Gear'' because all we want to do is to make it possible for all the outdoor lovers around the world to connect and be able to share their adventures and gear.  SAAG is looking to make outdoor experience easier and more affordable for everyone so that all can enjoy being outdoors without having to worry about the cost nor the space that it takes to store the gear. 

We recognize that the best part of any adventure is the people you meet along the way. It is our goal to make using and owning outdoor equipment more affordable by bringing people together. Our platform is a community marketplace where members can rent and/or lend their outdoor gear to those in their community. We are here to not only connect you to gear but the best places to visit, and the insider scoop on your next favorite memory. We acknowledge inspiring individuals who are active in the outdoor industry and last but not least, we provide information about gear for different types of activities.

Whether you are an expert and have wisdom (and gear) to share or a novice who is not sure where to start, you are welcome and we look forward to supporting you on your journey.

 

The Problem We Are Solving

People are interested to be more outdoors and more involved with nature but aren’t properly equipped to do so due to below reasons:

High cost of outdoor gears

Limited rental items

Environmental issue

Lack of knowledge about outdoor and gear.

Lack of storage space

Struggle of carrying the gear while traveling

 

Outdoor adventurous people, mostly millennials, have a vast variety of outdoor gear that they use for different seasons, locations and occasions in which they have purchased at high cost but do not use them all at once and regularly. Their ROI on gear purchases are extremely low and there is no platform for them to rent out their equipment to produce an income from it.

What We Need And How You Can Help Us Achieve It

We have the goal of raising $6000. Our platform which consists of an application and a website is under construction and will be ready to be launched very soon. We are raising $6000 to help us with the costs of the launch and a little bit of marketing expenses. A lot of people like to have access to a platform like ours and we need to be the voice and spread the news so they know we exists:)  We are open and interested in early investment opportunities with the hope of finding the right investor and partner for us. As first time entrepreneurs, we are figuring this journey along the way and your help and contribution can help us make this dream come true. 

The Impact

As a renter next time you want to go on a camping trip or a backpacking trip or whenever you decide to do any outdoor activity and you need a gear or two, all you need to do is just go to our platform, and find the gear you like to have in your neighborhood. Have it delivered to you or just go pick it up and hit the road. And of course bring the gear back in the same shape:) Easy peasy. And you just saved yourself hundreds of dollars. As a supplier, list the gear you only use a couple of times a year and earn extra cash.

As a community, we are all trying to help each other to live the life of our dream of having more adventures in life while taking steps to conserve and reuse the existing products to help the current environmental crisis and save our beautiful earth one gear at a time!

And least but not last, once again think about this. Would you rather get stuck with your gear you bought forever or you rather be able to choose and use the right gear based on your activity with a small fraction of its retail price?  

Risks & Challenges

As the founders of SAAG, we are nature advocates and fans of the outdoors. With nature being our main area of interest and passion, and being exposed to the outdoor recreation activities as our lifestyle, we have the right set of knowledge, skills and community to start this company with the intention of observing, understanding and solving this problem for many who seek to be outdoors. In addition, we continuously attempt in many ways to reduce the consumption of products to conserve the environment in which we integrate this practice into our business model to contribute to the society and environment. Even though there are always going to be some challenges along the way, we firmly believe in the power of community. We are on our way to make the most trusted resource for all the outdoor enthusiasts to get their gears from and a community for all the users to connect and interact.

Other Ways You Can Help

We do understand not everyone can contribute financially but we would be on clouds if you could share our Indiegogo page with your friends and families. Maybe someone who you know would love to go out and do some adventure:) 

We deeply sincerely appreciate any kind of help and support. 

Special Thanks goes to Tara for supporting us from the very first day and to all of our friends who believe in our mission. WANDERLUST UNITES!

As a supplier, list the gear you only use a couple of times a year and earn extra cash.
As a community, we are all trying to help each other to live the life of our dream of having more adventures in life while taking steps to conserve and reuse the existing products to help the current environmental crisis and save our beautiful earth one gear at a time!
And least but not last, once again think about this. Would you rather get stuck with your gear you bought forever or you rather be able to choose and use the right gear based on your activity with a small fraction of its retail price?  
Risks & Challenges
As the founders of SAAG, we are nature advocates and fans of the outdoors. With nature being our main area of interest and passion, and being exposed to the outdoor recreation activities as our lifestyle, we have the right set of knowledge, skills and community to start this company with the intention of observing, understanding and solving this problem for many who seek to be outdoors. In addition, we continuously attempt in many ways to reduce the consumption of products to conserve the environment in which we integrate this practice into our business model to contribute to the society and environment. Even though there are always going to be some challenges along the way, we firmly believe in the power of community. We are on our way to make the most trusted resource for all the outdoor enthusiasts to get their gears from and a community for all the users to connect and interact.
Other Ways You Can Help
We do understand not everyone can contribute financially but we would be on clouds if you could share our Indiegogo page with your friends and families. Maybe someone who you know would love to go out and do some adventure:) 
We deeply sincerely appreciate any kind of help and support. 
Special Thanks goes to Tara for supporting us from the very first day and to all of our friends who believe in our mission. WANDERLUST UNITES!

story:
Summary

We are a two brother team born and raised just outside the treeline of the Wasatch-Cache National Forest in Utah. We’ve always had skiing, mountain biking, backpacking, fly fishing, and just about every other outdoor activity right in our own backyard.

Our passion for adventure, paired with our combined professional background in sales, athletics, and marketing has uniquely positioned us to develop and introduce a groundbreaking new set of gear to the industry—the Basecamp modular tailgate system!

What's The Basecamp Kit?



We're Ready!

Tooling is in place, and our factory is ready and waiting to begin production. Our estimated delivery date is January 2019, and we can ship to anywhere in the US. Any additional funds we raise will go directly towards marketing efforts, building inventory, and continued research and development for additional accessories to be added to the Basecamp system.

Our Story

It was during a late night brainstorm at our family cabin with our dad that we came up with the concept for the Basecamp system. We’d always been a truck family and had spent many hours sitting on open tailgates together sipping soda and watching the sun go down. What if, our father theorized, we could transform a tailgate from essentially wasted space into a functional hub complete with chairs, a cooler, and more?

Well, we couldn’t get the idea out of our heads, and within a few months, we had a tech pack and initial prototype ready to roll! However, in early 2017 our world came to a screeching halt when our dad, Jeffrey Allen Green, passed away unexpectedly in a tragic plane crash.

After a period of mourning, we came back more determined than ever to make Cache and the Basecamp system a reality in order to bring our father’s idea to life and honor his legacy. After years of work finalizing the design and materials, attaining a utility patent-pending status, and partnering with a trusted factory, we are finally ready to go live and bring Cache and our products to the world!

Risks & Challenges

We have spent over two years picking the brains of manufacturers and outdoor enthusiasts, touring factories, and testing and developing prototypes in order to build a solid foundation for Cache. We are not naive to the fact that there may be hurdles along the way, but we are confident that our research and logistical forecasting has prepared us to tackle any obstacle and ensure on-time arrival of your new favorite gear.

 

We've shipped!

Here are your instructions:

https://www.facebook.com/trustcache/videos/3382...
 

Packaging up your order:

story:
If you're reading this, you already clicked on our campaign. You rock! We're sure most of you know at least one of us: Josh is familiar because of his time playing at The Ohio State University, and more recently volunteering for USQ.  He ran Gameplay for US World Cup 8 in addition to four Regional Championships. A lot of you know Alex from various quidditch avenues, as a referee, as a player who travels the country, and as the current Great Lakes Regional Coordinator. And many of you would have met Bex over the last year, when she lived in Europe and ended up involved in EQC, European Games, and Quidditch Europe, or from her 3 years coaching at uOttawa. 

While none of us are Jedis, reformed Stormtroopers, or adorable robots, we are all on the organizing committee for the 2016 Quidditch World Cup and are SO STOKED ABOUT IT - Josh is Gameplay, Alex is Marketing, and Rebecca is Logistics. And, to make this tournament happen, Josh will be as trustworthy as Finn (once he made the decision to roll with the Resistance anyways), Alex will be as tech-savvy as BB-8, and Rebecca will be as passionate as Rey. We can't wait to do our bit to help make this the best, most international tournament ever. 

BUT (and you probably knew this but was coming) we all have already invested quite a lot in school and quidditch and do not have enough in our respective budgets to completely fund our trips to Europe. 


What it's going to cost us

Josh

Because of my work and geographical situation, I am stuck in terms of possible dates and airports, so my flight costs will be much higher. As a result I am not actively looking to fill my full travel costs. To fly from Columbus, OH to Frankfurt will cost roughly $1,800USD. I am only looking for $1,000USD and will be paying the rest out of pocket as a courtesy to potential givers (though if we exceed our goal I will gladly accept it!).

Alex

For my trip to Germany, I plan to fly out of Boston, Massachusetts directly into Frankfurt.   As of right now, my cost is looking at about $900USD. With this being my second trip to Germany, I already know what unique and interesting items people might want from this beautiful country, and I am more than prepared to make this happen for you with your generous donations. I will be trying to fund all housing and food out of pocket, and I will use any extra funding to aid my travel companions for this amazing tournament. 

Rebecca

The money I would need to get to Frankfurt (all ballpark costs because flight prices do tend to fluctuate):

$880CAD/$620USD to fly from Winnipeg to London (return)

$150CAD/$106USD to get from London to Frankfurt (return) (the cheapest option I've found is flying into Frankfurt Hahn or Luxembourg, and then a bus... but suggestions for cheaper options are welcome!)

for a total of $1030CAD/$726USD. 

I'm planning on covering transportation and food while I'm over there, since I'd be paying for food anyways, and will be pretty much counting on couches for accommodation... I will bring gifts of maple candies and can make you chocolate chip cookies in exchange! 


What we need from you

We're hoping to raise $3000USD. The money will cover Alex and Rebecca's travel costs, and the Josh will get the remainder - as you read above, we're all travelling from different places and as such our trip costs will be different.  

Head on over to the right to pick the perk you want, or if you can think of something else you'd like for a reasonable donation, just drop us a line and we can chat! If you're dying for delivery of something from Canada or the US, or want poorly rewritten song lyrics, or a ridiculous short story... we can make those things happen.

If you can't donate then please share this! Even if you don't want any of these perks, maybe your friend is a TD and needs a gameplay spreadsheet, or your coach would like to discuss drills... let them know and help the volunteers of the tournament committee get to World Cup. 

We hope we'll get to see you all in Frankfurt this summer!

1.Based on conducted tests by Yecup on September 2016 the mug works most efficiently if ambient temperature does not exceed 25C°(77°F) and relative humidity is over 40%. Full range heating cycle(59F - 159F) typically consumes 60% of battery.

2. Cooling takes more than hour(typically 2 hours) also it's recommended to shake Yecup every 30 minutes to see more accurate real time temperature . 

3. Yecup is mainly designed to Maintain temperature. 

4. Contributions that were made through Indiegogo are non-refundable.

5. We have not offered warranty for Indiegogo pre-orders.

6. We try to fix all issues that occasionally happen with defected products . The only way to fix  problem is to reach out to support team at contact@yecup.org .Posting negative comments doesn't fix situation in any way.

story:
Hello Friends and Family,

Most people are familiar with Vienna as a charming culturally and historically rich Central European city. It was once the capital of the sprawling, multi-ethnic Austro-Hungarian empire. Few Americans, however, are aware of the degree to which Vienna has become the international center for UN-directed human services and humanitarian relief efforts, as well as global headquarters for leading non-governmental organizations (NGOs).  Vienna, along with New York, Geneva, and Nairobi, is one of the four cities that host the United Nations.  The Vienna International Center (VIC) for the UN – commonly known as UNO city – is home to the United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) and its international atomic energy agency. Over 400 major NGOs have Vienna addresses.  The sprawling presence of the UN and its NGO affiliates has attracted leading religious relief and resettlement organizations from around the world. Relief agencies from all the world’s major religions, including European entities, are headquartered in Vienna.


I am traveling here for a course that is offered here at the University of Denver. I am going to be abroad for a week but we will be learning about what exactly is going on in Vienna through out November and December.


Because of what has happened in the recent months I am needing help financially getting to Vienna. If you wish to give a donation please see the link on the campaign! You are NOT obligated to give a financial donation but please feel free to leave one!

story:
Nikki's Trip to Nicaragua

My name is Nicole Harte. I am a recent graduate from the University of South Carolina with a degree in Spanish language and cultures. I want to live like Jesus, and have always had a strong desire to give life and hope to the poor and needy. I desperately want to pour out my life into helping people see God's love.  

God has set before me the opportunity to travel to Nicaragua this summer with the Charleston Church of Christ to serve in impoverished areas of the country. I will be living in a small town called Malpaisillo for five weeks with a local family. The main purpose of my stay will be to serve in the Nicaragua Job Development Project, an initiative started by the Charleston Church of Christ to help build local businesses and create jobs in Malpaisillo. Malpaisillo is an impoverished town in the Leon district of Nicaragua. During my stay, I will also be teaching English classes and helping to serve the local church in Malpaisillo.

The suffereing, poverty, and oppression that we see in the world today is not ignored by God; he hears every cry from his children. God has chosen to respond to the hurt in the world, not with a magical snap of his fingers, but instead by working through us to heal and repair what is broken. I believe that God uses us, human beings, to be vessels of His love and healing in this world. I think God's love is shown in a powerful way when we choose to pour ourselves out for others. This is what I hope to do with my time in Nicaragua.   

 

Where the $$$ goes

My fundraising goal for this campaign is $1000. The actual cost of the trip is slightly more than this amount, but I am personally funding the remainder of the trip.

The cost of the trip includes airfare, travel within the country, rent for the family I will be staying with, food expenses, and vaccinations. 

Any funds raised above my goal will be used directly for the Nicaragua Job development Project.

The Impact

Every contribution goes a long way!

Last summer a large group from the Charleston Church of Christ traveled to Malpaisillo with the heart to build and serve. They started an initiative called the Nicaragua Job Development Project to create jobs and income for locals in the town. Their main project was building a bakery/cafe (the only one in this impoverished town!) which could employ and provide for multiple families. This summer, we will be returning to continue the work which was started. We will also be helping a woman in the town to build her own clothing store. 

While in Malpaisilllo, we will also be teaching English classes for both adults and children, as well as painting local houses and helping install concrete floors into homes which currently have dirt floors.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I fully understand that many of you will not be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Here are some other ways you can support my trip:


First and foremost, PRAY! I can use all the prayers that I can get =]


Get the word out about this fundraising campaign! Don't forget to use the Indiegogo "share" tools
