story:
Want to learn more?  We got you:

 

Let's face it, journaling has a bum rap.  Which is too bad because not everyone who journals is a 12-year-old girl with a heart-wrenching pre-teen crush (poor girl).

We're here to change that.  Journaling might not be for everyone but great things rarely are.  Journo, though, is for us, and hopefully you.

We've created the most sophisticated journaling app available, but that's only part of the equation.

The magic lies in what happens to your life when you use it.

As you read this, you're probably not in the midst of a life crisis, but maybe deep down you know you were made for more.  No matter the place you're in, it's never too late to start writing the story you were made to live.

And that's why we're here - to give you a blank canvas, a blank page and to urge you to start (now?) because otherwise time will fly by and you’ll still be left with the same blank canvas, the same blank page, and a life full of regret.

So, what kind of life do you want live?  Not for your parents, not for your friends, not for anybody but you.

What words do you want to fill these pages?  What pictures and videos do you want to fill this canvas?  Again:

What’s your story?

Journo is here to help you fall more and more in love with your life.  To get you waking up everyday excited for what’s in store.  To encourage you to live an adventure.  So let’s burn your couch and do just that!  


1 - Travel Maps.  Have an adventure lined up?  Wouldn't it be sweet to view your route?  Wouldn't it be even sweeter to view it on a custom designed map you can only find in Journo?  Well then we've got you covered.  Check out your current options:


2 - Text Schmext.  One of the biggest reasons we wanted to create this is because buying a paper journal is cool, but extremely limited.  I was anchored in a gorgeous and secluded bay in The Bahamas, watching a strikingly red sunrise and not able to add a picture of it to my paper journal.  That needed to be changed.  So we took care of it.  Seamlessly add as many pictures or videos as you want... for those moments when words just don't cut it!  Take a gander:


3 - Not Just Digital.  Remember how I just said "a paper journal is cool"?  They certainly are - to look at!  But hauling one around, with all it's limitations, isn't so cool.  We got you covered here as well and made it as easy as pie to print your Journos directly from the app.  We lay them out and let you alter and edit to your liking (fonts, colors, pics, placement, etc).  Then just print!  It's the best of both worlds and only Journo does it.  Check out the beautiful finished product here:


4 - Collaborate!  Never before has there been a way for two people to contribute to the same journal.  We're pretty jacked up about this.  You and the hubby want to journal about all the funny things your kid is doing?  No problem.  Heading out on a road trip with a pal and want to collaborate on the same journo to maximize the memories?  No problem.  The options are endless.  Here's how it works:


5 - Tailored Journos.  We've customized a few different journos to suit your needs: a daily gratitude journo, project journo and travel journo.  All of which have a few different features that fit nicely within that theme.  Use one, use them all.  Unlimited journos with your subscription.  Take a look:


BONUS 6, 7, 8... - Safe, Secure, Cross-Device, Etc.  Your privacy is priority numero uno, so no worries there because your journos are locked up tight and only available to you (on any of your devices you're logged in to).


Thanks to all our amazing early adopters, we've hit our initial goal.  But let's not stop now!

We're unlocking an Android version of Journo for just $10,800!  Here's the details:

  • ALL perks below stay the same, but use the app on your Android device instead.
  • Will work on Android tablets too!
  • Unlike our August iOS launch, we don't expect to have the Android version ready until fall (but we'll make sure it's worth the wait!).

Welcome aboard Android people.  We're psyched to have you, and can't wait to hear about the awesome life stories you write with Journo!



Make some money telling your friends about Journo!


We've been making apps for over five years.  We are a small and dedicated team out to make stuff that matters.  Unlike the big guns - the large software companies - we don't have floors on floors on floors of developers and venture capital in the bank.  What we do have, though, we believe is much more important.  We have a strong and growing community of iPhone & iPad users who believe in the work we're doing and love the stuff we make for them.

Our apps have been used over 40 million times, but none of them can hold a candle to the difficulty of creating Journo.  At this point we have an early alpha version, which means we're about 75% there, and it's the last 25% that's most challenging.  BUT it's not only this last bit that we need your help with...

More than just development, we need your help in changing lives.  Maybe that's yours, or maybe that's someone you think might need Journo.  We believe that Journo tracks and encourages users to live a more fulfilling life and we want as many people as possible to get involved and get living the life that is true to them.

That's why our perks are so extremely low priced for what you get... we want as many users as possible to benefit from this and through IndieGoGo, we can accomplish this together.


We're asking for $7,800, which will pay for:

In addition, there might be a few additional development costs and unexpected costs, so we'd love a little padding on our budget.


While most IndieGoGo campaigns launch with a concept or prototype, we feel that most of the risk in our project has already been cut by having moved far beyond that stage to an alpha version of Journo for iOS iPhones & iPads, by our incredible and deeply experienced team.

This isn't our first rodeo.  We've successfully launched over 40 applications for The App Store.  We've built the #1 Entertainment app in the United States, as well as a few other top Apple Picks.  Our apps have been used over 40 million times and we're happy to say that none of which are as sweet as this one!  So this is the only project we are running, and has the undivided attention of our team.

Launch Timing: With any software development, there are potential risks in unforeseen variables causing delays in launch. While this is always a possibility, we don't expect this to play a significant role given the stage we're at. We have already made a tremendously detailed effort to create a streamlined and extremely reliable application. 

We feel confident that we could launch Journo for Apple devices shortly after the conclusion of our IndieGoGo campaign. 

We will keep our backers up to date with our progress and let you know if we encounter any setbacks.


If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can really help us make this project a reality:

  • Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.
  • Give us feedback.  We LOVE feedback because we constantly strive to improve for our amazing users.  So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!

Thank you for your support! 


We couldn't have made Journo this amazing without the crucial integration with these two amazing companies:

Milk Books:
We scoured the planet for the best print shop for your Journos and no one could compete with these guys.  Your custom maps and printed Journos are in the best hands and are printed on the highest quality fabrics and paper available.  You'll be more than excited when you crack open this box from the mailman!


1) Is the app available for Android devices?

Not yet.  But if we meet our initial goal, then we're off to the races for the Android Stretch Goal!  We hit that, and we'll go Android!

2) Is there a data limit?  A limit on the amount of pics & videos I can upload?

Nope!  The reason we have subscriptions is to cover all of our server costs, which can add up when users add lots of content.  But that's what we're here for!  Add everything you can!  We'll NEVER limit you on this.

3) How are you different from the other journaling apps out there?

Oh wow, glad you asked this because we are VERY different from what else is available.  For one thing, we allow you to share your journos with friends or family.  This way you can collaborate on the memories!  We also have tailored journos - you know, different folks different strokes.  How about our mapping feature?  Ever seen that before?  We didn't think so and we worked extremely hard to make this work perfectly and LOOK amazing too (we've even give you multiple design options!).  Then there is the printing aspect too.  We've made it easy to fill up your journos, and then we've given you the option to print them too.  Want a gorgeous coffee table book from that last adventure?  No problem.  The list goes on and on (with more to come!).

4) Could I ever lose my data?  How do I know it's safe and sound?

No worries here because all of your data is totally encrypted on our servers and backed up to a secure cloud.  It's yours forever, and no one but you can access it.

5) Is there a page limit for printing my Journo?

We had to cap the page at 30 pages for the campaign, but don't worry because additional pages are inexpensive and you can easily add them at the time of printing.
story_txt:
Want to learn more?  We got you:
 





 

Let's face it, journaling has a bum rap.  Which is too bad because not everyone who journals is a 12-year-old girl with a heart-wrenching pre-teen crush (poor girl).
We're here to change that.  Journaling might not be for everyone but great things rarely are.  Journo, though, is for us, and hopefully you.
We've created the most sophisticated journaling app available, but that's only part of the equation.
The magic lies in what happens to your life when you use it.
As you read this, you're probably not in the midst of a life crisis, but maybe deep down you know you were made for more.  No matter the place you're in, it's never too late to start writing the story you were made to live.

And that's why we're here - to give you a blank canvas, a blank page and to urge you to start (now?) because otherwise time will fly by and you’ll still be left with the same blank canvas, the same blank page, and a life full of regret.

So, what kind of life do you want live?  Not for your parents, not for your friends, not for anybody but you.
What words do you want to fill these pages?  What pictures and videos do you want to fill this canvas?  Again:
What’s your story?
Journo is here to help you fall more and more in love with your life.  To get you waking up everyday excited for what’s in store.  To encourage you to live an adventure.  So let’s burn your couch and do just that!  






1 - Travel Maps.  Have an adventure lined up?  Wouldn't it be sweet to view your route?  Wouldn't it be even sweeter to view it on a custom designed map you can only find in Journo?  Well then we've got you covered.  Check out your current options:





2 - Text Schmext.  One of the biggest reasons we wanted to create this is because buying a paper journal is cool, but extremely limited.  I was anchored in a gorgeous and secluded bay in The Bahamas, watching a strikingly red sunrise and not able to add a picture of it to my paper journal.  That needed to be changed.  So we took care of it.  Seamlessly add as many pictures or videos as you want... for those moments when words just don't cut it!  Take a gander:



3 - Not Just Digital.  Remember how I just said "a paper journal is cool"?  They certainly are - to look at!  But hauling one around, with all it's limitations, isn't so cool.  We got you covered here as well and made it as easy as pie to print your Journos directly from the app.  We lay them out and let you alter and edit to your liking (fonts, colors, pics, placement, etc).  Then just print!  It's the best of both worlds and only Journo does it.  Check out the beautiful finished product here:






4 - Collaborate!  Never before has there been a way for two people to contribute to the same journal.  We're pretty jacked up about this.  You and the hubby want to journal about all the funny things your kid is doing?  No problem.  Heading out on a road trip with a pal and want to collaborate on the same journo to maximize the memories?  No problem.  The options are endless.  Here's how it works:



5 - Tailored Journos.  We've customized a few different journos to suit your needs: a daily gratitude journo, project journo and travel journo.  All of which have a few different features that fit nicely within that theme.  Use one, use them all.  Unlimited journos with your subscription.  Take a look:



BONUS 6, 7, 8... - Safe, Secure, Cross-Device, Etc.  Your privacy is priority numero uno, so no worries there because your journos are locked up tight and only available to you (on any of your devices you're logged in to).














Thanks to all our amazing early adopters, we've hit our initial goal.  But let's not stop now!
We're unlocking an Android version of Journo for just $10,800!  Here's the details:

ALL perks below stay the same, but use the app on your Android device instead.
Will work on Android tablets too!
Unlike our August iOS launch, we don't expect to have the Android version ready until fall (but we'll make sure it's worth the wait!).

Welcome aboard Android people.  We're psyched to have you, and can't wait to hear about the awesome life stories you write with Journo!
















Make some money telling your friends about Journo!




We've been making apps for over five years.  We are a small and dedicated team out to make stuff that matters.  Unlike the big guns - the large software companies - we don't have floors on floors on floors of developers and venture capital in the bank.  What we do have, though, we believe is much more important.  We have a strong and growing community of iPhone & iPad users who believe in the work we're doing and love the stuff we make for them.
Our apps have been used over 40 million times, but none of them can hold a candle to the difficulty of creating Journo.  At this point we have an early alpha version, which means we're about 75% there, and it's the last 25% that's most challenging.  BUT it's not only this last bit that we need your help with...
More than just development, we need your help in changing lives.  Maybe that's yours, or maybe that's someone you think might need Journo.  We believe that Journo tracks and encourages users to live a more fulfilling life and we want as many people as possible to get involved and get living the life that is true to them.
That's why our perks are so extremely low priced for what you get... we want as many users as possible to benefit from this and through IndieGoGo, we can accomplish this together.




We're asking for $7,800, which will pay for:


In addition, there might be a few additional development costs and unexpected costs, so we'd love a little padding on our budget.





While most IndieGoGo campaigns launch with a concept or prototype, we feel that most of the risk in our project has already been cut by having moved far beyond that stage to an alpha version of Journo for iOS iPhones & iPads, by our incredible and deeply experienced team.
This isn't our first rodeo.  We've successfully launched over 40 applications for The App Store.  We've built the #1 Entertainment app in the United States, as well as a few other top Apple Picks.  Our apps have been used over 40 million times and we're happy to say that none of which are as sweet as this one!  So this is the only project we are running, and has the undivided attention of our team.
Launch Timing: With any software development, there are potential risks in unforeseen variables causing delays in launch. While this is always a possibility, we don't expect this to play a significant role given the stage we're at. We have already made a tremendously detailed effort to create a streamlined and extremely reliable application. 
We feel confident that we could launch Journo for Apple devices shortly after the conclusion of our IndieGoGo campaign. 
We will keep our backers up to date with our progress and let you know if we encounter any setbacks.



If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can really help us make this project a reality:

Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.
Give us feedback.  We LOVE feedback because we constantly strive to improve for our amazing users.  So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!

Thank you for your support! 




We couldn't have made Journo this amazing without the crucial integration with these two amazing companies:

Milk Books:
We scoured the planet for the best print shop for your Journos and no one could compete with these guys.  Your custom maps and printed Journos are in the best hands and are printed on the highest quality fabrics and paper available.  You'll be more than excited when you crack open this box from the mailman!




1) Is the app available for Android devices?

    
Not yet.  But if we meet our initial goal, then we're off to the races for the Android Stretch Goal!  We hit that, and we'll go Android!
2) Is there a data limit?  A limit on the amount of pics & videos I can upload?
Nope!  The reason we have subscriptions is to cover all of our server costs, which can add up when users add lots of content.  But that's what we're here for!  Add everything you can!  We'll NEVER limit you on this.
3) How are you different from the other journaling apps out there?
Oh wow, glad you asked this because we are VERY different from what else is available.  For one thing, we allow you to share your journos with friends or family.  This way you can collaborate on the memories!  We also have tailored journos - you know, different folks different strokes.  How about our mapping feature?  Ever seen that before?  We didn't think so and we worked extremely hard to make this work perfectly and LOOK amazing too (we've even give you multiple design options!).  Then there is the printing aspect too.  We've made it easy to fill up your journos, and then we've given you the option to print them too.  Want a gorgeous coffee table book from that last adventure?  No problem.  The list goes on and on (with more to come!).
4) Could I ever lose my data?  How do I know it's safe and sound?
No worries here because all of your data is totally encrypted on our servers and backed up to a secure cloud.  It's yours forever, and no one but you can access it.
5) Is there a page limit for printing my Journo?
We had to cap the page at 30 pages for the campaign, but don't worry because additional pages are inexpensive and you can easily add them at the time of printing.

story:
Get Bridger's Board Back!

All contributions, no matter the size, help our family to get my little brother back to doing what he is passionate about. 

My name is Mack, yes, like macaronie and cheese--I'm Bridger's big brother. I've watched Bridger grow and mature in the past years through some of the hardest of times we've been through together. In that time, Bridger has discovered a source of concentration and passion that has rounded and utilized his personality and talents. Skateboarding. If you know Bridger, you know that he turns heads at local skate parks, and stops people mid-walk to watch his ability to land incredible tricks.

  • Nearly a week ago, my mother called me and said that his skateboard was run over by a passing car. Bridger was devastated. She asked how my silblings and I could come together to raise enough money to buy him a new board, and I thought that I would reach out to the people who know and love Bridger: YOU! His friends and loved ones.
  • The goal we're aiming for is $100. Together, my siblings and I will add contributions to the site as well--Any amount that YOU are willing to pitch in is more than helpful, it's downright kindhearted and above-and-beyond of you. We could never express how thankful we are.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are the details:

  • The $100 raised is accumulated into a paypal account through this website. When the 10 day fundraiser for this project ends, the funds are released to our family at which time we'll create a video of us buying the new board, thanking all of you incredible contributors!

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Share the link to this family project with everyone who knows Bridger!

THANK YOU ALL FOR TAKING TIME TO READ!

story:
Help send Brady and Amanda to explore Kauai for their honeymoon!

As you may have heard, we're tying the knot! We figured that in lieu of traditional gifts, we would love financial help with our honeymoon trip to Kauai. Some of the wonderful things you'd be helping us go and explore:
  • A snorkeling/sailing/BBQ adventure with Captain Andy's Charter service,
  • Camping on Anini Beach
  • A trip to the National Botanical Garden
  • Road Tripping around Waimea Canyon
  • Luau! Big fruity drinks! Hula Shows!
Whether it's $10 or $100, we would greatly appreciate any donations. Thank you from the soon-to-be newlyweds!

story:
Relax, where you've never thought it was possible!

Bip is so handy and comfortable that leaving it home will feel like being without an umbrella during a rainy day. 

 

 

 

Outdoor gear usually comes with sector-specific styles & colors that don't fit well in other environments, but Bip's minimal aesthetics make it a true Jack of all trades: public events and office hours are no threat for this clean looking revolutionary seat!     

Given that, we've also created a total of 6 style choices, so that it won't only look cool everywhere you go, but it will also match your own style &  personality!

 

 

Most foldable seat either weigh a lot or are too small and uncomfortable to have a concrete advantage over sitting on the ground or standing up. 

Bip is a true lightness champ: in fact, weighs less than any other seat with 2+foots in existence  

When it's opened, is much more comfortable than any other seat or stool, Its incredibly adaptable posture will amaze you!

 

Flexibility is the Key  

Bip's patented design allows it to be folded quickly and carried easily, either inside his color matching pouch with the included carrying strap or in any kind of bag, backpack or suitcase; thanks to the pouch's ring, it's also possible to attach Bip to your belt (using a carabiner) or to any other mounting point.

 

Sitting for long times in the same position impedes the flow of blood that is needed to bring nutrients to the muscles and to carry away the waste products of muscle metabolism.

 

 
With its never-seen-before bipod-like structure, Bip will enable you (when you want) to swing stably: while being a lot of fun, this means also you won't experience any of the hassles related to static postures and your muscles will be constantly active without you even noticing.

 

This section is pretty self-explanatory, as we think every product should be!

 

Being so light, you might think Bip wouldn't be able to withstand a big weight, but thanks to our innovative technology, Atom™, our seat is Incredibly Tough and resistant.

 

 

We've tested Bip with more than 135 kg ( 300 lb) and it hasn't given up once. 

This incredible sturdiness was also achieved thanks to the special materials we've searched and tested for the last 3 years :

We've developed Atom™ starting from the principle of “tensional integrity” enunciated by genius American architect R. Buckminster Fuller, it consists in the elimination of almost all the mechanical bending, twisting and cutting stresses. The components of the structure are solely stimulated in traction (ribbons and bolsters made of resilient polyester) and a small number of components (mainly tubular aluminum rods) are stimulated only during the compression stage. Many of our apparatus are real-world records in weight, minimal encumbrance and strength.

 

A PERFECT BALANCE OF FORCES: Trough a state-of-the-art system of tensions and compressions we've accomplished incredible structures that are not only the lightest in the market but have also the strongest resistance to drops and mechanic stress.

Di-lite is based the northern part of Tuscany, this area is a hiker’s paradise: mountain paths, peaks, seashores, and a good climate... so, naturally, we love experiencing nature

 

 

Over the years outdoor activities have gifted us with a lot of beautiful memories but far less beautiful are the ones related to carrying gear around: In the summer of 2014, I went camping with a bunch of friends and, being the one in charge of chairs and tents, I carried them all along the path to the camping zone: The weight was too much and as I got to the campsite I realized I strained my back, and for the following week, I've been completely unable to move.     

It was then that, just for fun, I began to think of a way to improve portable furniture; joining forces with my father Paolo, longtime designer and geometry enthusiast, we started taking it seriously; in the following 3 years we developed a revolutionary technology and, as the team has gained new essential members, we're now finally ready to bring our first incredible invention to production.  

Alessandro.

Our team

 

 

ALREADY A SUCCESS!

 

Our First crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter (November 2018)  has enabled to create the production chain for Bip and we're currently producing our first batch (which we expect to ship to our First backers before the start of May 2019).

story:
70mai A800 is an in-car DVR that delivers day-and-night cinema-quality (up to 4k resolution) images in dual vision. It’s equipped with the leading ADAS (Advanced Driving Assistant System) tech that boosts your driving safety. When the vehicle is parked, the parking mode will monitor the car’s surroundings and automatically start recording if any collision is detected. Recordings are stored locally and can be viewed in-app for on-site download and instant sharing.

 

Shipping Starts

Note: If you want to add the hardware kit or another set of A800 to your perk, please check the add-on list after you choose the perk.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Also, you can check our latest review videos from YouTube:

 

 

Up to 4K Resolution with 140°FOV

Built around a powerful Sony IMX 415 CMOS image sensor, the A800 dash cam records 4K UHD videos with a wide-angle 140° FOV. Combined the optional rear cam*, every important detail in the front or rear of the vehicle can be recorded clearly to provide irrefutable video evidence or capture the landscape along your journey with cinema-quality video.

*In front-vision recording mode, the max resolution is 3840*2160. In dual-vision recording mode, the max resolution for front and rear view will be 2560*1600 and 1920*1080 respectively.

Since we have hit the 600K goal, our second stretch goal is unlocked - A800 front dash cam's resolution in dual-vision is upgraded to 4K now! For details, please check our updates.

 

Super Night Vision with 3D DNR

The A800 achieves stunning video and vivid, clear images even in low-light conditions using a 3D DNR (Dynamic Noise Reduction) tech, F/1.8 aperture lens and a smart algorithm that significantly reduces image noise and automatically adjusts the exposure balance. The result is enhanced night vision with greater details.

 

3-inch HD Display Screen & One-button Switch

View your car’s surroundings easily on A800’s 3” high definition screen. With a simple press, you can easily switch between the front and the rear views.

 

 

The A800 is more than just a reliable dash cam. When you start the car, A800 automatically begins recording and enables the ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance System) that will assist you while driving with lane-departure and forward collision warnings that help you avoid accidents.

 

Lane-departure Warning (LDW) System

The Lane Departure Warning (LDW) system uses the A800 camera to monitor the lane markings to make sure the car remains safely in the lane of travel. In case you are distracted and begin to drift, the LDW system uses and audio alarm to warn you, for a safe driving every day!

 

Forward-collision Warning (FCW) System

A800 also includes an advanced Forward-collision Warning system that automatically monitors the car driving in front of you. If the vehicles get too close, too quickly, for instance in the case of a sudden stop by the leading car, A800 will warn you with an audible alarm. This system is especially useful in the stop-and-go traffic during busy commute times.  

 

 

With A800 4k dash cam, the protection doesn’t stop when you leave your car. After parking, the Parking Mode* is automatically activated. Using a 3-axis gravity sensor, A800 can detect any hit-and-run collision and immediately begin recording to capture valuable video evidence.

*For this feature, we highly recommend you install the A800 using the optional 70mai hardware kit. This allows connection to the car’s fused power source to ensure power during long-recording sessions when the car is parked.

When you return to the car after a Parking Mode incident, A800 will remind you to check the event recordings in-app.

 

 

A800 also acts as an accurate trip computer, storing data that includes mileage, range, average speed, max speed, duration and more that can be viewed conveniently in-app. It’s great for long trips and to record the exact location of an accident if one should occur.

 

 

The A800 records video on a loop and stores it locally on a Micro SD memory card (up to 128GB supported) while driving. This ensures that in the event of an accident, the video evidence will be captured and then safely secured from overwriting. To check video at any time, simply open the App to playback or download the videos free of charge.

 

 

No network is necessary to connect your smartphone with A800. It seamlessly connects using its own Wi-Fi for full instant access to stored videos. The dash cam also acts as a digital camera, controlled with your phone to capture any picture or view along your route. Share memories of every special road trip fast and easy online!

 

 

 

 

Installation is super easy. Because it requires no special wiring, the A800 can be installed in minutes. Simply attach to windscreen, connect to power at the vehicles 12v power point, download the 70mai app and connect with your smartphone using built-in Wi-Fi. Now your car is protected by an ever vigilant 24/7 guard!

 

 

 

 

 

Note: If you want to add the hardware kit to your perk, please check the add-on list after you choose your perk.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

70mai is a team of innovators focused on intelligent in-car electronics that add convenience to travel and safety to the driving experience. Our mission is to connect every vehicle to the Internet and connect you to the future. We have a successful track record with crowdfunding and legacy of high quality products that make us a leader in the industry. Together, we bring drivers, cars and the world together using the connectivity of the Internet.

 

 

With our previous experience with crowdfunding and product design, we know what it takes to deliver a quality product on time and above expectations. Our #1 priority is to fully satisfy the needs of our backers. We have long-term relationships with suppliers and excellent manufacturing partners, making us confident in our production schedule for the A800. However, we understand that challenges often occur with shipping and logistics. If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. Thank you for your support!

In dual-vision recording mode, the max resolution for front and rear view will be 2560*1600 and 1920*1080 respectively.Since we have hit the 600K goal, our second stretch goal is unlocked - A800 front dash cam's resolution in dual-vision is upgraded to 4K now! For details, please check our updates. Super Night Vision with 3D DNRThe A800 achieves stunning video and vivid, clear images even in low-light conditions using a 3D DNR (Dynamic Noise Reduction) tech, F/1.8 aperture lens and a smart algorithm that significantly reduces image noise and automatically adjusts the exposure balance. The result is enhanced night vision with greater details. 3-inch HD Display Screen & One-button SwitchView your car’s surroundings easily on A800’s 3” high definition screen. With a simple press, you can easily switch between the front and the rear views.  The A800 is more than just a reliable dash cam. When you start the car, A800 automatically begins recording and enables the ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance System) that will assist you while driving with lane-departure and forward collision warnings that help you avoid accidents. Lane-departure Warning (LDW) SystemThe Lane Departure Warning (LDW) system uses the A800 camera to monitor the lane markings to make sure the car remains safely in the lane of travel. In case you are distracted and begin to drift, the LDW system uses and audio alarm to warn you, for a safe driving every day! Forward-collision Warning (FCW) SystemA800 also includes an advanced Forward-collision Warning system that automatically monitors the car driving in front of you. If the vehicles get too close, too quickly, for instance in the case of a sudden stop by the leading car, A800 will warn you with an audible alarm. This system is especially useful in the stop-and-go traffic during busy commute times.    With A800 4k dash cam, the protection doesn’t stop when you leave your car. After parking, the Parking Mode* is automatically activated. Using a 3-axis gravity sensor, A800 can detect any hit-and-run collision and immediately begin recording to capture valuable video evidence.*For this feature, we highly recommend you install the A800 using the optional 70mai hardware kit. This allows connection to the car’s fused power source to ensure power during long-recording sessions when the car is parked.When you return to the car after a Parking Mode incident, A800 will remind you to check the event recordings in-app.  A800 also acts as an accurate trip computer, storing data that includes mileage, range, average speed, max speed, duration and more that can be viewed conveniently in-app. It’s great for long trips and to record the exact location of an accident if one should occur.  The A800 records video on a loop and stores it locally on a Micro SD memory card (up to 128GB supported) while driving. This ensures that in the event of an accident, the video evidence will be captured and then safely secured from overwriting. To check video at any time, simply open the App to playback or download the videos free of charge.  No network is necessary to connect your smartphone with A800. It seamlessly connects using its own Wi-Fi for full instant access to stored videos. The dash cam also acts as a digital camera, controlled with your phone to capture any picture or view along your route. Share memories of every special road trip fast and easy online!    Installation is super easy. Because it requires no special wiring, the A800 can be installed in minutes. Simply attach to windscreen, connect to power at the vehicles 12v power point, download the 70mai app and connect with your smartphone using built-in Wi-Fi. Now your car is protected by an ever vigilant 24/7 guard!     Note: If you want to add the hardware kit to your perk, please check the add-on list after you choose your perk.            70mai is a team of innovators focused on intelligent in-car electronics that add convenience to travel and safety to the driving experience. Our mission is to connect every vehicle to the Internet and connect you to the future. We have a successful track record with crowdfunding and legacy of high quality products that make us a leader in the industry. Together, we bring drivers, cars and the world together using the connectivity of the Internet.  With our previous experience with crowdfunding and product design, we know what it takes to deliver a quality product on time and above expectations. Our #1 priority is to fully satisfy the needs of our backers. We have long-term relationships with suppliers and excellent manufacturing partners, making us confident in our production schedule for the A800. However, we understand that challenges often occur with shipping and logistics. If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. Thank you for your support!

story:
Getting Kids Outside & Observing

Kids outside, waking their sense of wonder, and engaging with the natural world around them.  This common passion has brought together three organizations, two continents, and loads of birds!

Warblr is a UK-based social enterprise that is harnessing the power of machine learning to  recognize bird calls using a mobile app (kinda like Shazam).  The app also captures users' recordings and the bird location data for scientific use - which is freely made available to research and conservation organizations.

The Atlanta Audubon Society is a thriving, Georgia-based, bird-focused organization that combines serious conservation, education, advocacy with activities that build community and foster the joy of birding.

For over 25 years, the Captain Planet Foundation has funded and scaled projects around the world that engage and empower kids to be active change-makers for the planet and their local communities.

We know that technology can be used in powerful and fun ways to capture the imagination of our 'digital native' kids, to get them outside, listening, and engaging. Warblr is one of those exciting technologies that can get kids hooked on birds and nature!

We want to make Warblr available in the US (beginning with Georgia) in a kid-friendly app, and provide it FREE to schools with lesson plans and bird habitat projects. Join us in making this possible!

What Makes Warblr Special

Warblr has been called the "Shazam for bird calls" referring to the music recognition app that will tell you what song is playing based on a few seconds of audio capture. In concept, this comparison is right, but in reality, Warblr needs to be much 'smarter'.

Bird songs, unlike recorded music, are living sounds with complex variations of speeds and cadences. Just like the human ear, an accurate bird call recognition technology would need to listen and learn from experience, while taking location and migratory behaviors into account. With that in mind, Warblr is built using deep machine learning technology that allows the system to 'learn' with each recording and refine its ability to differentiate and more accurately identify bird calls.

Dr. Dan Stowell of Queen Mary University of London is the primary developer of Warblr, which has been 'trained' to differentiate and identify the songs of bird species in the UK with high levels of accuracy. He tested the technology's ability to 'learn' other regional species in Brazil, where it registered correct species with 95% accuracy. It's pretty impressive stuff and has been featured in news outlets around the world.

Contributing to Science

Not only is Warblr helping to crack the code of bird calls and linguistics more generally, it's also contributing to data collection about bird distribution and migration. Each time the app is used to identify a bird, in-the-app geo-tracking is used to map which species are being identified when and where. These data are publicly available, allowing zoologists and ecologists to monitor species growth and decline, patterns of migration, and ultimately to aid conservation.

Warblr in the US

The next big test for Team Warblr is to 'teach' it species of North America, region by region, starting in Georgia. Like trees, flowers, fish, etc., certain bird species are native to particular regions, but two factors make birds especially tricky to identify - 1) many migrate, and 2) they develop regional 'accents'.  North America is a huge land mass with several hundreds of bird species that represent many many more bird calls. Through the Georgia pilot, we will learn more about how bird calls vary region to region, and design a scaling plan to bring the app to all states pretty quickly.

Join Warblr - Team Georgia

We want to invite you to become part of the team that brings Warblr to the US. As part of this team, you'll be part of an exclusive group bringing this innovative technology to the US, training it to learn and understand bird calls of North America, and making it available free to schools and students.

You'll receive updates from the partners and developers, and exclusive opportunities to contribute to its development and use. When Warblr is available across the continent, and when you see excited kids outside using the app to record and identify birds, you'll be able to say you were part of the team that made that possible!

If you live in Georgia (and surrounding states in Phase II), you'll be part of a team of official testers helping the system to improve its recognition of bird species in the region. If you don't live in Georgia, we still want you on Team Warblr because it's coming to a state near you soon!

Cost & Risks

Bringing Warblr to North America (starting in Georgia), and making it available free to classrooms requires an initial $16,000 initial investment. This covers the cost of replicating the database, server set-up and maintenance, app design and development, and the content necessary to 'teach' the system about bird species native to Georgia.

We will build two versions of the smartphone application – a regular version for download ($4.99), and a student version. The student version will be made available to schools free of charge, in conjunction with activities and lessons developed by Atlanta Audubon Society and Captain Planet Foundation.

In some ways, Warblr remains an experiment. Using deep machine technology to accurately identify bird calls across a region as large as North America is the ideal outcome of several factors – understanding of regional variability of calls, availability of appropriate data, sufficient 'training' of the system, ability to overcome challenges such as mimicry of calls (by birds and humans!) The rate and cost of scaling will depend on what we find in pilot testing in Georgia, but we are confident that we have the right team in place to overcome any challenges we encounter. If we exceed our goal, funds will go into the next stage of development so we can make the app available to a broader geographic region.

Help Us Get the Word Out!

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family!
  • Check back for updates on the campaign and app development
  • Follow Warblr, Captain Planet Foundation, and Atlanta Audubon Society on Facebook

story:
THE FLAME BUDDY

World's first lighter windshield!

Ever have trouble using your lighter in windy conditions?

Our Product - The FLAME BUDDY

The world's first 360 degree lighter windshield. Allows you to use your standard BIC lighter in windy conditions.

Can be used virtually anywhere!

Have you ever had trouble using your lighter in windy conditions? Such as at the beach, out camping, riding in the car, at a concert, on a ski lift, or simply outside on a windy day. The FLAME BUDDY will save you much time and frustration. The days of trying to shield the wind with your hands or getting your buddies to huddle around you are over!  

CONCERT APPLICATION:

In the Past:

The Future With FLAME BUDDY

Not only does the FLAME BUDDY block the wind, but is an awesome concert accessory. It will come in a variety of colors, and illuminate in the dark much like a glow-stick. With thousands of people in the crowd, Imagine all the beautiful colors!! Eventually we will have the ability to customize each Flame Buddy with its own unique pattern or image to be illuminated! That will be an amazing sight at a concert or music festival. 

HOW IT WORKS:

The FLAME BUDDY snaps onto a standard BIC lighter using the preexisting indentations found on the sides of every BIC.

Easily removes by pushing the back of the clip with your thumb.

How it was Developed:

After many different prototypes and countless hours testing our invention we designed a functional model. The FLAME BUDDY was designed with a 360 Degree tube, that has two opposing vents facing in opposite directions.

We designed the vents with a few things in mind. Not only do they allow just enough wind inside the tube for combustion, but the wind enters the tube in such a way that it does not extinguish the flame.

The Vents are designed in such a way that it creates a VORTEX!!

The Fire rages instead of being blown out by the wind.

The flame buddy uses the once seen as "harmful" wind, and transforms it to the flames benefit, allowing the fire to rage instead of being extinguished. Instead of developing something that just blocks the wind, we created a product that uses the wind to the flames advantage.

The standard BIC lighter goes out in wind speeds ranging from 1-2 miles per hour. However, when used with the FLAME BUDDY, we have been able to use our lighter in wind speeds exceeding 10 miles per hour…Making our product over 500% more effective!!

Our Product is made to last, so enjoy it with your current lighter and many lighters to come!

REWARDS: For everyone contributing to our Indiegogo campaign and making our dream a reality, we want to thank you by giving you lower prices than we are expecting to retail. 

We hope you enjoy the Flame Buddy!

UP TO THIS POINT:

We have been in the design and prototype phase and have been 3D printing them out of ABS plastic. After repeated tests, we created a functional model and are now at the next phase. 

INJECTION MOLD : This will allow us to make the FLAME BUDDY with a translucent heat resistant plastic which will maintain its structural integrity. Using an injection mold will also allow us to create them cheaper and at a much faster rate than a 3D printer. 

Hey Everyone! We are here to raise awareness about FLAME BUDDY, as well as crowd fund to allow our vision to come to life. Your donation will directly contribute to pay for an injection mold cavity, creating more Flame Buddies for people to enjoy.

**Design and Utility Patent      Pending**


We are raising funds to pay for an injection mold cavity that will allow us to make Flame Buddies. As well as raise awareness about our product!


TIMELINE:

  • INDIEGOGO LAUNCH - DECEMBER 2015
  • INJECTION MOLD PURCHASE - DECEMBER 2015
  • INJECTION MOLD COMPLETE/RECEIVE SAMPLES - JANUARY 2016
  • PLACE ORDER FOR INDIEGOGO BACKERS - FEBRUARY 2016
  • RECEIVE FLAME BUDDY PRE-ORDERS - FEBRUARY/MARCH 2016 

We do not encourage or promote smoking.

story:
THE TOUR:

Team MIDS is a group of east coast skaters and we're loading up the #midsvan heading west to skate as many mountain roads and skateparks as humanly possible. We're kicking off the tour at the Push Culture Family Picnic in Burke, Vermont and then rolling south through the Appalachians and Smokie mountains toward Colorado. After a brief stint in the Rockies we will then be headed towards to pacific coast to skate some of the best coastal roads California has to offer.

We will then head north up the Pacific Coast Highway to Goldendale, Washington host of the Maryhill Festival of Speed for our second event stop of the tour. After the Maryhill FOS we will then be heading back up the coast towards Whistler, BC for the Whistler Longboard Festival stopping at the Hood River skate park, Portland, Seattle and Vancouver on our way north. Then its a long drive home back to Boston, MA with a few stops along the way and a visit to Skatopia in Ohio.

THE MEDIA:

In conjunction with the trip we will be producing our own mixed media barrage to give followers an intimate and direct look into the life of a skateboarder, more specifically, the Midsvan on the road.

We will be:

  • Producing videos that will be posted on the MIDS youtube channel

  • Writing frequent blog posts by van mates on the MIDS website

  • Posting photos from the trip on the MIDS website

  • Writing a full article in Concrete Wave Magazine by Dan Herzog.

  • Making a DVD fully documenting the trip.

  • Make sure to follow MIDS on instagram for daily shenanigans.

**All links can be found at the bottom of the campaign page.**

THE CREW:

Master Gunner - Dan Herzog

First Mate - Mac Holmes

Carpenter - Stefan Kaiter-Snyder

Skipper - Peter Lafreniere

Quartermaster - Kai Salam

Cabin boy - Nick Sharek

Powder Monkey - Norman Plante

Navigator - Stephan Vaast

**Should we exceed our funding goal we hope to add a 2nd vehicle to the tour and some special guests**

MIDSVAN STATUS:

The ole Midsvan ain’t doing too hot. After around $4,000 of repairs, I realized $500 vans aren’t the best investments. But the van must live on, and with your help it will, and hopefully the midsboys won’t die in their second cross-country voyage.  

Exhibit A:  The Frame

New England isn’t very kind to cars, and Mother Gaia has fully unleashed her wrath on the van.  As you can see, the van got a couple holes in its frame; hopefully we can raise enough money to have the frame reinforced or repaired.


Exhibit B:  The Leaf Spring Mount

The Leaf Springs are the back of the van’s suspension. Similar to the frame, its got a little rust on it and one of the mounting brackets. Right now the weight of the van and that little bolt is keeping the van from breaking when it goes over bumps (we’re planning on hitting and running over as many elks as we can to avenge Nate Ryan For reference:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y14FzUXgl3c). Repairing the frame, the leaf spring, and its connection to the van is imperative to being able to take this trip. While we are all about the YOLO lifestyle, all that rust is pretty sketchy.

What We Need

We're raising funds to repair and outfit the Midsvan for an extended road trip which would include:

  • Repairing the frame and leaf spring

  • Gas/Van upkeep on the road

  • 4G or Satellite Internet for the van and live broadcast our adventures where available.

  • Sleeping arrangements (Camping equipment and the occasional seedy motel)

  • “Safety” Precautions and Equipment

  • Video equipment to help document the trip

THE PERKS:

To help fund this trip we are offering a plethora of incentives ranging from MIDS apparel to custom decks.
All perks will be special edition products only available through the indiegogo campaign.

10$ Sticker pack

15$ Patch and sticker pack

25$ Unique printed photo from the trip, to redeem after the trip is completed.  

25$ Full length DVD of the trip

40$ Shirt, patch and stickers swag pack

50$ Shirt, stickers + post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.

75$ Special edition MIDS double kick deck

100$ Swag pack 1: MIDS DK+ shirt, stickers and patch

160$ Custom MIDS DH deck

185$ Swag pack 2: MIDS DH deck + shirt, stickers and patch

250$ Super swag pack: Both MIDS decks, shirt, stickers and patch + post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.

500$ We will put you name or something of choice on the van, you supply decal or stencil + shirt, stickers, patch and post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.

500$ Producer rights (early edit sneak peeks and input, feedback appreciated) and all previously aforementioned incentives.

3000$ GET IN THE VAN! (self explanatory)

---Shots of the perks will be available in the campaign updates---

Other Ways To Get Involved

We would be interested in sponsorship offers for the following or similar:

  • Clothes

  • Food/snacks

  • Malted beverages

  • Showers and a place to stay for the night

Feel free to contact us for further information at teammidz@gmail.com

THE PERKS:To help fund this trip we are offering a plethora of incentives ranging from MIDS apparel to custom decks.All perks will be special edition products only available through the indiegogo campaign.10$ Sticker pack15$ Patch and sticker pack25$ Unique printed photo from the trip, to redeem after the trip is completed.  25$ Full length DVD of the trip40$ Shirt, patch and stickers swag pack50$ Shirt, stickers + post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.75$ Special edition MIDS double kick deck100$ Swag pack 1: MIDS DK+ shirt, stickers and patch160$ Custom MIDS DH deck185$ Swag pack 2: MIDS DH deck + shirt, stickers and patch250$ Super swag pack: Both MIDS decks, shirt, stickers and patch + post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.500$ We will put you name or something of choice on the van, you supply decal or stencil + shirt, stickers, patch and post cards from every major stop with some loving words from the whole team.500$ Producer rights (early edit sneak peeks and input, feedback appreciated) and all previously aforementioned incentives.3000$ GET IN THE VAN! (self explanatory)---Shots of the perks will be available in the campaign updates---Other Ways To Get InvolvedWe would be interested in sponsorship offers for the following or similar:
Clothes
Food/snacks
Malted beverages
Showers and a place to stay for the night
Feel free to contact us for further information at teammidz@gmail.com

story:
See last year's results here!

The Project.

We started this project last year with the intention of creating the most comprehensive infrared photo series (see video) of the US natural wonders that the world has ever seen.  With your help and a research grant from our University, we set out to study four national parks: Glacier, Yellowstone, Grand Tetons, and the Badlands.  We returned home with bright eyes, inquisitive minds, a renewed spirit for adventure, and a great sense of pride and accomplishment for some truly astounding results!


Since then, the photos were on display at the University of Maryland, Baltimore County's Annual Undergraduate Research and Creative Achievement Day and a 30-page academic research article was submitted for publication.  

This year, we don't have the grant to lean on, but we'll be pushing forward with the project!  This project act as research to satisfy Mark's last six academic credits in order to secure his degree.  We'll add six more destinations to the list that'll surely add breadth to the project: Grand Canyon, Yosemite, Redwoods, Olympic, Banff, and Waterton Lakes.  We'll also be revisiting Glacier and Yellowstone for further study.  


(This year's map)

This journey will be far from a vacation.  Long hikes through dangerous terrain with loads of equipment, coupled with the natural threats of wildlife, weather, and, let's face it, human error, provide opportunity for a grueling experience.  If we learned anything from last year, it's that the results are more than worth it!  

The Money.

Unfortunately for our wallets, neither of us drives a Prius.  This journey will take us 8,000 miles across the US and Canada, so gas will be a huge expense (almost $1,000 alone!)  We're cutting corners everywhere we can to make sure we can get the best bang for our, and your buck.  That includes the everyday luxuries like sleep.  Every bit of the goal will go toward affording camping fees, and paying the locals to sleep in their bathtubs throughout the 21 day journey.  We were very fortunate to meet quite a few kind host families last year, and we want to meet you too!

Any contributions made after the goal has been met will go toward enhancing the experience.  Some ideas we've had so far are adding destinations or spending longer at each destination!


The Reward System.

We're offering some great rewards for everyone involved, and this year, we're handing over the power to you!  We've created a new system that allows you to choose your own package of rewards.  You know best what size and quantity will work as beautiful wall art in your home or personal collection, and we want you to have everything that you want!  

This year, we are using a token reward system.  Each level of reward affords the contributor- you!- a certain amount of tokens.  Token amounts can be compounded and added up to make sure you get the perfect package for you!  Once you have your tokens, you may choose to cash them in on whichever combination of rewards you'd like!  When the project is complete, we will allow you special access to the image gallery, so you can choose exactly which images you love.

All images will be professionally printed on 100% acid free archival paper with pigment-based inks.

We are also offering your image to be electronically infused directly onto metal.  Printing on metal provides an incredibly durable image that, like archival paper prints, will never fade.  Metal prints provide a depth of color to mimic life with a brilliance unique to the medium.  Metal prints will come with pre-installed wall mounts and will not require any framing!  These prints are 100% weather, water, spill, etc proof and really are fantastic.  

How You Can Help.

1. Contribute to the project by choosing one of the rewards on the right!

2. Like, follow, and share our social media pages:

#projectinfrascape

  •   https://.facebook.com/projectinfrascape

  •   https://instagram.com/projectinfrascape/

  •   https://twitter.com/MWPProductions

3. We are still looking for places to stay for nights along our trail. If you think you or someone you know has an extra spot we could pitch a tent or share a bed with Fido for a night, please let us know!

The Artists.

We are Sarah and Mark.  We're Baltimore-based photographers, adventure-seekers, and best friends.  We both graduated from university with our Bachelors of Fine Arts with a concentration in photography and have made it our mission to do, see, and learn all that we can.  

To see more of Mark's work, please visit his website, blog, and facebook page.

story:
What's Happening in Honduras? 

Jason and Robin Densberger will be sharing the Gospel through Biblical teachings and their personal experiences in Honduras during July 14-26, 2014. Jason is scheduled to speak at Christo Rey High School, the local Chamber of Commerce, the Naco Orphanage, the Technological University of Honduras, local churches, and/or in the community 2-4 times on most days. In addition, Jason will be teaching and inspiring church planters to advance the Kingdom of God in their local cities. Robin will be speaking at a Women's Conference to teach Biblical truths to women. Moreover, Robin will speak at a faith based bilingual school to encourage and inspire administrators and teachers to influence children in the ways of Jesus. Furthermore, Jason and Robin will be encouraging married couples with the hope of Jesus through the power of their testimony at a marriage conference. 

Read more on Jason's personal excitements about the trip HERE.

Manuel Sheran is the Honduras 2014 Campaign Manager and North Ridge Church representative in Honduras that has set up all ministry engagements. Manuel is a former politician and current businessman in Honduras. Manuel Sheran and Jason Densberger will also be planning and strategizing for future ministry initiatives in Honduras during the trip. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need financial support for travel expenses, materials, and gifts.
  • Contribute $100 or more: receive a FREE North Ridge Church T-shirt.
  • Contribute $200 or more: receive a FREE T-shirt and invitation to an exclusive luncheon where Jason and Robin will share about their experiences in Honduras.
  • Even if we do not reach our goal, we still receive the funds we have raised. 

The Impact

Your contribution can make a difference!

  • This project is valuable to those who will make decisions to follow Christ, to church planting leaders that will undergo new church starts in Honduras, to local educators that need Biblical inspiration, and to the community of San Pedro Sula which is the murder capital of the world because of drug infestation. 
  • Jason and Robin have initiated ministry momentum at their local church plant in Apopka, FL with 24 people making decisions to follow Jesus and 4 people baptized since March 23, 2014 when they launched North Ridge Church and intend to take the same energy and momentum to Honduras. 
  • Honduras needs the hope of Jesus and you can be a "hope sender" by contributing financially. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute financially. If this is you, the good news is that you can still help!

  • You can share this with your friends who you think have a heart for global missions and have the capacity to give. (Use the Indiegogo share tools)
  • You can pray! We believe in the power of prayer and hope that you will pray that our trip will have an effective influence on many people in Honduras.

story:
Reserve your stay at this magical property

Be the first to contribute to help create a perfectly magical experience

 

Your Getaway Includes:

  • Escape from cell and internet service

  • Lodging in a luxury, private sleep-pod

  • 10 locally sourced meals over 4 days

  • Custom menus designed by your personal chef

  • Unlimited wine, beer, and kombucha on tap

  • Hammocks and hot tub

  • Massages and facials *by request

  • Fully stocked art and music studio

  • Curated outdoor and immersive experiences

  • 5 private acres to explore

  • 3 miles to the stunning CA coast

  • 20 beaches within 20 miles

  • Access to 5 states parks within 15 minutes

All of this and more for $250/night per person


 

What does a weekend at Navarro Ridge Retreat look like?

Day 1: “Wait, Where Are We?”

  • Arrive mid afternoon (3pm) to gourmet cheese and charcuterie, paired with seasonal libations 
  • Check out your luxury sleep-pod and unpack
  • Take a couple deep breaths
  • Unplug. Turn off our phone
  • Change your clothes and wander the property to acclimate yourself
  • Take a hot tub 
  • Converge for dinner: Lobster toast, roasted beet salad, couscous with herbs and wine plumped raisins, lamb chops from the Lamorey-Rowan Family Farm. Finish with a raspberry creme brulee 
  • Welcome bonfire and smores
  • Optional evening activities: board games, cards, puzzles, vhs/dvd classic films
 

Day 2: “The air is so clean here!”

  • Grab a pair of binoculars and watch the hawks from the top deck while sipping a hot beverage
  • Breakfast: waffle bar with fresh fruit, jams, house-made whipped cream. eggs made to order. pineapple kiwi fruit salad... and perhaps a mimosa or two. 
  • Lie in a hammock and listen to the rooster crow
  • Edible Hike - Walk The Navarro Ridge with a guide and discuss the native flora and fauna and taste the wild things that you can eat 
  • Private tour of “White Rainbow Farms.” A local 3rd generation sustainable farm on the ridge ½ mile from NRR
  • Meet a cow and a sheep
  • Leisurely coastal trail walk and wildflower gathering (seasonal)
  • Lunch - Mediterannean Mezze: pita, hummus, baba ganoush, olives, melange of cheeses, labneh, marcona almonds 
  • Afternoon yoga
  • Play time: Some people want to play, some people want to learn, some want to do both. This part of the afternoon is set aside for that. Knife throwing vs. corn hole. Or learn how to make pasta from scratch
  • Dinner Italian BBQ, prosciutto wrapped apricots, caprese salad, pasta primavera (with the pasta that you made, Bisteca ~ flame roasted steak 
  • After Dinner Dance Party
  • Walk the ridge under the glow of the stars and the moon
 

Day 3: “Let’s have an adventure…”

  • Breakfast: frittata, bacon, pastries, and mixed greens
  • Head out with your Brown Bag Lunch
  • Suggested Adventures 
  • Kayak down the Navarro River without a care and enjoy a private catered picnic on the beach
  • Stroll through historic scenic downtown Mendocion (the filming location of Murder She Wrote)
  • Private wine tasting and tour at Roederer Winery
  • North Coast Brewery Tour
  • Hike or bike through the best parks Mendocino has to offer
  • Sunset Yoga
  • Pre-dinner Hot tub
  • Dinner from The East 
  • Learn how to make spring rolls, dip them in a plum sauce made from fruit grown on the ridge
  • Fermented tea leaf salad
  • Veggie Pad Thai
  • Green Curry with duck from the Lamorey-Rowan Family Farm
  • Coconut rice
  • Housemade green tea ice cream
  • Farewell Bonfire 
 

Day 4: "Do I really have to leave?"

  • Enjoy the sunrise over the ridge
  • Breakfast: Bagel Bar - cream cheese, tomato, cucumber, sprouts, red onion, eggs
  • Say goodbye to Navarro Ridge Retreat
  • Late morning hot tub
  • Take a custom brown bag lunch with you on the way out
  • Stop on for a glass of champagne at Schaffenberger Estate and enjoy your lunch
  • Arrive at home with a newly found sense of peace

The Navarro Ridge Retreat is a composed effort led by hospitality professional, Brandon Rowan-Taylor. Our team has a shared vision of a unique experience where the back-to-basics of a rustic cabin meets a modernized luxury of a bed and breakfast. 

There has been no other point in our lifetime where disconnecting from screens and news feeds has been so critical for us to maintain our connection to nature, each other and ourselves. By contributing to this project, you will be helping us set the scene for a truly rejuvenating, restorative and expansive experience.

 

Our team has conducted months of research into what we need to launch this project; including startup costs, responsible and sustainable sourcing, partnering with local purveyors and supporting small businesses whenever possible. We need to raise $30k to ensure we have the proper guest accommodations, the property and land itself is well cared for, and all permits and licenses are obtained. By reserving your stay, we will be able to make this goal a reality. 

We have an army of chefs, artists, creatives, bodyworkers, and makers backing us. But, we need you to buy into this project,. You are not only supporting this collective dream, but you will get to enjoy the gifts first hand.

 

 

We can’t emphasize enough how important it is that we take time away from the constant buzz of daily life. But even planning and preparing some sort of trip can be an overwhelming task. Which is why we are pouring our hearts into carefully covering every detail for our guests, so that all you need to do is show up and tune out.

This project is an elevation from Brandon Rowan-Taylor’s successful tenure as a chef, sommelier and hospitality expert. He’s thoughtfully chosen each member of his team and their contributions because of their prowess. Every aspect of the guest experience is handled with care, professionalism and will absolutely not disappoint.

 

 

Where is Navarro Ridge located?

Just a quick jaunt off of Shoreline Highway (Hwy 1), you'll find our lovely property on Navarro Ridge Road.

 

What is there to do while staying there?

Glad you asked! Here are just some of the activities we think you'd enjoy. Don't see what you want, let us know and we will make it happen for you. 

 

 

Psst... inquire about our secret menu!
