For a standard membership register here to get first access to the roll out of the technology that supports Hostogether.

Pledge here to a Hostogether Premium Member! Help us grow this community and grow with us. Together we are stronger!

 

For more detail on Hostogether and what we want to achieve, continue reading.

If you are ready to join and grow your rental with us, Back us and be a Hostogether Premium Member!!

Thank you!

 

 

Q&A

  1. What is Hostogether?

  2. Why should I back Hostogether now?

  3. Can you explain to me in detail what are the Perks and Rewards available in your campaign?

  4. What happens if you don't reach your target?

  5. Can I get a refund if I change my mind?

  6. When will the Hostogether platform be ready?

  7. How does your pricing work?

  8. What tools do I get to use after joining Hostogether?

  9. What are your ongoing membership plans and what do they give me access to?

  10. How can I apply the best marketing strategies to generate more bookings and other revenues?

  11. Can I generate direct bookings from social networks and search engines?

  12. How will Hostogether referral program work?

  13. How much does the referral program cost?

  14. How can I increase my revenue per guest by joining Hostogether?

  15. Why should I list my property in more than 50 booking sites through a channel manager and how can I do it?

  16. Can I choose the bookings sites on which to list my property?

  17. How can I benefit from other hosts expertise and tips and share mine?

  18. What will I learn from experts and best practices collected from Hosts knowledge?

  19. How can I access services and supplies you need that have been recommended or reviewed by other hosts?

  20. What do you mean by the power of many

  21. How does Hostogether help me get lower services fees and prices

  22. Why act in a single voice with other hosts for your causes and influence

  23. How many properties can I have on Hostogether?

  24. What is the information needed to register in Hostogether?

  25. Is it possible to customize my website in Hostogether?

  26. I already have a property website. Can I keep it?

  27. Will I be able to take credit card payments?

  28. If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

 

1. What is Hostogether?

Hostogether is a global community where short-term rental owners expand their businesses and become better hosts by sharing and collaborating with each other. Hostogether provides a single technological platform for owners and hosts to join a global community and achieve more income, knowledge and impact.

We believe that together, vacation rental owners are stronger to face the challenges posed by increasing concentration of distribution and dependency on vacation rental sites.

We are preparing to launch with a strong community and our Goal is to have as many Hosts as possible in our community when we launch in October.

 

2. Why should I back Hostogether now?

This is your opportunity to become a Hostogether Founding Host,  and a Premium Member for only €50 per year per property, Forever!

You will also have a place on Hostogether premium gallery for extra promotion, a role on the definition of new features and services and accessing the Hostogether Ambassador role in your location.

We are definitely moving forward with Hostogether. With your support, we will be able to build the community faster and bring more value to hosts.

Be Founding Host and a Hostogether Premium Member! Help us grow this community and grow with us. Together we are stronger!

 

3. Can you explain to me in detail what are the Perks and Rewards available in your campaign?

The first 500 owners to support Hostogether get Premium Membership forever.

All Memberships include our Social Media for Owners Ebook,

You can contribute to our crowdfunding by pledging to the following perks:

  1. Help us Grow! Pledge € 10 for our Eternal Gratitude and for the change to earn a 5-night stay on one of Hostogether Members’ properties
  2. Premium Membership: by pledging €50 on our crowdfunding, you will be entitled to premium membership at € 50 per year for 1 property, forever. The first year is included. Premium membership includes all the features and tools of Hostogether and you pay 0% commission on direct bookings.
  3. 2x Premium: by pledging €99 on our crowdfunding, you will be entitled to premium membership at € 99 per year for 2 properties, forever. That’s an 88% discount. Premium membership includes all the features and tools of Hostogether and you pay 0% commission on direct bookings.
  4. Premium + Channel Manager: by pledging €110 on our crowdfunding, you will be entitled to premium membership at € 50 per year plus a Channel Manager at €60 (€5 per month) for 1 property per year, forever. That’s a 78% discount. Premium membership includes all the features and tools of Hostogether and you pay 0% commission on direct bookings. And the Channel Manager service is provided by a leading company that gets you to 50 listing sites with no effort at all, for more exposure to travellers and more sources for bookings, at a fraction of the price you would get if alone.
  5. 2x Premium + Channel Manager: by pledging €220 on our crowdfunding, you will be entitled to premium membership at € 50 per year plus a Channel Manager at €60 (€5 per month) per property for 2 properties per year, forever. That’s a 78% discount. Premium membership includes all the features and tools of Hostogether and you pay 0% commission on direct bookings. And the Channel Manager service is provided by a leading company that gets you to 50 listing sites with no effort at all, for more exposure to travellers and more sources for bookings, at a fraction of the price you would get if alone.

We have perks available for immediate contribution for 1 and 2 properties. If you have more than two properties, Contact us at hello@hostogether.com for a special perk.

Please refer to the question "What are your ongoing memberships and what do they give me access to?" for full detail on what benefits and tools are included in each membership

 

4. What happens if you don't reach your target?

We will still launch Hostogether in October. Hosts that join us will still benefit. We will have to grow at a different pace but will implement our marketing plans with the same drive. The goal will the same, to bring as many hosts as possible to join us, now and after.

 

5. Can I get a refund if I change my mind?

Yes of course. You can get a refund at any time during the campaign. You can initiate the refund directly from your confirmation email or Indiegogo account. Once we roll out the technology, you will have one month to evaluate Hostogether and should you decide to, you can get a refund.

6. When will the Hostogether platform be ready?

Hostogether is already developing the technological platform that supports the community and we will start roll-out in October 2017.

Premium Members that contribute in this crowdfunding will have first access to roll out, followed by all the hosts that register at our website: www.hostogether.com

7. How does your pricing work?

We have 2 different Memberships you can choose from:

  1. Standard Membership: no monthly fees, 6% commission on direct  bookings
  2. Premium Membership: € 35 monthly fee, 0% commission on direct  bookings.

For more detail on what each includes, refer to the answer to the question “What are your ongoing membership plans and what do they give me access to?”

An addition 4% on direct bookings will be applicable to all Memberships if the booking is referred by another Host or a Guest, as part of our referral program.

 

8. What tools do I get to use after joining Hostogether?

Here are some of the tools you can use and benefit from when joining Hostogether. These will be available as we roll out the technology.

By joining Hostogether, you will have access to:

  • Your Property website with direct booking and electronic payment capabilities to maximize conversion of your visitors into reservations
  • Tools to promote your property on Social Media. You can even have automated posts every time you have a promotion or a last-minute offer to promote or write a new entry on your blog
  • A Host referral program with emails and social media posts, through which Hosts recommend and refer each other to their friends and guests, or share your promotions and last-minute offers. This generates more direct bookings for Hostogether hosts that are recommended and a new income stream for the Hosts that recommend
  • A Guest referral program to increase guest loyalty to Hostogether hosts and attract more guests to generate more direct bookings
  • A Host Blog integrated with your website, for your content and recommendations. This is also one of the places where you earn when your guests book experiences and services with you. All entries are synchronized with your social media profiles for maximum each and to increase your SEO relevance to attract more traffic to your website
  • Guest Services tools to help you earn more as your guests experience their stay even better, such welcome emails with recommendations of things to do, places to see, where to eat and drink and so on. These can be recommended by you, or if you prefer, fully automated based on the guest’s profile.
  • A leading channel manager to maximize your exposure to travellers. You choose which listing sites you want to be listed on, from the 50 available. Setup is automated from Hostogether in most of them. Maximum distribution and no effort at all.
  • Dashboards and Analytics with all the information you need to better manage your properties, such as, where are your bookings coming from, which marketing initiatives work better, your next arrivals, and so on.
  • Forums where hosts share experiences and tips and you can go for help. Learn from and share with other hosts on an easy and intuitive platform.
  • Knowledge centre, where you can access best practices on how to run a successful short-term rental business. Access best practices and a click’s distance. From experts and from the best of Hostogether.
  • A Marketplace for local and Global services you need, recommended and reviewed by other hosts. From cleaning and key handling to plumbing or refurbishing. Or even services like internet or electricity. All these at better prices.
  • Action Platform to organize your causes and act locally and globally, to gather other hosts support to your causes or

All this done automatically, without any effort at all!!

 

9. What are your ongoing membership plans and what do they give me access to?

Our ongoing memberships are:

By joining our Hostogether Crowdfunding campaign you can become a Premium Member and pay 0% commission on direct bookings for €50 per property per year! 

To get first access to our Standard Membership, go to www.hostogether.com and register!

 

10. How can I apply the best marketing strategies to generate more bookings and other revenues?

You can attract travellers to your Hostogether website by implementing a well-designed sales & marketing strategy.

B2C e-commerce companies consider these three to be the best online marketing strategies:

  1. Referral marketing: 84% of people trust product and brand recommendations from people they know
  2. E-mail marketing: 86% of consumers would like to receive promotional emails from companies they do business with
  3. Social media: Nearly one-third of the world uses social networks regularly

Hostogether developed the tools that allow Host to implement these strategies

  1. Hosts refer each other to their guests and friends
  2. Referrals though email and social media
  3. Proven Social media strategies to increase social reach and direct bookings
  4. Referral & loyalty program for guests
  5. Regularly posting content travellers look for will bring more travellers to your Hostogether property website, increasing bookings as well as sales of Guest Services and experiences.

11. Can I generate direct bookings from social networks and search engines?

Social media and search engines allow you to be found by travellers and guests before they go to a listing site.

 

Hostogether integrates with Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and others, to help you interact with your current guests and reach new guests. And we will create these profiles for your properties if needed:

  1. Publish promotions, last minute and special offers in social media for increased reach to your friends’ friends and their friends
  2. Share content that is relevant for travellers and that they will search for when planning a trip, so they find you. This is content you already have and know such as activities, places to visit, events, the best restaurants, and bars, etc.
  3. Once guests arrive at your Hostogether property website, they will find all they need to plan a trip and are more likely to book with you

We also provide you with the tools to automate your social activity, content to publish, etc., so you can have strong social media strategy and presence with very little effort.

 

12. How will Hostogether referral program work?

Hostogether referral program rewards hosts that recommend other properties to their friends and guests, generating bookings for other hosts. The rewards include earning a 4% commission on the booking generated and many other perks.

Have other hosts recommending your properties to their guests and friends

By joining, Hostogether referral program, hosts have their properties being promoted by other hosts

  1. Hosts in other locations feature your property in the Hostogether newsletter they send to their friends and guests. They click and go directly to your Hostogether property website, where they can book
  2. A host in your location has a guest they cannot welcome because the property is fully booked. Your property will be recommended to this guest, who will probably book with you
  3. You launch a new special offer in social media. Other hosts will share that promotion and amplify you’re the reach of your campaign for new guests to find you and book with you

Hosts that join Hostogether referral program also share and promote other hosts’ properties and earn commissions for bookings on properties you recommend to your guests and friends

Hostogether referral program allows you to create value from your network of guests and friends.

The probability that someone in your circle of friends or your previous guests will book your property can be very low. However, reaching your friends and guests is very valuable to other hosts, in the same way other hosts’ friends and guests are potential guests for your property.

 

13. How much does the referral program cost?

If you get a booking from a referral, you will pay an additional 4% commission on your booking to reward the host that referred you to your guest. The guest referral program will have the same commission and guests will accumulate a balance to use when they book with Hostogether hosts.

That said, these are the same 4% commission you earn from bookings your guests make on properties you recommended to them.

 

14. How can I increase my revenue per guest by joining Hostogether?

You can increase your revenue per guest earning from services and experiences you recommend to travellers. You start selling more than just accommodation. Hostogether Guest Services give you the opportunity to earn 5-10% of your guest purchases of experiences, tours, restaurant bookings, activities, tickets, etc.

Guest Services are all the services guests may need or want during their stay with you. These can be restaurant bookings, museum entrances, tickets for events, bars, tours, etc. And large vacation rental property managers have been profiting from this category for some time. Now you can too!

Hosts recommendations are really appreciated by guests and make their experience richer and more complete. And also give a sense of excellent service. We all know excellent service equals excellent reviews.

Hostogether will make it easy for you to give recommendations to your guests and earn a commission when they buy your favorite services and experiences. You will have access to a large directory of experiences, services, places you can choose from to recommend, or you can bring your own or your favorite activates and places to this directory for other Hosts to recommend and sell to their guests and friends. Or you can choose to leave it up to Hostogether to generate suggestions based on the guest profile.

 

15. Why should I list my property in more than 50 booking sites through a channel manager and how can I do it?

Your Hostogether memberships – except for the standard - come with a leading channel manager that allows you to increase your distribution and reach millions of travellers more. A Channel Manager it is a technology that connects properties and property owners to holiday rental sites and on-line travel agencies (OTAs) from one place.

  1. Increased distribution of your property can get you 25% more bookings
  2. Centralized and automatic management of availability, rates, and content saves a lot of time and effort and avoids overbooking.
  3. Automated setup in many channels gets you there with no effort at all
  4. More booking sources means less dependency on your current booking sites

You won’t get an offer like this anywhere else except from Hostogether.

 

16. Can I choose the bookings sites on which to list my property?

Yes, you will choose the channels that work with. After the setting your property up on Hostogether, you will be able to choose which booking sites you want to work with. We have agreed simpler sign up processes with most of the leading vacation rentals sites.

You can also distribute your property through networks of traditional travel agencies to reach those guests that prefer not to book through the internet.

 

17. How can I benefit from other hosts expertise and tips and share mine?

You can learn a lot from other hosts and you can share your knowledge and experience too

Benefiting from other hosts’ experience can help you improve in many ways, help you overcome those obstacles or solve your problems in a faster safer way – whether day-to-day, business, fiscal, marketing, regulation, etc.

It will also help you improve the service you provide to your guests. This leads to happy guests who will book with you again, accept your recommendations or book with other Hostogether members.

Helping other hosts through sharing your knowledge and experience also benefits you. This improves the service other Hostogether members provide to their guests hence improving their guests’ overall experience. And more likely they are to follow recommendations to book with Hostogether Hosts.

 

18. What will I learn from experts and best practices collected from Hosts knowledge?

Hostogether will deliver a directory full of video tutorials, how-to guides, checklists, etc. to help you improve your service and business and keep up to date with latest trends.

We’ll consolidate the best of Hostogether members experience and knowledge and more from other experts, to help you:

  1. Improve your services to guests
  2. Improve your ratings
  3. Improve your marketing skills to increase your direct bookings and referrals to other hosts
  4. Improve the performance of your properties on booking sites
  5. Manage Price and occupancy to maximize profits

And so on…

 

19. How can I access services and supplies you need that have been recommended or reviewed by other hosts?

Hostogether will build a marketplace for Hosts to find all the services you need to run your business. You will be able to choose from the best local and global suppliers for your needs, with the added advantage of better prices, and low risk.

Hostogether includes access to a directory of suppliers of services and products you need, from day-to-day, such as laundry services, to refurbishing your property, from furniture to electronics or construction companies.

These services will be recommended by Hostogether members and will be reviewed by the hosts who have previously purchased from them, so you always know you can trust these suppliers. And on top of that, you get a preferred price, because we are many.

You will be able to recommend suppliers you trust to the community and you have the possibility to offer services to other hosts also, for additional revenue.

­20. What do you mean by the power of many?

The power of many is the result of having many individuals come together and speak with one voice. Is the way we can bring scale to work in our favor and be stronger to achieve our goals.

Join thousands of other short-term rental owners and hosts so you can benefit from the power of many for better prices and discounts, influence and causes.

Who’s never heard of the strength in numbers?

By joining Hostogether you will be able to access what only big property managers can access today:

  1. Better prices for services and products you need, from cleaning, key handling to furniture, or a leading channel manager to centralize all those booking sites.
  2. Listing in some sites that only accept companies with a large number of properties
  3. And even lower commissions in some listing sites

Hostogether will work locally and globally to bring more advantages to its members based on the power of many. It is up to us all

But there’s more; join other hosts to act together and protect your business next to regulators or to work toward causes you defend – from social impact to landmark protection or global warming, etc.

 

21. How does Hostogether help me get lower services fees and prices?

Hostogether will help you reduce costs, increase profits and access services you cannot get alone.

Just think of the number of services you need to run your property and welcome your guests but you cannot afford.

How do you access these expensive services or get more attention from the providers if they don’t think of you as an important client?

How do you get lower prices on the services you are already buying?

The answer to these questions is Hostogether. By joining, you get:

  1. Services only large property managers have, at the prices they have them
  2. Local services, like cleaning, laundry, power and the internet, mobile phone and services, etc. at lower rates because you are buying together with other hosts

 

22. Why act in a single voice with other hosts for your causes and influence?

We believe that we must put our strength and will into defending our views and causes.

Joining Hostogether gives you the opportunity to do good, by doing that with many hosts that share the same views and causes.

Whether you are in a city where regulation is tightening, or in a natural haven that needs protecting, defending your interests and causes requires the ability to make your voice heard. Hostogether ensures that your voice and that of other hosts and other people that share your views is amplified and heard.

You will be able to take the same strategies made available to market your property and use them to collaborate with other hosts to have your message get across to the right people

This way, Hostogether members collaborate with each other to improve their business and we can also give back and contribute to make the world a better place

 

23. How many properties can I have on Hostogether?

Our technology is optimized for individual short-term rental property owners – and not property management companies. You can have as many properties as you’d like on Hostogether, but we believe that if you have more than 10 properties, you will miss a few features that are important for managers with a large number of properties. Please, talk to us just in case. We are sure we can help.

 

24. What is the information needed to register in Hostogether?

For now, the data you provide Indiegogo will be enough. In October, during the roll out of Hostogether, we will ask you for the same information about you and your property you provide to listing sites. This will be done via an easy to use setup. We will also be able to collect all your info from a limited number of listing sites, should you give you permissions to do so. 

 

25. Is it possible to customize my website in Hostogether?

We will start roll-out with a few standard Hostogether property website formats. As part of the continuous development and improvement of Hostogether platform, we are planning to introduce more flexible and customizable layouts. And most importantly, we will always make sure that Hostogether property websites are optimized for conversion of visitors into bookings.

 

26. I already have a property website. Can I keep it?

You are free to keep your website, of course. You will also get a Hostogether property website, which supports all our marketing tools. All we have to do is make sure the calendars are synchronized and up-to-date in both sites, and we’ll have tools for that too.

 

27. Will I be able to take credit card payments?

Yes, with Hostogether will be able to take all major credit cards and many other payment methods.

Hostogether electronic payment solutions will also allow for you to charge the credit cards of your guests coming from listing sites and at a lower costs.

 

28. If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

Please read through our FAQs first to find your answer.
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
For all other questions regarding Hostogether, contact us via ruiescaleira@hostogether.com or joanafeijo@hostogether.com

Hostogether developed the tools that allow Host to implement these strategies
Hosts refer each other to their guests and friends
Referrals though email and social media
Proven Social media strategies to increase social reach and direct bookings
Referral & loyalty program for guests
Regularly posting content travellers look for will bring more travellers to your Hostogether property website, increasing bookings as well as sales of Guest Services and experiences.
11. Can I generate direct bookings from social networks and search engines?Social media and search engines allow you to be found by travellers and guests before they go to a listing site. Hostogether integrates with Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and others, to help you interact with your current guests and reach new guests. And we will create these profiles for your properties if needed:
Publish promotions, last minute and special offers in social media for increased reach to your friends’ friends and their friends

Share content that is relevant for travellers and that they will search for when planning a trip, so they find you. This is content you already have and know such as activities, places to visit, events, the best restaurants, and bars, etc.

Once guests arrive at your Hostogether property website, they will find all they need to plan a trip and are more likely to book with you
We also provide you with the tools to automate your social activity, content to publish, etc., so you can have strong social media strategy and presence with very little effort. 12. How will Hostogether referral program work?Hostogether referral program rewards hosts that recommend other properties to their friends and guests, generating bookings for other hosts. The rewards include earning a 4% commission on the booking generated and many other perks.Have other hosts recommending your properties to their guests and friendsBy joining, Hostogether referral program, hosts have their properties being promoted by other hosts
Hosts in other locations feature your property in the Hostogether newsletter they send to their friends and guests. They click and go directly to your Hostogether property website, where they can book
A host in your location has a guest they cannot welcome because the property is fully booked. Your property will be recommended to this guest, who will probably book with you
You launch a new special offer in social media. Other hosts will share that promotion and amplify you’re the reach of your campaign for new guests to find you and book with you
Hosts that join Hostogether referral program also share and promote other hosts’ properties and earn commissions for bookings on properties you recommend to your guests and friendsHostogether referral program allows you to create value from your network of guests and friends.The probability that someone in your circle of friends or your previous guests will book your property can be very low. However, reaching your friends and guests is very valuable to other hosts, in the same way other hosts’ friends and guests are potential guests for your property. 13. How much does the referral program cost?If you get a booking from a referral, you will pay an additional 4% commission on your booking to reward the host that referred you to your guest. The guest referral program will have the same commission and guests will accumulate a balance to use when they book with Hostogether hosts.That said, these are the same 4% commission you earn from bookings your guests make on properties you recommended to them. 14. How can I increase my revenue per guest by joining Hostogether?You can increase your revenue per guest earning from services and experiences you recommend to travellers. You start selling more than just accommodation. Hostogether Guest Services give you the opportunity to earn 5-10% of your guest purchases of experiences, tours, restaurant bookings, activities, tickets, etc.Guest Services are all the services guests may need or want during their stay with you. These can be restaurant bookings, museum entrances, tickets for events, bars, tours, etc. And large vacation rental property managers have been profiting from this category for some time. Now you can too!Hosts recommendations are really appreciated by guests and make their experience richer and more complete. And also give a sense of excellent service. We all know excellent service equals excellent reviews.Hostogether will make it easy for you to give recommendations to your guests and earn a commission when they buy your favorite services and experiences. You will have access to a large directory of experiences, services, places you can choose from to recommend, or you can bring your own or your favorite activates and places to this directory for other Hosts to recommend and sell to their guests and friends. Or you can choose to leave it up to Hostogether to generate suggestions based on the guest profile. 15. Why should I list my property in more than 50 booking sites through a channel manager and how can I do it?Your Hostogether memberships – except for the standard - come with a leading channel manager that allows you to increase your distribution and reach millions of travellers more. A Channel Manager it is a technology that connects properties and property owners to holiday rental sites and on-line travel agencies (OTAs) from one place.
Increased distribution of your property can get you 25% more bookings
Centralized and automatic management of availability, rates, and content saves a lot of time and effort and avoids overbooking.
Automated setup in many channels gets you there with no effort at all
More booking sources means less dependency on your current booking sites
You won’t get an offer like this anywhere else except from Hostogether. 16. Can I choose the bookings sites on which to list my property?Yes, you will choose the channels that work with. After the setting your property up on Hostogether, you will be able to choose which booking sites you want to work with. We have agreed simpler sign up processes with most of the leading vacation rentals sites.You can also distribute your property through networks of traditional travel agencies to reach those guests that prefer not to book through the internet. 17. How can I benefit from other hosts expertise and tips and share mine?You can learn a lot from other hosts and you can share your knowledge and experience tooBenefiting from other hosts’ experience can help you improve in many ways, help you overcome those obstacles or solve your problems in a faster safer way – whether day-to-day, business, fiscal, marketing, regulation, etc.It will also help you improve the service you provide to your guests. This leads to happy guests who will book with you again, accept your recommendations or book with other Hostogether members.Helping other hosts through sharing your knowledge and experience also benefits you. This improves the service other Hostogether members provide to their guests hence improving their guests’ overall experience. And more likely they are to follow recommendations to book with Hostogether Hosts. 18. What will I learn from experts and best practices collected from Hosts knowledge?Hostogether will deliver a directory full of video tutorials, how-to guides, checklists, etc. to help you improve your service and business and keep up to date with latest trends.We’ll consolidate the best of Hostogether members experience and knowledge and more from other experts, to help you:
Improve your services to guests
Improve your ratings
Improve your marketing skills to increase your direct bookings and referrals to other hosts
Improve the performance of your properties on booking sites
Manage Price and occupancy to maximize profits
And so on… 19. How can I access services and supplies you need that have been recommended or reviewed by other hosts?Hostogether will build a marketplace for Hosts to find all the services you need to run your business. You will be able to choose from the best local and global suppliers for your needs, with the added advantage of better prices, and low risk.Hostogether includes access to a directory of suppliers of services and products you need, from day-to-day, such as laundry services, to refurbishing your property, from furniture to electronics or construction companies.These services will be recommended by Hostogether members and will be reviewed by the hosts who have previously purchased from them, so you always know you can trust these suppliers. And on top of that, you get a preferred price, because we are many.You will be able to recommend suppliers you trust to the community and you have the possibility to offer services to other hosts also, for additional revenue.­20. What do you mean by the power of many?The power of many is the result of having many individuals come together and speak with one voice. Is the way we can bring scale to work in our favor and be stronger to achieve our goals.Join thousands of other short-term rental owners and hosts so you can benefit from the power of many for better prices and discounts, influence and causes.Who’s never heard of the strength in numbers?By joining Hostogether you will be able to access what only big property managers can access today:
Better prices for services and products you need, from cleaning, key handling to furniture, or a leading channel manager to centralize all those booking sites.
Listing in some sites that only accept companies with a large number of properties
And even lower commissions in some listing sites
Hostogether will work locally and globally to bring more advantages to its members based on the power of many. It is up to us allBut there’s more; join other hosts to act together and protect your business next to regulators or to work toward causes you defend – from social impact to landmark protection or global warming, etc. 21. How does Hostogether help me get lower services fees and prices?Hostogether will help you reduce costs, increase profits and access services you cannot get alone.Just think of the number of services you need to run your property and welcome your guests but you cannot afford.How do you access these expensive services or get more attention from the providers if they don’t think of you as an important client?How do you get lower prices on the services you are already buying?The answer to these questions is Hostogether. By joining, you get:
Services only large property managers have, at the prices they have them
Local services, like cleaning, laundry, power and the internet, mobile phone and services, etc. at lower rates because you are buying together with other hosts
 22. Why act in a single voice with other hosts for your causes and influence?We believe that we must put our strength and will into defending our views and causes.Joining Hostogether gives you the opportunity to do good, by doing that with many hosts that share the same views and causes.Whether you are in a city where regulation is tightening, or in a natural haven that needs protecting, defending your interests and causes requires the ability to make your voice heard. Hostogether ensures that your voice and that of other hosts and other people that share your views is amplified and heard.You will be able to take the same strategies made available to market your property and use them to collaborate with other hosts to have your message get across to the right peopleThis way, Hostogether members collaborate with each other to improve their business and we can also give back and contribute to make the world a better place 23. How many properties can I have on Hostogether?Our technology is optimized for individual short-term rental property owners – and not property management companies. You can have as many properties as you’d like on Hostogether, but we believe that if you have more than 10 properties, you will miss a few features that are important for managers with a large number of properties. Please, talk to us just in case. We are sure we can help. 24. What is the information needed to register in Hostogether?For now, the data you provide Indiegogo will be enough. In October, during the roll out of Hostogether, we will ask you for the same information about you and your property you provide to listing sites. This will be done via an easy to use setup. We will also be able to collect all your info from a limited number of listing sites, should you give you permissions to do so.  25. Is it possible to customize my website in Hostogether?We will start roll-out with a few standard Hostogether property website formats. As part of the continuous development and improvement of Hostogether platform, we are planning to introduce more flexible and customizable layouts. And most importantly, we will always make sure that Hostogether property websites are optimized for conversion of visitors into bookings. 26. I already have a property website. Can I keep it?You are free to keep your website, of course. You will also get a Hostogether property website, which supports all our marketing tools. All we have to do is make sure the calendars are synchronized and up-to-date in both sites, and we’ll have tools for that too. 27. Will I be able to take credit card payments?Yes, with Hostogether will be able to take all major credit cards and many other payment methods.Hostogether electronic payment solutions will also allow for you to charge the credit cards of your guests coming from listing sites and at a lower costs. 28. If I have questions, how can I reach your team?Please read through our FAQs first to find your answer.For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. For all other questions regarding Hostogether, contact us via ruiescaleira@hostogether.com or joanafeijo@hostogether.com

story:
[Spanish]

Somos un equipo de 12 chicas del club Patinatge Artístic Maçanet (PAM) que comparten una misma pasión: el patinaje artístico. Nuestra intención con esta web es expresar como de importante es esta pasión para nosotras. El patinaje artístico no es sólo un deporte, sino mucho más que eso, es una forma de vivir y un sentimiento que tenemos desde que éramos pequeñas. Creemos que la motivación, el entusiasmo y la voluntad de trabajar duro son claves para llegar donde te propongas.

El verano de 2016 iniciamos una aventura juntas que nos ha llevado a ser campeonas de Girona, Catalunya y por primera vez  en su historia, el PAM se ha convertido en el nuevo campeón de España en grupos show pequeños. Después de estos grandes éxitos, quedamos directamente clasificadas para participar en el campeonato de Europa 2017 que se celebraba en Mouilleron le captif, Francia, donde conseguimos una meritoria tercera posición. Para finalizar la temporada el grupo participará en los primeros World Roller Games 2017 en Nanjing, China.

El club está enormemente orgulloso de los éxitos conseguidos esta temporada, pero no puede hacerse cargo de los gastos que implica enviar a 12 personas al otro lado del mundo. Es por esta razón que las patinadoras estamos haciendo todo lo posible para conseguir pequeñas ayudas económicas que nos ayuden a cumplir nuestro sueño. Hemos colaborado en fiestas, conciertos, festividades, ferias locales y otras muchas actividades más, pero se nos acaba el tiempo y las ideas. Cada granito de arena que podáis aportar nos acercará un poco más a China. ¡Muchas gracias!

 

[English]

We are 12 Spanish girls members of the Patinatge Artístic Maçanet team (Maçanet, Spain). We are writing to express how important is our passion for us. We think that roller skating is not just a sport, it is much more than that, it is a way of living, a lifestyle we were born with. We believe that our motivation, our enthusiasm along with our willingness to work hard is key fact to become the best roller skaters.

We met last summer for the first time and we decided to start a journey together. After training a lot of hours and having hard moments we became the champions of Girona, Catalonia and Spain. These results allowed us to participate in the European championship celebrated this past April in Mouilleron le captif, France, where we got the third position. Furthermore, to finish this season we are going to participate in the first World Roller Games in Nanjing, China.

The club is very proud of all the achievements and success that we have reached this year but there isn’t enough money to pay the trip to all the members. This is the reason why we are doing a lot of activities where people can contribute: festivals, concerts, exhibitions…However, we are running out of ideas and time. Everything you can help us with will bring us closer to our dream. Thank you so much!

story:
Short Summary

My buddy Kirby is currently leading his class in the BMW drivers club NSW super sprint and we need to help him keep that:

  • My names Mike and I'm Kirbys friend.
  • My campaign is to help my friend drive 7 hours to Winton Park Raceway, enter his E36 and have a chance to retain his number 1 spot in the points race.
  • You guys will help a hard working working family man live his dream of racing! Kirby's the kind of guy who always has time to help people out and we need to help him out! Kirby got hit with an unfair tax bill and now he can't race, but we need to show him that we got his back! Kirby's helped me, he's probably helped you even if you don't know him so lets help him!


What We Need & What You Get

  • We're looking for 600 bucks, for the entrance fee, petrol and accommodation .
  • We've got some awesome perks for you guys! Check the perks section and help a friend out! If you donate 20 bucks we're gonna send you a sticker featuring Kirby's favorite thing to do #offatturn1
  • for 50 bucks we'll send the sticker and I'll run a small sponsor sticker on my car
  • for 100 bucks you'll get the sticker, the small sponsor sticker on my car, and a legit #offatturn1 shirt. Black shirt with white text
  • If we don't reach our goal the funds will go to a charity to be announced, but come on lets be honest we're gonna reach our cool because your cool, I'm cool and Kirby is cool and cool people reach their goals... its science... you can look it up on wikipedia or something

The Impact

  • This project is important to the world because we gotta support peoples dreams! Dreams are the stuff that make the world go round (aside from gravity) and we can't let the government take that from hard working skinny dudes whose name is Kirby.
  • This project is for everyone who's want to do the thing the loved but didn't have the cash to make it happen! 

Risks & Challenges

  • We've got some risks and challenges to overcome, Kirby's got to drive to Victoria THROUGH Glenrowan where Ned Kelly got shot... 
  • In recognition of that Kirby is going to not dress up as Ned Kelly whilst driving through, which is a HUGE sacrifice because he basically wears steel plates everywhere

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You can help by sending positive vibes and sharing the word if you can donate
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

So help me help Kirby!

story:
First Time Overseas on Mission Trip

Many of you who know me know by the grace of God I've been serving as Youth Pastor at The Gathering LA and Oasis of Hollywood this past year and passionately following Christ and His call on my life since 2010.  More and more I've been walking in the calling of full-time ministry and exciting opportunities have presented themselves self to me. I feel God's calling on my life is so strong and there is no doubt that diving into this mission trip to San Pedro, Honduras is where I need to be. I’ll be experiencing an entire new world around me. The mission trip is planned for August 3rd through August 10th. In partnership with New Hope Opportunities, Honduras, we will be working directly with children at a orphanage.

What Can You Do To Help?

Pray!! Above all else, please pray for me. I’ll need God to strengthen, guide, and fill me with wisdom to navigate any challenges along the way. Also, before you give to support my trip, please pray for the amount you decide to support me with.

Give!! My fundraising goal will cover lodging, meals, and airfare. I know there will be some of you who will give $5 and some who will give a few hundred! I'm honestly grateful for any amount! If you prefer sending a check, please mail the check to Michael Bowles at 1725 Ivar Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90028. Please make sure to share your contact information with me so that I can keep you updated about my time in Honduras. 

Share!! Lastly, please help me by sharing this site with your own network (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.).  I promise that you would be sowing in great soil when you support this amazing opportunity to serve & work with kids at a orphanage in Honduras 

Additional Links/ Contact

- See more at: http://www.newhopeopportunities.org

https://www.facebook.com/michael.bowles.946

http://about.me/michael_bowles

story:
KODDOK

KODDOK:  By combining the design of a bottle opener and a detachable dice, we created KODDOK, which allows you to open bottles of drinks and enjoy the fun and games with your friends. 

KODDOK is made with 100% Grade 5 Titanium. It is strong and unbreakable. With its small compact size, KODDOK can be easily fit onto your keychain, or into your pocket or bag. 

How to use:

  • You can use KODDOK to open your bottle easily.
  • You can unscrew the KODDOK dice for games.

 The KODDOK dice contain 6 faces, with different pattern of stripe representing the numbers. Its easy to read!

We tested throwing our dice 100 times and the result comes as follow: 

  • number 1 is 19% 
  • number 2 is 15% 
  • number 3 is 17% 
  • number 4 is 15% 
  • number 5 is 16% 
  • number 6 is 18%

 KODDOK comes with a 20cm Brown Leather Strap.

KODDOK spec:

  • Size: 6cm x 1cm x 1cm
  • Weight: 24g
  • Material: 100% Grade 5 Titanium with Matte Finishing 
  • Color: Silver

(Grade 5 Titanium is much stronger than other pure titanium whilst still retaining the same hardness, strength and properties. Grade 5 Titanium are widely used in Aerospace, Marine and Medical purpose.)

We have spend lot of time designing and building prototype in order to make sure that KODDOK's design bring the best experience to our user. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!

story:
Titanium is a one of the best metal on earth. The strength to weight density is higher than any other metallic element on the globe. At the same time, it is lighter than its nearest comparative metal: steel. There are so many advantages of using titanium as material which cannot be all listed here. So why bother ? Titanium it is !

From the brand first created to design and prototyping, our team has spent more than 7 months working back and forth changing and polishing the products. We love the simplest and the rawest design because we believe that Simply is Beauty, and the simplicity can demonstrate and highlight how amazing titanium can be.  

Titann™ Container incorporates strength, practicality, durability and portability into one. What it can achieve is just unbelievable. You can throw it, smash it, hit it with rocks, run it over by cars, still it will be undamaged and in perfect condition. It is built to last forever which mean you can use it for your whole life !

 Titann™ Cup & Cutlery possess similar capability as the Titann™ Container.  Titann™ Cup & Cutlery's strength, anti-rusting and anti-denting capability make it lifetime durable. Apart from that, the double wall titanium also help to maintain temperature, both hot and cold. 

 The "Easy Clean Coating" on both Titann™ Cup & Cutlery allow people to wipe and clean easily without using any water. This feature make Titann™ Cup & Cutlery super convenient and very suitable for any kind of outdoor activities, like camping and picnic. 

 Titann™ Cutlery can be folded in half and store easily anywhere. Its size can be reduced in half after folding. This Fold-ability make Titann™ Cutlery in a more compact size and super convenient to carry around.

 Backers can select freely between Item A, Item B and Item C. Say for example, if you select the "Can't Be Indoor" package, you can either select 5 Item A, or 3 Item A, 1 Item B and 1 Item C, or 3 Item B and 2 Item C, ANY COMBINATION YOU WANT ! You will be asked to filled in your selection at the backer survey after the campaign finished. 

 Stephen was graduated in Engineering and worked in the industry for 1.5 years. All of a sudden, he discovered his interest in outdoor equipment and he found out that titanium is one the best material to build these equipment. He has spent more than 2 years studying titanium and designing different prototype. His passion in outdoor equipment is just beyond imagination.  

Risks and challenges

The major challenge of this project was to build the prototype because our team has very strict requirements and need everything to be perfect. Therefore, we have come across many times of back and forth with the factories and spent quite a lot of time there. We have also made plenty of adjustment every time so that we can build the perfect products. However, this approach has aroused two major problems: cost and time. With our team effort, we were able to stick with our timeline and control the cost within our prediction.
story_txt:
Titanium is a one of the best metal on earth. The strength to weight density is higher than any other metallic element on the globe. At the same time, it is lighter than its nearest comparative metal: steel. There are so many advantages of using titanium as material which cannot be all listed here. So why bother ? Titanium it is !






From the brand first created to design and prototyping, our team has spent more than 7 months working back and forth changing and polishing the products. We love the simplest and the rawest design because we believe that Simply is Beauty, and the simplicity can demonstrate and highlight how amazing titanium can be.  










Titann™ Container incorporates strength, practicality, durability and portability into one. What it can achieve is just unbelievable. You can throw it, smash it, hit it with rocks, run it over by cars, still it will be undamaged and in perfect condition. It is built to last forever which mean you can use it for your whole life !


 Titann™ Cup & Cutlery possess similar capability as the Titann™ Container.  Titann™ Cup & Cutlery's strength, anti-rusting and anti-denting capability make it lifetime durable. Apart from that, the double wall titanium also help to maintain temperature, both hot and cold. 

 The "Easy Clean Coating" on both Titann™ Cup & Cutlery allow people to wipe and clean easily without using any water. This feature make Titann™ Cup & Cutlery super convenient and very suitable for any kind of outdoor activities, like camping and picnic. 

 Titann™ Cutlery can be folded in half and store easily anywhere. Its size can be reduced in half after folding. This Fold-ability make Titann™ Cutlery in a more compact size and super convenient to carry around.



 Backers can select freely between Item A, Item B and Item C. Say for example, if you select the "Can't Be Indoor" package, you can either select 5 Item A, or 3 Item A, 1 Item B and 1 Item C, or 3 Item B and 2 Item C, ANY COMBINATION YOU WANT ! You will be asked to filled in your selection at the backer survey after the campaign finished.  Stephen was graduated in Engineering and worked in the industry for 1.5 years. All of a sudden, he discovered his interest in outdoor equipment and he found out that titanium is one the best material to build these equipment. He has spent more than 2 years studying titanium and designing different prototype. His passion in outdoor equipment is just beyond imagination.  Risks and challengesThe major challenge of this project was to build the prototype because our team has very strict requirements and need everything to be perfect. Therefore, we have come across many times of back and forth with the factories and spent quite a lot of time there. We have also made plenty of adjustment every time so that we can build the perfect products. However, this approach has aroused two major problems: cost and time. With our team effort, we were able to stick with our timeline and control the cost within our prediction.

story:
ALL PRODUCT SHIPS IMMEDIATELY

 

**See advantages of the Shark Wheel and videos of Shark Tank, FedEx, etc toward the bottom of the campaign.

**Lowest prices ever just for this short campaign ending at the beginning of April.


As Seen on

  • Shark Tank
  • The Discovery Channel
  • FedEx Commercials
  • ESPN
  • FOX

Complete Boards Available in This Campaign:

**Shark Wheel Casters - ($99, only here for $84)
Heavy duty, flat plate, fits on nearly anything
70mm, 78a, Shiver Abec Bearings, Chrome Caster
Select any wheel color you want (more colors than pictured here)

Our Features:

1.  Shark Wheels are fast.  The design allows for a thin contact patch touching the ground and therefore less rolling resistance resulting in a quicker ride.  

2. Shark Wheels have more grip and sliding control.  The alternating pattern equates to increased control - the width is increased, but the friction is decreased!  The sine wave design provides three lips per wheel for superior lateral grip.  A traditional wheel only has one.  

3.  Shark Wheels are better than traditional wheels on varying terrain.  The #1 advantage. The sine wave pattern smoothly funnels most debris aside instead of it being 'steamrolled' over like traditional wheels.  This has been scientifically proven by San Diego State University, Mechanical Engineering Department in 2 years of testing.

4.  Shark Wheels are the perfect rain / gravel wheels.  The alternating pattern of grooves significantly reduces hydroplaning by channeling liquid, sand or gravel out and away from the surface of the wheel, allowing for a firm contact patch with the ground.  Also, the rounded edges allow liquid, sand or gravel to pass around the wheel, providing unparalleled grip over wet and loose traction surfaces.

5. Shark Wheels last longer. Traditional wheels have one center point. Once they wear off center even slightly, the wheel is completely compromised. Shark Wheels are the only wheels with multiple center points and take longer to wear out (in cruising situations). This has been scientifically proven by San Diego State University, Mechanical Engineering Department in 2 years of testing.

6. Shark Wheels have a unique 30 degree approach angle. Similar to how drivers know to go over speed bumps or dips in the road at an angle to reduce the shock. Shark Wheels always strike every obstacle at an angle reducing the shock to the rider and allowing for a smoother ride.

 

Sign up for updates, deals, and win free gear on SharkWheel.com and/or SharkWheelSkate.com.  The Shark Wheel Skateboard Wheels (for street and trick riding) will be out after our longboard wheels.

Testimonials-

“These wheels make riding in the rain fun and safer because I have so much more control. I’ve never felt so comfortable on a wheel.” --G.S. Santa Monica, CA

“I love the shape. They get crazy reactions from people because they look like they would be impossible to roll.”--A. M.  Mission Viejo, CA

"I don't even understand how these wheels are possible.  From just looking at them you would think they couldn't possibly ride the way they do.  They feel so smooth it is like a magic trick or something!."--G.M. Culver City, CA

"It actually looks like a square from the side..crazy!"--C.W. Los Angeles, CA

"I ride every day.  BEST.  WHEELS.  EVER! You guys have a home run here."--T.R. Irvine, CA

 

Board Compatibility?

The Shark Wheel Skate 70mm longboard wheels fit onto all existing longboards and have a standard hub. Make sure that the size of the trucks accommodates a standard 70mm wheel so that you don’t end up with wheel bite between the wheel and deck, just as you would with any other wheel brand.

*About us

Shark Wheel is a company located in Orange County, California. We are making wheels in many different industries now. 

Farming - won a government grant through the National Science Foundation. We have the only wheel in farming that minimizes digging trenches significantly.

Roller Skates

story:
Here's the deal: I'm dying to get out in the world and make a difference. I want to gain a larger perspective on the world, but I haven't seen much of it. In order to really succeed in a global environment, I need to understand the world. 

I want to hit up Nicaragua with some of the most inspiring, highly motivated individuals, to connect and collaborate on ways to better this place. I want to learn about microfinance from one of the most poverty stricken countries and immerse myself in a life of dream building.

Why Nicaragua?

Because in Nicaragua, nearly 3 million people (about half its population) live in poverty and earn just $2 to $3 a day. I want to see how "micro-loans are changing the lives of people in poverty and allowing them to build real businesses at the grassroots level." http://matadornetwork.com/community/Mattwilson2/travel-for-good-nicaraguas-growing-economy/

^^Spot on article by Matt Wilson on "Travel for Good"

What is Under30Experiences?

They're an awesome company that provides travel experiences for ambitious young adults. http://under30experiences.com/

They bring amazing people together. Their values and mission can be expressed from a quote by one of their Founders, Matt Wilson, 

"What I do know is that I want to inspire and lead people, be creative, build something that makes impact on the world, and have a positive influence on the people I come into contact with."

My dreams are aligned with Matt's. I want to connect with him and make a positive difference in Nicaragua and globally.

How you benefit?

If you ever had an idea or wanted to do something new, see a new place, make a difference in your own life or someone else's, I'll help you do that. I'm always happy to help a friend whether its startup or philanthropic related.

How I benefit?

Under30Experiences trip to Nicaragua is going to propel me to succeed in making a difference in the world. It will place me in the proper environment for self-growth, connect me with others looking to make a difference, and teach me about the challenges poverty stricken people are faced with.

Expected Costs:

The cost of the trip is $1200. It is $997 for a limited time. I walked away from my 9-5 a short while ago because it wasn't meeting my satisfaction. I didn't feel like I was making a difference. I get fulfillment from helping out others and I have set myself on a new life path to do such. 

By pledging you're investing in me and I'll be personally grateful. Every $1 counts, you aren't charged until I reach the funding goal of $997. If I don't reach it, you're never charged, I'll thank you for your pledge and try again next year.

A little about me

My goal in life is to build my dreams by helping others build theirs. I want to travel and make a positive dent on the world. I love people and I love bringing out the best in them. I want to inspire, innovate and make a difference. I want to lift people up. I want to surround myself with other aspiring and highly motivated young helpers & innovators that can heighten my evolution and growth as a person and together collaborate on ways to better this place.

Over the last year I worked to build Squirr3l, a mobile social network, now in beta, found at Squirr3l.com . It allows users to keep tabs on their friends and share what they are up to. There's no liking, commenting, or sharing. It's a way to "stay connected w/out connecting". Not everyone has the time to bury themselves in a rabbit hole of social networks for days. I've worked to allow people to stay connected with those they care about fast and easily. It's a stress-free way of socializing and it makes status-updating fun! I see Squirr3l as my break into the tech scene and a stepping stone to a serial entrepreneurial future entwined with a life of service, people coaching, and dream building.

If you can't pledge, even a tweet or a like on my Facebook page goes a long way. I'd love to connect and hear about your story. Feel free to hit me up at kdiamond33(at)gmail.com or on twitter @kevinjdiamond

W/ gratuity,

Kevin J. Diamond

story:
An open and shut case for the future of helmets

 

 

People are cycling more than ever. In Europe and the USA more bicycles are now being sold than cars! And more and more cities around the world are introducing cycle rental schemes.

It’s inevitable that as more people take to the road on a bicycle, more people will have accidents. When head meets road, vehicle or pavement without a helmet on it’s generally pretty messy… and sometimes fatal!

When it's not fatal the injuries caused by brain damage can often be too awful to contemplate. Victims of brain injuries often spend years in a coma unable to communicate in any way or they lose the ability to live normal lives and can need constant care. More often than not, head injuries affect not just the victim but whole families.

My campaign is to develop and manufacture Morpher, a new kind of helmet that folds flat so that it's easy to carry around when one isn't actually on a bicycle. 

 

 

STOP PRESS: The Evening Standard, London's evening newspaper, reported on Thursday that after a cycling accident in Spitalfields on Monday night, 27-year-old Claire Pepper's head became trapped under a VW Golf. “If I had not been wearing my helmet I would have died,” she said. And, with five cycling deaths on London’s roads in the past nine days, many of us want all the protection we can get.

Popular Science Magazine's Safety Invention of the year

Morpher literally folds in half when not in use. It will slide away into a bag with little more fuss than a laptop.

 

With Morpher, cyclists will find it easier to always have a helmet at hand. 

More helmets =  fewer head injuries and fatalities.

Help Morpher happen sooner - pick a perk now

Some people have asked me why we have quoted our perks in US$ and not UK£. The answer is that I had to pick one or other currency and as most funds are likely to come from the good old US of A I thought that Dollars would be more appropriate. Currently £1.00 is worth around $1.29. Which means that a rough value of our perks is as follows:

$100= £77.47                  $150 = £116.20                    $300 = £232.41

Don't forget to add your postage!
 

 

 

Morpher is the world’s first fold-flat helmet. Morpher folds & unfolds quickly and simply, so it's perfect for cyclists who want to carry a helmet more easily. Patented worldwide, Morpher has been designed to exceed all relevant safety standards. Morpher is initially aimed at all cyclists; especially those urban ones who find normal helmets cumbersome to carry around all day. Eventually it will also be marketed to other users of sports safety helmets (skiers, skaters, snow boarders, hockey players, horse riders etc).

Morpher's flat profile will also allow innovative selling methods, such as vending machines placed by major bicycle hire points. Morpher aims to give the world an unprecedented ease of access to cycle safety. At Morpher we also believe in a greener planet, so we've ensured that our helmets and their components are made from recyclable materials.

 

 

 

 

Check out the image gallery for more images of Morpher

 

People love Morpher. Even as a prototype, it's already won three major international innovation awards.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I'm Jeff, an inventor from the UK. I'm also a keen urban cyclist. I’ve been working hard to develop this product for the past 2 years.

I have been involved with successful innovation and new product development for many years and have worked with hundreds of inventors over the past 20 years helping them to get their ideas made and their products to market.

I am utilising everything I've learned as well as the skills of the team that I’ve built around me to ensure that this product is an incredible improvement over existing technologies.

 

I am chairman of the Judging panel for the World Innovation Awards that are held annually in London and I really believe that with my experience I have what it takes to make this product work. Well.

MORE ABOUT THE INVENTOR: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff_Woolf

 

 

 

 

After I came up with the idea for Morpher I knew that I needed to get some top quality Industrial Design done, so I contacted some of the world's leading industrial design companies to ask them to tender for the project. After careful consideration, I chose Therefore Limited, as, rather unsurprisingly, they came up with by far the best solutions. 

Therefore work with great companies like Braun, Asus, Samsonite, Tom Tom, etc.,and were the design house responsible for the groundbreaking Psion Series 5 PDA range.Therefore were also responsible for the design and development of the GravityLight, which raised $399,590.00 on Indiegogo in a campaign that was oversubscribed 727%. They are World Class designers and their work on Morpher has been incredible.

 

I have been involved with manufacturers and injection moulders for many years and after visiting and getting manufacturing quotations from dozens of helmet manufacturers I have carefully selected Strategic Sports Ltd to manufacture Morpher.

They are the world’s leading OEM helmet manufacturer who are determined to make this a fantastically safe and effective product. They make helmets for most of the world’s leading brands.

If you own a cycle helmet, the chances are that it’s one of theirs.

They are an amazing company that treat their staff incredibly well. They provide homes, schooling, English lessons, food, sporting facilities, loads of international travel opportunities and a host of other benefits to those that are lucky enough to work there.

There is a video explaining who they are and what they do at the bottom of this page.

                  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Some years back, I was involved in an accident. I was hit by a car and thrown off my bike at pretty high speed. I flew through the air (stylishly) and landed head first on a kerb stone (a bit less stylishly). I broke my shoulder, smashed my chin, broke a couple of ribs... and if it wasn't for my helmet I would almost certainly have died... or been seriously brain damaged.

 

As planet Earth gets greener and fitter we’re cycling more and more. More than a hundred cities around the world now have cycle rental schemes, which are proving to be hugely popular. But very few of us non bike owners are wearing helmets. According to research, the main reason is that they are simply too cumbersome to carry around all day, especially if you may only be taking a ten minute bike ride.

 

 

 

I noticed that on bike rental schemes, such as the ones in San Francisco, Boston, London,  Paris, Taipei, Shanghai, Bangkok and other cities, huge numbers of cyclists don't wear helmets. In London, for instance, well over 90% of renters don't wear one.

 

I wanted to know why, so I commissioned a survey*. These were the results that we obtained:

 

 

          

 

 

*Survey results property of Jeffrey Woolf OBE © 2013

So I realised I had a mission. If I could create a helmet that could fold flat… I could save lives, and so my journey began...

 

It’s inevitable that as more people take to the road on a bicycle, more people will have accidents. When head meets road, vehicle or pavement without a helmet on it’s generally pretty messy… and sometimes fatal! My campaign is about encouraging helmet use by making them simpler to carry around when one isn’t actually on a bicycle.

 

Help us protect the world, help get Morpher through the last stages of production.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Morpher has come a long way since its inception. The design has grown and changed radically, ideas have come and gone and now we're almost there. There are just a few more stages to complete before Morpher is ready to meet the world.

 

 

Moulding this helmet is extremely difficult as there are least 6 different materials and components involved. And they all have to be combined into one final moulding and assembly operation, which is incredibly challenging and has never been done before!

(For those of you that want some more detail of how this all happens, see below or feel free to send me an email.)

 

The funds are going towards passing rigorous international safety standards testing as well as finalising and building the incredibly complex tooling that is needed to produce Morpher.

 

This means ensuring that the helmets get through the hugely onerous and thorough testing criteria to ensure that they pass all relevant safety standards. First for Europe and then for the USA and Australia (Our prototypes have already passed most European testing standards and we are on course to pass the more stringent US and Australian testing requirements).

 

 

THE MONEY

The funding will be used to cover the high costs of obtaining the certification and to get the manufacturing process working in an efficient and streamlined way, ready for mass production.

 

 

FAQs

1.  Shipping Costs: If you forgot to add shipping to your order then please Click Here, select "No perk, I just want to contribute", change the amount from the default $100 to the correct amount ($10 US, $15 UK or $20 Rest of World) & it will be matched to your order

2.  Shipping Addresses: Before we ship anything we’ll be emailing & asking you to confirm your address, so please don’t worry if you've moved since you ordered

3.  Colours: The first Morphers that we ship don’t have a colour choice. We’ve already polled you on some choices & I think they’ll be stunning. More about this as we get closer to May… It's looking likely that they'll be black (as shown under the "What" section, above) but this isn't yet guaranteed

4.  Size: Our first model has a fit system. This means you can adjust your Morpher to fit heads with a circumference of between 50.5 & 58cm. (19.8 to 22.7 inches. 6 1/8 to 7 1/8 UK hat sizes.) This covers a pretty wide range of heads from mid-teens to small ladies to medium+ men. Obviously, in the future, we'll produce a range of sizes including larger helmets & children's helmets.

 

PRESS

We've had recent press in all of these publications, programmes and websites.

 

 

 

 

  • CNET
  • Business Bee
  • gizmag
  • MSN
  • Cycling Republic
  • The Times - 1
  • The Times - 2
  • The Daily Mail
  • Bike Radar
  • Damn Geeky
  • LBC
  • Capital Bay
  • Capovelo
  • Spokeo
  • MSN Innovation
  • Geek News Central

 

 

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you can't help financially, don't fret! You can still help us by spreading the word! Share, Tweet, Like and talk about Morpher with all your friends. Share the IndieGoGo link with everyone and help us build momentum.

Our Twitter account is @morpherhelmet

This is one of the greatest ways you can help us if you've donated or not. We urge everyone who believes in Morpher to do this! 

 

                                         

 

CONTACT

If you wish to get in contact please access our website and drop us an email.

http://www.morpherhelmet.com/

Here is a video on Strategic Sports Ltd, our manufacturing partner. You could come and visit this factory with me if you purchase our top perk. It's an incredible place to see.

 

 

 

 

So pick a perk, and together let's make 

safety more accessible than ever!

 

 

 

 

 

Thank You!
