story:
Stop putting your board on your boot. Save your leg for your best day of riding ever. 

RideEasy is a portable snowboard footrest that lets you hook your board on the chairlift so your leg can rest as you go up the mountain. It also doubles as a board lock that’s always on your binding so you never have to worry about leaving your board on the racks.

  

 

This easy-to-use footrest helps take the uncomfortable weight of the hanging board off your foot so you can chill on any chairlift. Without fatigue, ankle pain and numbness, you can maximize your shred time on the slopes.

Decrease Knee/Ankle Stress - RideEasy decreases the weight of the board on the chairlift which reduces the risk of injury.   

Extend Ride Time - RideEasy allows your legs to recover so you have energy to ride for longer.

Protect Your Board - RideEasy doubles as lock so you never have to worry about your leaving your board on the racks. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

   

 

 

  

  

 

     

 

  



 

 

Easy and Safe removal - Designed to effortlessly pull from the housing and retract back in no time.

 

 

Don’t worry about getting caught on the chairlift. A simple nudge of RideEasy’s hook off of the bar will send it auto retracting back into perfect place.  Remember - it retracts back in one second so you'll be ready to get off instantly.

 

Reach down then lean back - Simple as that, pull to hook and let RideEasy do the work.

 

 

RideEasy was designed with you, the snowboarder, in mind. We want you to be able to get on and off the chairlift with the line as if nothing’s changed. When you want the chairlift to hold the board, simply reach down to grab the hook from your binding and put it on the safety bar. Anyone can do it, with a glove on, using just one hand.

  



Nudge and go - So easy that getting caught on the lift is a non-issue.  

 

 

We spent more than 9 months on the shape of the hook so that it only stays on when the weight of your board is on it. Let’s say you've lost track chatting with your friends. Suddenly, the lift slows down and it’s time to get off. Simply nudge the hook off the safety bar, let it recoil back into place and cruise.

 

Precise alignment every time - This auto alignment function sends the hook back into place instantly.

   

 

After the hook comes off the safety bar, it’s unsafe to have it dangling outside RideEasy's housing. That's why we have developed our own patented technology so that the hook will auto-align itself as it retracts into the housing within 1 second. You read that right. The hook retracts so fast that we had to slow it down for our video. After you flick the hook off the chairlift, you can forget about the line and ride off without any change in what you would normally do.

 

  

 

  

 

Built for all day riding - RideEasy supports your weight and stays secure while you're shredding.

 

 

We know a day out on the slopes means occasional spills and scratches. RideEasy was built to be a part of the snowboard lifestyle so you don’t have to tiptoe around with it.

 

Secure Installation - Attach RideEasy to your binding and enjoy hassle free riding.

 

 

We have tested several materials to make sure that the line is able to withstand both the impact of snowboarding and the harsh conditions on the ski-slopes. Aside from vigorous testing in the lab, we've gone out to snow test prototypes extensively on the slopes of Niseko, Japan and Falls Creek, Australia. Our secure attachment keeps RideEasy locked in tightly against your boot, so it won't get knocked loose even if you take a hard fall. No rubbing against your boot or vibrating while riding.

 

The solid plastic body and steel hook are snowproof and protect the insides from unwanted snow. Meanwhile, the auto retractable line itself has been tested hundreds of times to ensure it will always work, no matter the conditions.

 

Zero drawbacks to riding - Unlike other board accessories and footrests, RideEasy is compact so it won’t change how your board rotates or tweaks.


 

Weighing in at 99g and about the size of a pack of cards, you won't even realize that RideEasy has been on your binding all along. With a matte black finish, it blends into your gear perfectly. The auto retractable line keeps the hook close to you and out of your way after you've sat down on the lift. With no noticeable drawbacks to performance, RideEasy is the perfect snowboard accessory - always there, but only when you need it.

   

Supports your weight - This lean, mean, chilling machine was made for all snowboarders to enjoy a comfortable ride to the top.

 

 

We’ve talked to several material engineers to find the most suitable material for RideEasy. We finally settled on PC and POM, which, pound for pound is one of the strongest and most wear resistant materials available. We can report that the device can withstand 100 lbs of pulling force. With an average snowboard setup (board, binding + boots) weighing in at 13 lbs, we’ve built in an ample buffer for you to rest your leg without any problems.

 

  

 

  

 

Peace of mind on the racks - Know your board is safe when you’re grabbing drinks with friends.

RideEasy doubles as a snowboard lock you’ll never leave behind since it’s already attached to your binding. A steel cable and combination code will protect your board when you treat yourself to lunch.

 

For Any Board and Rack - RideEasy is just as agile when you’re using it to take a break.

 

 

RideEasy acts as a cable lock to protect your board when you’re not shredding. At 62 cm long, it can wrap around any rack out there. Once you place your board against the rack, simply wrap the lock around the rack and secure it with a combination code of your choosing. Removing the lock is also as simple as entering the right combination and letting the auto-retract feature unwind the board for you. Because it's always on your bindings, you won’t have to dig through your bag to find it, just go to the ankle strap!

 

Simplify your accessories - The lock is not only safe, but easy to set and unlock.

 

 

Keys, gloves and snow are a horrible combination. Why mess around with tiny bits and pieces when our combination lock is just as secure? We've designed the dials to be large and rotate smoothly so you can enter the combination code with your gloves on. Our lock is one of the easiest to use on the slopes so you can drop the extra keys and stop losing lock pieces.
 

Change it when you want  - Don’t stress over your code, you can update it at anytime.

 

 

Setting up the lock is incredibly straightforward. The combination reset button is situated behind the product with an intuitive slider that’s easy to use. Simply enter the current code, then slide the reset button across. Enter in your new code, then close the slider to lock it in. You're now ready to go!

 

 

RideEasy comes in 2 lengths. Which length is right for you?

We know riders come in all different shapes and sizes, that’s why we made an extended length option for those of you who are taller. Check out our recommendations below!

My height is:

5’9 (170 cm) and under - Select the Normal Length

5’9+ - Select the Extended Length

  

 

   

 

 

   

 

 

Hi there, I'm Adrian, the creator of RideEasy. That's me, chilling on the chairlift in the photo above. But it wasn't always that way…

The idea started 4 years ago, back to the slopes of Hanazono, Niseko in Japan. Every time I had to go to the top of the mountain, it took 3 lifts of 6-7 minutes each.

Here's the problem:
3 lifts to the summit x 6-7 minute rides x 0 footrests = pain

You better believe that my front leg was numb and sore by the time I got to the top. And to do it all over again, 10-15 times a day? That was when RideEasy was born.

Back to the present. What started out as a 2 dollar bungee cord and hook, is now complete and ready to be used in action. Me and my team of engineers and designers are proud to have put together an accessory that will not only help you ride higher and for longer, but is durable, lightweight and portable.

 

When I'm not working on RideEasy or hitting the slopes, you can find me spending time with my boy Asher. 


 

   

 

You’re a business professional and this is your hobby: Perfect for your next week long snowboard trip to Park City. Maybe you live a hectic life in finance or sales and often travel to unwind from it over the weekend. RideEasy is the perfect accessory to help you recharge throughout the day and avoid early knee/back problems from appearing. If it makes vacation a little bit better, you’re willing to spend for comfort.

You’re a thrill seeker: Perfect for the younger, late 20's-mid 30's performance driven snowboarder. You’re like Adrian, RideEasy’s creator, still near your “peak” physically, and love to challenge yourself with new limits - black slopes, faster times, backcountry runs. RideEasy will reduce fatigue on the chairlift and help you ski harder down the slope, every time. Since you don't want anything affecting your performance, it's key that RideEasy is compact and lightweight.

You’re thoughtful: The perfect gift for those who want to surprise their significant other with a new alternative to numb legs from the chairlift. RideEasy would be a great gift for your girlfriend who mentions how uncomfortable the lift is because of her sore legs. It’s also a great gift for your Mom or Dad, who have old injuries that get irritated with board strain. Don't let chairlift rides ruin your trip. Get RideEasy and enjoy your ride to the top in peace.

   


 

 

   

 

 

 

 

   

 

 

 

  • Ex-Investment Banker at BNP Paribas
  • Built a basketball app from ground up as the COO of VC backed startup "Coachbase Practice Planner" (currently in the iTunes store with 203 ratings averaging 4.7 stars)
  • Founded and grew a fitness company in the ultra competitive Hong Kong market

 

  • Managed social media and newsletter for "Coachbase", Apple Store featured basketball app, building it into an industry leading resource on basketball coaching for 20K+ weekly readers.
  • Currently directing social media and email campaigns for Ride Easy Snowsports.

 

  • Past products include Revols which raised US$2.5 million +
  • Engaged by 5-6 HAX portfolio companies each year

 

  • Co-founder of Nanoleaf, a HK hardware startup
  • Company products selling in Apple store USA, Harrods and Best Buy
  • Responsible for end-to-end supply chain management of US$4 million worth of hardware products in China

 

  • Head of Global Sources Launchpad, a division of Global Sources (NASDAQ-GSL GSOL)
  • Responsible for building Startup Launchpad – Asia’s first B2B trade show + tech conference event for hardware startups
  • Responsible for facilitating trade between startups/suppliers and buyers worldwide at Global Sources

 

  

 

 

 

Shouldn't RideEasy go on the back binding?

During our testing, we tried to put RideEasy on the back binding. We found two problems:

  • With the REL on the back binding, it will only take 50% of the weight of the board because the other half will be support by your front/attached leg.
  • With the back of the board hooked onto the safety bar, it will be parallel to the chairlift which will interfere the people sitting beside you on the lift.

Since we’ve designed RideEasy to be shorter than your front leg, this video shows that the line will take most of the weight of your board and your leg will be able to rest!

 

 

But you can just put your board onto your boot... 

That's what I've been doing for 10 years, but the sharp edge would cut the toe box of my boot. I came up with the product not because I couldn't stand the pain of the hanging board, but to rest up on the chairlift ride so I can shred harder. Might as well make good use of the time we’re on the lift when we aren’t doing anything anyways!

 

 

How much weight can RideEasy take? Is it easy to break?

We’ve tested RideEasy to carry 100lb. With an average snowboard setup (board, binding and boots) weighing in at 18lbs, we’ve built in an ample buffer for you to rest your leg on without any problems. You can even kick your leg around on the chairlift and RideEasy will be able to withstand the strain you put on it.

 

Check out the video below for a behind the scenes look at our strength testing!

 

 

Will the REL interfere with my riding?

Nope! RideEasy doesn’t touch or rub against anything after it’s attached onto your binding. The cushioning of the ankle strap creates a clear gap between your boot and the strap. This is exactly where RideEasy attaches to. It takes advantage of this space to "float" beside your boot when you’re riding. It’s securely bolted on so it doesn’t rattle or shift as you go down the mountain. We’ve tested it extensively with pro-riders and snowboard instructors without any complaints. Here’s are clips of RideEasy going down the mountain to show that it doesn’t interfere with riding:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/qsiyehxudzcg15l/AACD...

 

How do you attach RideEasy to the binding?

RideEasy attaches to your ankle strap at the inside of your front foot. After researching many possible binding areas, I found that this was the best spot to for RideEasy to take the weight of the whole board. There are 2 ways of attaching it to the inside of your ankle strap:

1) Bolting RideEasy directly onto the strap. If your ankle strap has holes to adjust the size of your ankle pad (e.g Burton) then you can use a screwdriver to remove the screw from the back of RideEasy and bolt it directly onto the strap.

2) Using our strap adapter: If your ankle strap doesn’t have holes, then take the ankle strap off the main frame of the binding, slide the strap adapter onto it, and then use a screwdriver to bolt RideEasy onto the strap adapter. The strap adapter works like a belt buckle. After you put the adapter on, you can bolt RideEasy onto it and then refit the ankle strap to your binding.

Both methods take a matter of minutes and require minimal tools. For a how to demonstration, check out our video below.

 

Does RideEasy fit all bindings?

RideEasy will fit most bindings. We will deliver RideEasy to you with 2 strap adapters of different sizes. The largest adapter will fit 99% of straps in the market. If you are really unsure whether RideEasy will fit your binding, take a photo of the inside of your front binding with a tape measure beside the strap and send it to us at relaxed@rideeasy.co We will then tell you whether it fits or not.

P.S remember to also take a photo from the top, i.e. bird’s eye view, so we can see the thickness also.

As far as we know, the bindings that it will not work on are "step-in" bindings. This is because those don’t have an ankle strap, so there’s nothing for RideEasy to attach to. As long as you can detach the ankle pad from the binding’s main frame, you’ll be able to install RideEasy on your setup.

 

What if you forget to unhook from the chairlift?

We spent 9 months working on the shape of the hook so that it only stays on the safety bar when there is weight on it. Taking the hook off is as easy as lifting your foot and then flicking it off. It literally takes a split second. If you don’t believe me, check out it out here: https://youtu.be/jogpKLiHqh8

 

How much does RideEasy weigh?

The product weights in at 99 grams or 0.22 lbs. That’s only 1/3 of the weight of an iPhone 8. Because it’s attached to your binding, which is attached to your board and on the ground most of the time, you won’t be able to feel the weight of RideEasy at all.

 

How long is the cable?

We were thinking about chairlift footrests when we built RideEasy. Those metal footrests aren’t adjustable so we weren’t too worried about needing to adjust RideEasy’s length. Having the comfort of the rider in mind however, we made two sizes for RideEasy: Normal Length, which is 57cm long and Extended Length which is 62cm long.

If you’re shorter than 5’9" then get the normal length. Anything above that, get the extended length. If in doubt, get the normal length, as the worse case scenario is that your knee will be bent just a little bit more with the slightly shorter cable, but RideEasy will still be taking all the weight of the board off your leg.

 

Will this work on safety bars that have advertisements/resort maps on them?

We know that advertisements sometimes cover the bar, and are too large for RideEasy to hook onto. Fortunately, they never cover the entirety of the bar, and there'll always be space to hook your line. It won’t hook onto the advertisements or resorts maps, but you can put the hook on the part of the safety bar right beside them.

 

Can you change the combination lock code for RideEasy?

Yes, we built a combination lock reset button into the back of RideEasy so you can set the unlock code to whatever 3 digit number you want. 

 

When will my RideEasy be delivered?

Being snowboarders ourselves, we know that the season is almost here and that you want to get RideEasy this season. We have been working extremely hard to line up all the different factories and people necessary for our production. Keeping all the prep work in mind, we promise to deliver by June 2018.

 

How will my RideEasy be shipped?

All units will be shipped by a professional logistics company specializing in fulfillment for crowdfunding campaigns.

 

What is the Warranty?

We provide a 1 year limited warranty. We guarantee you will receive your RideEasy free of manufacturing defects. We will have 100% AQL inspection levels to ensure quality.

 

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo have now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile.
story_txt:
Stop putting your board on your boot. Save your leg for your best day of riding ever. RideEasy is a portable snowboard footrest that lets you hook your board on the chairlift so your leg can rest as you go up the mountain. It also doubles as a board lock that’s always on your binding so you never have to worry about leaving your board on the racks.   This easy-to-use footrest helps take the uncomfortable weight of the hanging board off your foot so you can chill on any chairlift. Without fatigue, ankle pain and numbness, you can maximize your shred time on the slopes.Decrease Knee/Ankle Stress - RideEasy decreases the weight of the board on the chairlift which reduces the risk of injury.   Extend Ride Time - RideEasy allows your legs to recover so you have energy to ride for longer.Protect Your Board - RideEasy doubles as lock so you never have to worry about your leaving your board on the racks.                                 Easy and Safe removal - Designed to effortlessly pull from the housing and retract back in no time.  Don’t worry about getting caught on the chairlift. A simple nudge of RideEasy’s hook off of the bar will send it auto retracting back into perfect place.  Remember - it retracts back in one second so you'll be ready to get off instantly. Reach down then lean back - Simple as that, pull to hook and let RideEasy do the work.  RideEasy was designed with you, the snowboarder, in mind. We want you to be able to get on and off the chairlift with the line as if nothing’s changed. When you want the chairlift to hold the board, simply reach down to grab the hook from your binding and put it on the safety bar. Anyone can do it, with a glove on, using just one hand.  Nudge and go - So easy that getting caught on the lift is a non-issue.    We spent more than 9 months on the shape of the hook so that it only stays on when the weight of your board is on it. Let’s say you've lost track chatting with your friends. Suddenly, the lift slows down and it’s time to get off. Simply nudge the hook off the safety bar, let it recoil back into place and cruise. Precise alignment every time - This auto alignment function sends the hook back into place instantly.    After the hook comes off the safety bar, it’s unsafe to have it dangling outside RideEasy's housing. That's why we have developed our own patented technology so that the hook will auto-align itself as it retracts into the housing within 1 second. You read that right. The hook retracts so fast that we had to slow it down for our video. After you flick the hook off the chairlift, you can forget about the line and ride off without any change in what you would normally do.       Built for all day riding - RideEasy supports your weight and stays secure while you're shredding.  We know a day out on the slopes means occasional spills and scratches. RideEasy was built to be a part of the snowboard lifestyle so you don’t have to tiptoe around with it. Secure Installation - Attach RideEasy to your binding and enjoy hassle free riding.  We have tested several materials to make sure that the line is able to withstand both the impact of snowboarding and the harsh conditions on the ski-slopes. Aside from vigorous testing in the lab, we've gone out to snow test prototypes extensively on the slopes of Niseko, Japan and Falls Creek, Australia. Our secure attachment keeps RideEasy locked in tightly against your boot, so it won't get knocked loose even if you take a hard fall. No rubbing against your boot or vibrating while riding. The solid plastic body and steel hook are snowproof and protect the insides from unwanted snow. Meanwhile, the auto retractable line itself has been tested hundreds of times to ensure it will always work, no matter the conditions. Zero drawbacks to riding - Unlike other board accessories and footrests, RideEasy is compact so it won’t change how your board rotates or tweaks. Weighing in at 99g and about the size of a pack of cards, you won't even realize that RideEasy has been on your binding all along. With a matte black finish, it blends into your gear perfectly. The auto retractable line keeps the hook close to you and out of your way after you've sat down on the lift. With no noticeable drawbacks to performance, RideEasy is the perfect snowboard accessory - always there, but only when you need it.   Supports your weight - This lean, mean, chilling machine was made for all snowboarders to enjoy a comfortable ride to the top.  We’ve talked to several material engineers to find the most suitable material for RideEasy. We finally settled on PC and POM, which, pound for pound is one of the strongest and most wear resistant materials available. We can report that the device can withstand 100 lbs of pulling force. With an average snowboard setup (board, binding + boots) weighing in at 13 lbs, we’ve built in an ample buffer for you to rest your leg without any problems.       Peace of mind on the racks - Know your board is safe when you’re grabbing drinks with friends.RideEasy doubles as a snowboard lock you’ll never leave behind since it’s already attached to your binding. A steel cable and combination code will protect your board when you treat yourself to lunch. For Any Board and Rack - RideEasy is just as agile when you’re using it to take a break.  RideEasy acts as a cable lock to protect your board when you’re not shredding. At 62 cm long, it can wrap around any rack out there. Once you place your board against the rack, simply wrap the lock around the rack and secure it with a combination code of your choosing. Removing the lock is also as simple as entering the right combination and letting the auto-retract feature unwind the board for you. Because it's always on your bindings, you won’t have to dig through your bag to find it, just go to the ankle strap! Simplify your accessories - The lock is not only safe, but easy to set and unlock.  Keys, gloves and snow are a horrible combination. Why mess around with tiny bits and pieces when our combination lock is just as secure? We've designed the dials to be large and rotate smoothly so you can enter the combination code with your gloves on. Our lock is one of the easiest to use on the slopes so you can drop the extra keys and stop losing lock pieces. Change it when you want  - Don’t stress over your code, you can update it at anytime.  Setting up the lock is incredibly straightforward. The combination reset button is situated behind the product with an intuitive slider that’s easy to use. Simply enter the current code, then slide the reset button across. Enter in your new code, then close the slider to lock it in. You're now ready to go!  RideEasy comes in 2 lengths. Which length is right for you?We know riders come in all different shapes and sizes, that’s why we made an extended length option for those of you who are taller. Check out our recommendations below!My height is:5’9 (170 cm) and under - Select the Normal Length5’9+ - Select the Extended Length             Hi there, I'm Adrian, the creator of RideEasy. That's me, chilling on the chairlift in the photo above. But it wasn't always that way…The idea started 4 years ago, back to the slopes of Hanazono, Niseko in Japan. Every time I had to go to the top of the mountain, it took 3 lifts of 6-7 minutes each.Here's the problem:3 lifts to the summit x 6-7 minute rides x 0 footrests = painYou better believe that my front leg was numb and sore by the time I got to the top. And to do it all over again, 10-15 times a day? That was when RideEasy was born.Back to the present. What started out as a 2 dollar bungee cord and hook, is now complete and ready to be used in action. Me and my team of engineers and designers are proud to have put together an accessory that will not only help you ride higher and for longer, but is durable, lightweight and portable. When I'm not working on RideEasy or hitting the slopes, you can find me spending time with my boy Asher.      You’re a business professional and this is your hobby: Perfect for your next week long snowboard trip to Park City. Maybe you live a hectic life in finance or sales and often travel to unwind from it over the weekend. RideEasy is the perfect accessory to help you recharge throughout the day and avoid early knee/back problems from appearing. If it makes vacation a little bit better, you’re willing to spend for comfort.You’re a thrill seeker: Perfect for the younger, late 20's-mid 30's performance driven snowboarder. You’re like Adrian, RideEasy’s creator, still near your “peak” physically, and love to challenge yourself with new limits - black slopes, faster times, backcountry runs. RideEasy will reduce fatigue on the chairlift and help you ski harder down the slope, every time. Since you don't want anything affecting your performance, it's key that RideEasy is compact and lightweight.You’re thoughtful: The perfect gift for those who want to surprise their significant other with a new alternative to numb legs from the chairlift. RideEasy would be a great gift for your girlfriend who mentions how uncomfortable the lift is because of her sore legs. It’s also a great gift for your Mom or Dad, who have old injuries that get irritated with board strain. Don't let chairlift rides ruin your trip. Get RideEasy and enjoy your ride to the top in peace.                  
Ex-Investment Banker at BNP Paribas
Built a basketball app from ground up as the COO of VC backed startup "Coachbase Practice Planner" (currently in the iTunes store with 203 ratings averaging 4.7 stars)
Founded and grew a fitness company in the ultra competitive Hong Kong market
 
Managed social media and newsletter for "Coachbase", Apple Store featured basketball app, building it into an industry leading resource on basketball coaching for 20K+ weekly readers.
Currently directing social media and email campaigns for Ride Easy Snowsports.
 
Past products include Revols which raised US$2.5 million +
Engaged by 5-6 HAX portfolio companies each year
 
Co-founder of Nanoleaf, a HK hardware startup
Company products selling in Apple store USA, Harrods and Best Buy
Responsible for end-to-end supply chain management of US$4 million worth of hardware products in China
 
Head of Global Sources Launchpad, a division of Global Sources (NASDAQ-GSL GSOL)
Responsible for building Startup Launchpad – Asia’s first B2B trade show + tech conference event for hardware startups
Responsible for facilitating trade between startups/suppliers and buyers worldwide at Global Sources

story:
We’re still using the highest quality materials, but we’ve added a few more features to make you the happiest camper ever. Oh, and we’ve managed to make it even. more. affordable.

 

 

 We didn’t just create a tent. We created an outdoor sleeping system that combines the best and most durable elements of our camping gear into one high-quality, heavy-duty, lightweight (6.2 lbs / 2.8 kg) superpack. 

 

 

 

 

 Thanks to RhinoWolf’s modular design, you can connect your RhinoWolf to your friend’s RhinoWolf, to her spouse’s Rhinowolf, to that guy’s friend’s RhinoWolf to… You get the picture. 

No need to worry about rain, sunlight or wind leaking through because we’ve added the innovative “roll and lock” feature. Simply zip the tents together, roll the extra fabric and use the loops to lock your RhinoWolfs together. 

1. Zip the tents together and tightly roll down the excess fabric

2. Stick the peg through the loop

3. Lock it in

 

 

 We'll contact you after the campaign is over for your color choice. Choose between pink, light green and dark green.  

RhinoWolf 2.0 was created with the toughest and most durable of climate protective materials. And with even more integrative and customizable features, this SuperTent is totally full-spectrum. 

The shell is made of premium polyester and the tent is wind proof and is durable to up to 2000 ml of rain.

Need a spot for your bags and other equipment? We thought of that too. Unroll the two attachable flaps for added storage space. Or just one for an extra shaded area.  

 

 

The air mattress is lightweight, supportive, comfortable, and inflates super easily with our pump sack. It has an insulation R-value of 1.3, and it’s made of polyester, making it strong and flexible.

 

 

Our sleeping bags aren’t actually sleeping bags. They’re super comfy blankets that zip right onto the bottom of the tent creating a snug pocket to cozy up in. They come in two variations:

Standard: weighs 150g | made of synthetic fibers | cold temperature limit of 59°F / 15°C

Down: weighs 375g | made of duck down | cold temperature limit of 40°F / 10°C

 

 

Because there’s nothing better than taking in fresh air when you’re outdoors. In RhinoWolf 2.0, we’ve added two air vents for improved air flow while you relax in your SuperTent.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our innovative 1-Pole frame makes for a faster set up in RhinoWolf 2.0. We’ve reengineered the single pole design by integrating the width poles AND pegs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We'll contact you after the campaign is over for your color choice. Choose between pink, light green and dark green.

story:
Scott Leland is a terrific set designer and an incredible team player. If you've seen a play in Portland, you've probably seen his work on stage. Last month, on the opening night of GREY GARDENS: THE MUSICAL, whose set he'd labored over tirelessly, he was returning from his day job (because we all have more than one job here in Maine if we work in theatre, right?) when smoke started billowing through his car vents. Within minutes, his car was engulfed in flames.

He was safe, but his car . . . well the picture speaks for itself.

The literal tools of his trade were all inside. Melted beyond recognition in most cases, useless in all.

We want to help him get back what he lost. In doing so, we'll be helping our own community - Scott's work brings beauty and style to our vibrant theater scene.


Here is an itemized list of what Scott lost in the fire:

Ryobi "Airstrike" One Plus brad nailer  $130.00

20 ounce fiberglass framing hammer   $25.00

Ryobi one plus P881 cordless impact driver w/ two lithium ion batteries and charger.                                                          $130.00

Ryobi one plus lithium ion slim battery   $50.00

Ryobi p712 cordless vacuum                    $25.00

Makita 5005BA 5-1/2 inch corded circular saw   $200.00

Dewalt 4pc plier pack                                  $10.00

Ryobi 12v lithium ion electric screwdriver w/ two batteries and charger.   $85.00

Dewalt DW1167 drill bit set                 $10.00

Stanley large pry bar (blue)                $9.00

Irwin mini pry bar                                  $4.00

(2) 25' tape measures                          $20.00

Remington safety glasses                  $5.00

Pack of carpenters pencils                 $5.00

Large FG work gloves                           $10.00

Tri-Square                                              $5.00

Metal Speed Square                            $9.00

Plastic Speed Square                          $3.00

2' Stanley Metal Level                         $12.00

Skil Corded Jigsaw                              $40.00

5-pack of jigsaw wood blades          $10.00

Bevel gauge                                          $8.00

25' extension cord                                $15.00

(2) Avanti 5.5" fast framing circular saw blades.    $22.00

1 SharpTooth hand saw                     $10.00

1 pack of Phillips #2 screwdriver tips     $2.00

3/4" paddle bit                                   $4.00

Ryobi "corner cat" corded sander    $30.00


TOTAL:  $898.00


We are asking that everyone band together to get Scott the money he needs. Please consider donating what you can. Be it money or even a tool off the list!
story_txt:
Scott Leland is a terrific set designer and an incredible team player. If you've seen a play in Portland, you've probably seen his work on stage. Last month, on the opening night of GREY GARDENS: THE MUSICAL, whose set he'd labored over tirelessly, he was returning from his day job (because we all have more than one job here in Maine if we work in theatre, right?) when smoke started billowing through his car vents. Within minutes, his car was engulfed in flames.He was safe, but his car . . . well the picture speaks for itself.The literal tools of his trade were all inside. Melted beyond recognition in most cases, useless in all.We want to help him get back what he lost. In doing so, we'll be helping our own community - Scott's work brings beauty and style to our vibrant theater scene.Here is an itemized list of what Scott lost in the fire:








Ryobi "Airstrike" One Plus brad
nailer  $130.00






20 ounce fiberglass framing
hammer   $25.00
Ryobi one plus P881 cordless
impact driver w/ two lithium ion
batteries and charger.                                                          $130.00
Ryobi one plus lithium ion slim
battery   $50.00
Ryobi p712 cordless vacuum                    $25.00
Makita 5005BA 5-1/2 inch corded
circular saw   $200.00
Dewalt 4pc plier pack                                  $10.00
Ryobi 12v lithium ion electric
screwdriver w/ two batteries and
charger.   $85.00
Dewalt DW1167 drill bit set                 $10.00
Stanley large pry bar (blue)                $9.00
Irwin mini pry bar                                  $4.00

(2) 25' tape measures                          $20.00
Remington safety glasses                  $5.00
Pack of carpenters pencils                 $5.00
Large FG work gloves                           $10.00
Tri-Square                                              $5.00
Metal Speed Square                            $9.00

Plastic Speed Square                          $3.00

2' Stanley Metal Level                         $12.00

Skil Corded Jigsaw                              $40.00

5-pack of jigsaw wood blades          $10.00
Bevel gauge                                          $8.00
25' extension cord                                $15.00




(2) Avanti 5.5" fast framing circular saw blades.    $22.00
1 SharpTooth hand saw                     $10.00

story:
Introduction 

  • Hi! My name is Saqera Maat Jones, I am 16 years old and I am a junior at the Denver School of Science and Technology. 
  • I am using this campaign to raise awareness about the service learning trip my school goes on every year. This trip takes 42 students to various parts of Latin America to build homes for families in need. 
  •  I have always been inspired by the idea of creating something as special as a home. Not a house, but a home, where families can share their love and support for one another in a stable and clean living environment. This trip would allow me to discover the value of contributing to something bigger than myself and would help touch the lives of others. 

 

 

Fundraising Goal

I would love to be able to give gifts to the families while I'm there and this money goes towards to the service learning club at school!

story:
Wanna enjoy your game until the sun goes down? Get Sol-Mat and you'll get what you desire!

 

What is Sol-Mat?

Sol-Mat is a picnic mat which can generate solar generated electricity using solar panel, combined with LED lighting system.

Sol-Mat is powerful enough to charge your digital device as if you charge it with a wall charger.

 

Dr. JSun has created what we esteem as the world’s most efficient solar cell available now.

We incorporated those cells into our new product Sol-Mat to provide people freedom of electricity. Now, moments spent outside will never get dull for the worry of dying smartphone or cameras.

Charging through Sol-Mat will allow you to experience fast charging speed as if you plugged your charger at home into the power socket on the wall.

Enjoy free, earth-friendly, healthy, sustainable solar energy with Sol-Mat.

Also, do not hesitate to go outside at night because Sol-Mat will light your space up! :)

 

 

How did   came up with the idea?

Increasing number of people nowadays are trying to enjoy their lives outside their homes and offices.

Also, it became essential that we have our digital devices ready with us to enjoy our time to the fullest, such as smart phones, digital camera, tablet pc and so forth!

Furthermore, earth is getting hotter and hotter with global warming. There must be earth-friendly way to enjoy our lives.

So, Dr.JSun took these three facts into consideration and came up with the idea of Sol-Mat.

Picnic mat is the basic item to take out with you when you do any kind of outdoor activity and adding solar panel to this mat created something extraordinary.

By using Sol-Mat, people can now enjoy their outdoor activity with unlimited access to electricity born from the sun.

Sol-Mat will generate electricity as long as there is sun outside. With Dr.JSun’s technology, Sol-Mat increased its sunlight-capturing ability to its fullest that it still works even under the shade…though the generation power will be bit weaker than in direct sunlight, obviously ;P

Not only that, Dr.JSun took into consideration that people also do stay outside even after the dark. So Sol-Mat has LED lighting system that can be lighted up with any power source with USB port. With this lighting, you can spot your Sol-Mat no-prob even in the darkest night.

 

 

When to use Sol-Mat?

Dr.JSun gives you few of the examples:

  1. any picnic
  2. outdoor party time
  3. outdoor game time
  4. rock festival
  5. jazz festival
  6. any kind of festival where you have to sit down
  7. lining up before entering a concert
  8. line waiting for new iPhone
  9. line waiting for anything new and hot and sexy
  10. on campus grass during your spare
  11. obviously, camping
  12. hiking
  13. anywhere on the grass
  14. anywhere on the earth

Just use Sol-Mat anywhere you need electricity outside!

 

How to use Sol-Mat?

Spread out like any other picnic mat.

When done using it, fold and roll it up and you are ready to leave! Or, you can fold the whole thing in a square like any other picnic mat :)

 

How to make Sol-Mat more intelligent?

There are two USB port with Sol-Mat and constantly generated electricity under the sun. Any ideas?

You can use a USB fan, or USB mosquito repellent, or USB lighting etc etc

Anything that works with USB port!  

This will be amazing especially during summer time, when you will definitely receive Sol-Mat from us. Sadly with 2016 came the Zika Virus, and you wouldn’t know what next is coming in 2017.

However, by using our USB port and mosquito repellent product, you will be more safe doing outdoor activity.

And by using a fan, you could enjoy cooler time outside

 

 

How great is Sol-Mat's 15W solar panel?

As you can see, you can perfectly rely on Sol-Mat for its excellent performance!

 

Specifications

 

How did Dr.JSun realized her idea?

Sol-Mat Design Sketch requirements:

1. It should be portable therefore foldable

2. Should be portable so shouldn’t be so big, yet still powerful

By fulfilling those two requirements, Dr.JSun created the final design where there are

3 powerful solar panel that produce 15 W energy + a picnic mat foldable to a size of a handbag.

 

 

Based on this outline, Dr.JSun created her final prototype with a final size of :

When spread out, 208 x 97.5 x 0.2 cm. Great size for one or two person to use at once!
When folded, only 33 x 23 x 11 cm, a size of a handy handbag.
And last but not least, it only weight 1.17 kg which is extremely light for an item containing 15 W solar panel!

(photo taken during summer time)

After taking this photo, Dr.JSun has done some more tests and the product seems good to be made!

(photo taken in the winter time)

Now, back us up and get this high-tech solar mat! Help us spread Sol-Mat all over the world. With your support, more people will be able to enjoy this earth-friendly state-of-the-art tech-savvy item! Summer is coming, so don't hesitate! Get one of your Sol-Mat and enjoy the season.

 

How do I know Sol-Mat works for real?

Check these videos =) or check out our shopping mall: drjsun.com

Our solar panel is reliable and we make sure it works!

 

What is 8000mAh power bank in the last perk?

This is also the creation by Dr.JSun, and she named it V8000. This portable power bank can fully charge your phone at least twice and a bit more for sure. Its 5V 2A output for your smartphones will fast charge both android and ios phones no prob. In addition, it can kick start your car when your car battery is out through its 12V output.

With Sol-Mat, you can fully charge this power bank in less than 3 hours under 1 sun condition (which means more or less sunlight at 11am ~ 1 pm in perfect day condition).  So if you go out and have lunch picnic on Sol-Mat, then V8000 will also eat sunlight and be full when you get full :P

Plus! it has 4 indicator lights so you check the fullness

More so, unlike other power bank, V8000 has On-Off switch which prevents natural discharge. Therefore, if you want to charge your phone, link it to V8000 and press the switch. After using it, unlink your phone and V8000 will automatically cut off its electricity supply and prevent natural loss.

V8000 also comes in 3 colors so have fun choosing them!

 

 

What we guarantee in this campaign

  1. Perfect product: we will dedicate our factory solely for Sol-Mat production. We will check all the Sol-Mat for the defect and send you only the ones without any flaws.
  2. Perfect delivery: since there will be no delay in the creation of Sol-Mat after the campaign ends, we will guarantee you FAST DELIVERY. Within 1 month, we will ship your products for sure.
  3. Perfect after service: after you receive your product and by some awful delivery accident, you got defected Sol-Mat, we will RE-SEND the mat for FREE. Send us the picture of broken Sol-Mat and we’ll get back to you ASAP ‘cause you are our faithful backer and we are here to give back your love which you gave us =)

 

Risk & Challenge

Though our company has been producing solar cell products since 2011, this is our first time managing and delivering products internationally. Therefore, there could be some short shipping delays.

However, on the product side, we are extremely confident of the capability of our Sol-Mat and we are not worried AT ALL about the failure of our solar cells to generate electricity!

Also, we have a production line that can produce Sol-Mat at no time. When the campaign ends, we will focus our production line solely on producing Sol-Mat so that we can send you guys what you backed us up for. So please be patient, and we will deliver you what you expect =)

 

FAQ

Q. What’s included in the package?

A. Sol-Mat, how-to-use pamphlet, one USB cable is the basic option. Or you can add 50 dollars more to get 8000 mAh portable power bank!

Q. Can I pay without a credit card?

A. No. During the Indiegogo campaign, we’re only accepting payments through Indiegogo. After the campaign ends, you’ll be able to buy Sol-Mat online on www.drjsun.com for retail price of $150.

Q. What happens if the weather is cloudy?

A. Solar cell inside the Sol-Mat is powerful enough to catch sunlight even under shady days. However, it will be inevitable that power generation will be lower than as stated.

Q. What happens if it rains?

A. Solar cell inside the Sol-Mat is powerful enough to catch sunlight even under the raindrops. However, it will be inevitable that power generation will be lower than as stated.

Q. How much is the shipping cost?

A. It is capped at $20 USD per Sol-Mat. If it costs more, Dr.JSun will pay the rest so don't worry.

Q. Can I save the electricity generated during the daytime?

A. Sol-Mat itself cannot save the electricity as it simply is a generator. However, you can indeed save all the solar energy generated by linking any portable power bank through the USB Port.

Q. How durable are the solar cells?

A. We assure you that the cells will work to its best for at least 10 years.

Q : Can I spill food on Sol-Mat?

A : Sol-Mat is consisted of two parts. 15 W solar panel and a mat. 15W solar panel is designed to be waterproofed so all you need to do would be to wipe away the food. However, the mat is made of a cloth so it would be bit more difficult to do so. Still, the bottom side of the mat is waterproof, so you wouldn't need to worry of water soaking in from under :P

Q : Isn't it heavy?

A : Sol-Mat provides exceptional quality compared to a disposable vinyl mat. PEVA coated side of the mat is indeed a little bit heavier than the disposable one. However, it is only 1.17kg! (More precisely, 1.165 kg) Quite light considering that it contains 15 W solar panel, as panel itself weights around 0.5 kg. Also, some weight is better to have, for the mat easily flies away by the wind =]

Q. I want more than one Sol-Mat, what do I do?

A. Simply get one more perk. We will check and pay you back the extra shipping fee you have paid when we send out our Sol-Mat.

Q. I want more than one Sol-Mat, but I’ve already pledged for one. What do I do?

A. Simply get one more perk. We will check and pay you back the extra shipping you have paid when we send out our Sol-Mat. Also, We will ship your Sol-Mats together at once, no worries.

Q. Will I be able to pre-order Sol-Mat after the campaign?

A. No, we are only taking pre-order at indiegogo. After our campaign ends, our products will be sold on Dr.JSun’s shopping mall: www.drjsun.com

Q. What's your official logo?

A. We have two logo for Dr.JSun! We use them according to different occasions so don't be confused =]

  and

story:
The Idea:

 We set out to enhance bike riding experience without introducing any drawbacks; the result was LightWheel, now our goal is to share the development with You!

 LightWheel comes in to play when the lighting conditions worsen and makes you and your bike more visible than in direct sunlight!

Benefits:

  • makes you and your bike visible from any distance during dark hours
  • can charge any mobile device while on the go (including iPhone and Android devices)
  • gives you and your bike a unique look
  • Affordable to enyone! (target selling price will be below 50$)

Details:

Comprising of

  • a special self adhesive film
  • active black light emitters (LEDs one for each side of the wheel)
  • USB power source that powers the emitters and can charge any mobile device
All Things Considered:
  • It's simple reliable and elegant
  • Does not rob you or your bike of power 
  • Does not introduce additional drag
  • Weights as much as an empty drink bottle

LightPack - The heart of LightWheel:

 At the heart of LightWheel is a unique USB power source that does more things than one:

  • Has capacity of 3000mAh (can last for weeks)
  • Can Charge any mobile device that supports USB charging
  • Can be Recharged from any powered USB source
  • Portable and Light (take it anywhere, trips, vacations, etc.)

 

What We Need & What You Get

 We have two prototype LightWheel equipped bikes, that are being used for testing, but we require more people to participate ang give us feedback on how we can improve this product.

 We need work out manufacturing issues which depend on the scale of this project and level of interest, and we want to make it affordable for everyone!

 If we reach our goal of 12.000$ we can approach a competitive price of 35$ + shipping cost for the complete kit!

Short Term Goals:

  • Create a gallery and a promotional video for the product (rent video equipment as cheap cameras are not capable of capturing blur free images in low light conditions) 
  • Create an online shop through which we will sel and support the product worldwide

The Impact

 Help us succeed and bring this project to life. Be a part of making our society healthier more active and safer!

Ways You Can Help

-Contribute any ammount you wish
-Claim any of the listed perks (on the right)
-If you like the idea and wish to help:

  • Tweet about it!
  • Share on Facebook!
  • Tell your friends!

 Help us succeed and bring this project to life. Be a part of making our society healthier more active and safer!

story:
a rootfolks freedom ride

why are you doing this? you're 70-years-old, what are you trying to prove? what is on your mind? are you reaching for some goal? 

often i am asked these questions by people who know and luv me; other people who know nothing about me; people who meet me on the road and seeing me astride transporter, know that i’m going somewhere, and stop to question. all these are good people curious to know why a 70-year-old blackman of meagre means is on a motorcycle with a plan of traveling 12-18 months to every one of the lower 48 states ––and in asking, they expect an answer, some word around which they mite wrap their own life experience. simply, they are searching for some way to see me in their measure of time and space. but unapologetically, i have no answer for them. i no longer even attempt to fashion answers that will alleviate curiosity, concern, consternation, angst or envy. i am very simply on the road to learn why i am on the road. 

i've called this a rootfolks freedom ride: a sojourn across america to locate the consciousness of liberation among afrikan people –– and, most appropriately, that search begins with my self. while i have faced down and walked away from death row, i know death is always at hand, at my age it is palpably a lot closer. this ride is not a bucketlist item, far from it, it is an inspiration from my ancestors rooted in my core experience. the ancestors have invited me to this quest, and honored, i accepted their offering without question, knowing that simply engaging the opportunity will make me more human.

some would say the point of being human is to accept the responsibility to question, for in the question lies the path to learning, and thru learning one knows how to apply the knowledge that living simply opens. i have no argument with that, and during my years there have been times when i have followed this rational course. not now. but if that course is what you have chosen, i salute you; but here, now, that approach does not work for me ––and i find too much thinking to be a vexation of spirit. i choose the road of intuition. the opinion of the other, while considered, is not required. 

of course, my safety is the principal concern of the people who luv me. i acknowledge and appreciate their concern. after all, i am an aging afrikanman, blind in one eye, traveling across a country that again and again has proven its hatred of the afrikan presence in its midst. my people are afraid i may have gone crazy; that i may be trying to commit suicide, or that i am

delusional, thinking i have powers i could not possibly possess. be assured, i am not insane. i am not doing today what i did yesterday and expecting a change to come. i am simply living, or said more accurately, living simply. i know that all i have is rite now. tomorrow, i may not have eyes to navigate the road,  or even be among the living. rite now is when i can experience this land and its people. i want to see and find relationship and so. . . .

i gratefully accept your prayers, your best wishes, and certainly your contributions ––and if we meet along the road, please stop and say hello. peace and blessings!  

monthly budget

shelter480.00 (6 days @ 80/day >30days)

gas165.00 (45mi/gal @ avg 3500mi/mo)

maintenance120.00 (oil change @ 1500mi)

food450.00 (per diem 15 x 30)

medical475.00 (per flite to eye doc) 

miscellaneous170.00/mo

total1860.00/mo 


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about Rootfolks.com
  • Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to let others know about our campaign!

story:
About us

We are a cycling club from Buzet, Croatia, who are exited to bring a thrilling event to life.

Buzet Cycling Club is a non-profit sports association founded in early 2006, and a member of Croatian Cycling Federation (HBS). We are a bunch of enthusiasts, friends, mtb lovers who spend most of their time mountain biking.

By now we have organized various events, both professional and amateur. Last year's DH Buzet race was visited by nearly 230 riders and about 2 500 spectators. Both Croatian and Slovene cycling federation have recognized our commitment and serious approach to work which is why DH Buzet is a Croatian Cup, Slovene Cup, as well as u UCI Class 2 race.

What We Need 

We'd like to ask you, passionate mountain bike enthusiasts, to help us generate funds for the precious mtb event in this corner of the world. Our aim is to raise €5000 and invest it to cover the expenses of DH Buzet.

•  Every Euro you donate will go towards organizing expenses such as timing system, medical assistance, media adds and the like. 

•  Why €5000? This is the amount that will get this event going, get it to a higher level and it will have a huge impact on future editions.

Even if we don't reach our goal, we will still change the community's perception towards this great sport.

Where does your money go?

The raised money will be used to cover the event's organizing expenses. Primarily for the necessary facilities like the timing system, medical aid, course works, shuttle rent but also for media coverage and adds, promo materials, commissaries and marshal fees etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution, that's OK you can still:

•  Make some noise about our campaign and get other bike loving bandits on board.
•  Share our campaign using Indiegogo share tools.

If you think you can help us in any other way, please let us know.

story:
Temple Israel of Long Beach was the very first Synagogue opened on the South Shore Barrier Island and dates back to 1920. With one of the largest physical facilities, it seems to have suffered the most extensive damages from the storm. The three building complex had its entire lower level completely compromised and under 10 feet of water. The Synagogue lost 6 Sifrei Torah, which have been certified totally irreparable. The lower level included a daily chapel, fully stocked Judaic library, conference room, 4 religious school classrooms, computer lab, social hall, 2 sets of bathrooms, youth lounge, dairy kitchen and full utility room including boilers,  air conditioning equipment and electric service. The Synagogue still remains without any basic services, heat or electric and just held Shabbat services for the first time since the storm, with the use of a generator and temporary heating. The membership is largely displaced and scattered, as far away as Florida, with many not sure when they will be able to return to their homes.

Just as we are moving forward with our own lives, we, as a community, need to begin to rebuild and rededicate, with your generousity.

story:
The simple clip carabiner is a minimal masterpiece: stronger than you can imagine!

Made of 100% solid Grade 5 Titanium, this carabiner is super strong, lightweight, and will never wear out.  Made from a single piece of titanium so there are no moving parts to wear out. 

Our carabiner is elegantly handcrafted and shaped from just one piece of aerospace Titanium.

3mm thick, solid Titanium, but astonishingly weighs less than 5 grams (0.17 oz)!

It is resistant to corrosion in sea water, acids, and chlorine: nearly equivalent to platinum. 

It is hypoallergenic. Titanium is the most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body, and the only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it.  

The simple design makes it easy and convenient to lock or unlock your keys. 

No complicated parts, it is the perfect forever carabiner you can take anywhere.

Have the coolest look on your hip! Pledge now and get yours today!

story:
Young people are our future!

Polish-Japanese Friendship Foundation NAMI is NGO (non-goverment organization), founded in 2013 in Wroclaw, Poland. Since we formed, we have organized many Japanese-culture events and invited famous Japanese artists. We manage our constant activities, which let young people meet Japanese culture. We organize  kendo lessons in Ryushinkai club, where we established a special group for children. We do Japanese language lessons for Polish people and many more. 

This year one of our biggest events that we organize is Nami Kendo Taikai. It is the third edition of the International tournament, which gather lot of people from all around Europe. Taikai is the event which gives a good chance to meet people from another countries, challenge their kendo skills and gain more knowledge about kendo.  NAMI Foundation always try to create something new, which may give possibility to meet Japanese culture and develop relationships between Japan and other nations. Therefore, we set up an extraordinary prize for the winner, whose age is between 18 and 26 years old. This prize is the one week stay in Tokyo, in purpose to practice kendo in police kendo dojo with sensei Sugawara Tadanori (7 dan kendo kyoshi). Fixed term of visitation in Japan, is around 15th of Janurary 2018. 

Why the winner should travel so far? Because Japan is the homeland of kendo and practicing there gives the best chance to develop kendo skills. For young kendoka such long distance travel is often beyond financial possibilities. That is why we decided to establish this trip as the main prize in NAMI Taikai and we hope you can support us in that project.

This is a big project for non-profit organisation that is why we count on your support and do believe that together we will succeed!

What We Need & What You Get

The budget of our project is 1800$. We collect funds to cover the costs of round trip ticket from Warsaw to Tokyo and for the accomodation in Japan. We established this budget according to our current experience of traveling to Japan. We hope all of you will understand and accept this one.  

Remember that we prepare special items for our donators! Please donate and choose the one that is most interesting and unique for you. Our gifts are mostly related to NAMI Foundation and Ryushinkai Kendo Dojo. They will be a visible sign of both: your support and our gratitude. 

The Impact

As we already mentioned, young people are our future. We do believe that this kind of prize will open young people for other culture and broaden their horizons. This will let to maintain a long term relationship with Japanese culture and spread the knowledge about this beutiful country.

As this is strictly related to the way of sword – Kendo we do think that through the practice young people can obtain the main values which are brought into life with this discipline.

These aspects were defined by All Japan Kendo Federation in 1975:

"To mold the mind and body"

"To cultivate a vigorous spirit"

 "To hold in esteem human courtesy and honor"

 "To associate with others with sincerity"

 "To love his/her country and society"

"And to promote peace and prosperity among all peoples"

Thank you for your support!

story:
The goal of this campaign is to raise funds to make renovations and upgrades to a New Orleans area apartment building that has stood through two hurricanes since I purchased it.

(Here is my story)

  An Invisible Man in the Highly Visible City of New Orleans

Here is the road leading to the beloved city of New Orleans. Going west to get to the east bank and going east to get to the west bank. Those who know New Orleans know what I'm talking about. There is the Super dome in the foreground. Several years after the devastation of Hurricane Katrina, people are again flocking to the French Quarter, Business District, Garden District, and other attractions of the area.

But this is a story about a part of the city and surrounding area unknown, and a people unseen. Though New Orleans is one of the most visible cities in the world, some of its neighborhoods and the people in them, have still not fully recovered years after Katrina and remain largely invisible. So even though some of you may know who I am, I will remain invisible for the purpose of this story, as a symbol of the local people of New Orleans and the rest of the area.

I was born and raised in Louisiana, with its wonderful mix of people, music, food, landscape, and cultures. I took these things for granted though, until I moved away. While living in California I saw the interest that other people had in the natural beauty and the culture of South Louisiana. So, I joined with friends and began sharing what I know and love of my original home state as a tour leader in New Orleans and other parts of Southern Louisiana, and I decided to invest in the city of New Orleans. I bought an old apartment building with the dream of fixing it up and providing low-cost housing for local peoples. I still think it is one of my better ideas.

But wait... my deal closed just one week before Hurricane Katrina. And like so many other people down here affected by the hurricane, I have had years of struggles with insurance companies, and contractors. I had another setback with a hurricane named Isaac, and another losing battle with the insurance company. Still, I have managed to hold on to my prized possession, determined to prove that investing in this city was one of my better ideas. I believe that with the help of people like you and the power of crowd funding I can still make that dream come true.

Here is the building where my small part of the vision of rebuilding New Orleans will happen. It is a 16-unit, U-shaped apartment building with two 1-bedroom, two studio, and twelve 2-bedroom units. It's still standing strong like a symbol of the people here, though it's a little bit more plain and unassuming than many of them.

However with the help of your contributions. I will take it to a level that befits the City of New Orleans. Your contributions will help with needed upgrades inside and out, like adding shutters and a metal roof to help prevent damage from future hurricanes. I will be able to furnish some of the units to continue to fund the renovations, beautify the courtyard, and once again provide much-needed housing for New Orleans-area locals, as well as a low-cost alternative for visitors who would like to share their love of the city. The project will also help purchase property for additional parking.

In recognition, contributors of $25 or more will get their name etched or engraved in a paver in the courtyard. For greater contributions, as outlined on the campaign page, you will be offered a stay in one of my 2 bedroom units... so you will be able to see for yourself the progress of the cause. Even if you don't have money to contribute, you can contribute by sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, or by email.

All contributions (any amount) are welcome, and I thank each of you who is able to help make the vision of an invisible man come true, by contributing to the ongoing recovery of a great city and its wonderful people.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Alexandra I am 18 years old and I am passionate about helping my community and people all around. 

I've been following this trip for the past two years and have grown a passion each time I watch a biker ride in after this long and life changing ride. So, I've decided to participate in it myself.  

My campaign is about raising money for a 300 mile bike trip that I am participating in. The goal for the trip is for each member registering to raise $900, at minimum, for the children of make a wish foundation so that they may have the chance to have one real wish come true. 

If money is donated and I am able to raise money for this no-profit group I can participate in this bike trip that I've been training for the past few months. But not only will I be able to participate, but the money you donate will make a child's wish come true. T he money you donate will help light up a child's face and fill them with pure feelings of joy, happiness, comfort and magic if only for brief moments. Your donation will be the reason a child's biggest dream cane true

What We Need & What You Get

  • I will need at least $900 and it will be directly going to Make A Wish foundation.
  • If, for some reason I am unable to raise $900, whatever is raised will still be given to Make A Wish.
  • There's nothing more rewarding than lending a hand to those in need.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I know times are tough and people live pay check to pay check, so if you see this and aren't financially stable enough to donate, spreading the word sharing this campaign with others is completely free. 
  • Help me to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Drift W1 is designed to be lightweight and portable with endless fun and numerous stylish ways to ride.

Hooray!! Order now to get 6% off your Drift W1 and enjoy a tax-free delivery.

 

Segway's Exclusive Partner

Contact: info@longhamtec.com

Customer service: wecare@segway.com

  

With the high-end engineering that everyone expects from Segway, the new Drift W1 offers something new and fun to the trendsetter in you.

Unlike traditional roller skates, the Drift W1 is no longer attached to a rider’s feet, so the rider can step on and off promptly in case of emergency. 

Not just the most portable E-skate on the market, Drift W1 is also security friendly. You can take it with you as a carry on luggage on cruises, trains, planes and even "rockets".

Check out how Drift W1 works on different terrains.  You can ride your Drift W1 where you would normally ride your skates. The Drift W1 works well on smooth floors and paved surfaces, both indoor and outdoor. Please do not ride on public streets.

The Drift W1's innovative design allows the rider to maneuver easily and precisely. Ride on and pass through the crowd with no difficulty.

With 18 years of research and development on this product, the Drift W1 is one of the lightest and most portable transportation toll on the market. Each individual component is expertly designed and manufactured by Segway.

Drift W1 is equipped with two detached, independent skates weighting at 7.7 pounds each. The e-skates comes with a maximum speed of 7.5 mph, a maximum payload of 220 lbs, and a torque of lower than 6 Nm to optimize the steering and riding experience.

Don't be misled by the first impression - Drift W1 is easy to learn and fun to master. Built on over 800 patents, Segway’s proven and stable self-balancing technology makes Drift W1 very easy to pick up and navigate. Step on, and you will get going effortlessly in minutes.

Drift allows the rider to ride spontaneously and balances easily with each foot. Although it is easy to learn, professionals are still able to experience the excitement of the process through a variety of challenging riding and freestyle options. 
 
You can skate continuously for up to 45 minutes on a single charge.
Elastic bands at the rear end allow you to easily hold on both skates in one hand.

The stylish RGB light sparkles and reflects off the ground while in operation. Lighting can be adjusted among 3 modes. Drift W1 is designed to fit riders of different ages. You can create memorable experiences by riding along your family or friends, on the weekends or in your leisure time.

At Segway, we value your safety as our top priority. The Drift W1 is therefore built with many key safety features to keep our riders safe on the road.

To ensure your safety, we advise all Drift W1 riders to ride with protective gears.

                                                          

The Exclusive Offer $369 (MSRP $499)

We are giving out great deals to our Indiegogo backers, including special discounts and free gift packages. The more you buy, the more you save.

 

Please share your love and spread words about our campaign to help us reach the stretch goals listed below and “UNLOCK” all the extra goodies to come with your Segway Drift W1 for FREE. 

 

 

 

      

Every step of the way, Segway’s world-class team has pursued excellence in personal transportation and a deeply integrated software-hardware product development.

There are already over 10000 pairs of Drift W1 waiting in the warehouses all around the world for shipment to you right away!

Segway-Ninebot is the world’s leading provider of electric personal transportation, valued at over 1.5 billion USD. Our business covers in more than 80 countries and regions around the world. Over six million users purchase products and services from Segway-Ninebot each year.

 

 

 

 

Q: Is Drift W1 approved for passing through airport security?

A:  Yes. You are able to check Drift W1 as a luggage or even carry it on with you.

Q: Can I switch between different speed modes when I ride my Drift W1？

A: Segway Drift W1 has only one mode. 

Q: What is the waterproof performance of Segway Drift W1？

A: Drift W1 has a waterproof grade of IP54 and a battery waterproof grade of IPX6. 

Q: What battery is used in Segway Drift W1? How long does it take to charge the e-skates?

A: Drift W1 uses the lithium-ion battery. It takes 3 hours to fully charge.

Q: What kind of tires is used in Segway Drift W1? How do I inflate the tires？

A: Segway Drift W1 uses solid rubber tires. You don't need to inflate the tires.

Q: What are the requirements for riding a Segway Drift W1?

A: The rider should be between 6 to 60 years old, and weighs between 22-220lbs (10 to 100kg). Riders under 16 years old must ride under adult supervision.

Q: Are each of the two Drift W1 E-skates identical to each other?

A: Yes, the two skates are exactly the same.

Q: Why does my Segway Drift W1 appear to be dusty and slightly used?

A: Each pair of W1 passes a quality riding test before delivery to ensure the product meets the quality standards of Segway. You may spot slight traces of dust on tires as a result of the riding test.

Q: Where can I ride my Drift W1?

A: You can ride your Drift W1 where you would normally ride your skates. The Drift W1 works well on smooth floors and paved surfaces, both indoor and outdoor. Avoid bumps, uneven roads, motorways, highways, and deep slopes while using our product.

Q: Will low temperature affect my riding experience？

 A: Low temperature is likely to affect the mileage and cause power failure of the e-skates. Typically the mileage may be down to less than half of standard mileage at -10℃.

Q: Can I disassemble the battery from my Segway Drift W1?

A: Segway Drift W1 should not be disassembled by the user.

Q: What is the campaign's refund policy? 

A: Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy here.

In the event that you wish to cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made but before we ship out your order, we will assess an administration fee of 50% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder. We do not accept refund after shipment.

Q: What is the limited warranty policy? 

A: We do not accept returns for Drift W1. Segway will replace or repair your product in accordance with the terms of our Limited Warranty. If you have further questions regarding repair, please contact technicalsupport@segway.com, and our customer service team will get back to you to further assist you with technical support.

driftw1.crowdfunding@segway.com

story:
On July 19th, four friends are embarking on the trip of a lifetime - driving from London to Ulan-Ude, Russia as part of The Adventurists' Mongol Rally to raise funds and awareness for charity. Specifically, we are supporting charity: water and Cool Earth's respective missions to bring clean water to underserved communities and protect the world's disappearing rainforests. 

To get there in (mostly) one piece, we need your help. We are looking to raise $5,000 for charity: water and Cool Earth's amazing work, and $5,000 to cover the costs of airfare, visas, a car, and equipment. Half of every dollar donated will go to charity, ensuring that we make an impact on their programs no matter how much we raise. 


* Photo credits throughout: Tom Archer, http://www.tomarcherphoto.co.uk/

story:
Opening up a business is fun and exciting. And it’s even more fun and more exciting when you can share it with friends and family. Our business is still in its infancy stage so we want to offer you our Baby Llama VIP packages. We think it’s a great way to raise some capital while extending discounts and fun perks to our friends and family. And you know what, feel free to go ahead and tell all your friends and families too. 

We have been working nonstop over the last 6 months to make this hostel a reality. And it is getting closer and closer by the day. The logistics and unexpected costs have started to add up a bit. The money generated from this campaign will be used to put the final touches on everything and help us create the exact space we have envisioned. 

There are only a few specific things we’re lacking that would really complete the hostel. We would love to have a new audio system and new tables and furniture for the bar and lounge. The old stereo system can’t handle another dance party and the poor furniture that was left behind has been sat on one too many times. These small but major things will make all the difference to the look and vibe of the hostel. If you want to help us and know you’re not likely to use one of our discounted packages, we’ve added an option for you to donate specifically to these items.

There is no way to thank you enough for purchasing one of these packages or donating to us. We will be forever grateful.

Take the time you need to make travel plans. All offers above are good through the end of 2022. 

Come join us and turn our adventure into your adventure. We can’t wait to see you!!

 

-Sammy and Eric
