story:
We have fulfilled the first generation of Travelock and gathered feedback from over 1,000 backers in 32 countries. With serval months of hard work and improvements, we’re back with Travelock 2S. The most obvious one is that TRVELOCK 2S has been approved by the Transport Security Authority (TSA).  As for safety construction, it's upgraded and more sturdy and safer. As for the steel cord, with several months improvements, it pops up automatically now, more convenient and user- friendly.

 

Share our campaign with your friends and earn cash for helping us spread the word! Click the link below for more information on this great offer.

Millions of people lose their luggage every year due to low-quality locks. At TRAVELOCK 2S, we have used this as inspiration, sparing no effort in the development of a true solution. We spent countless hours researching and evaluating hundreds of traditional locks and smart locks in search of the best possible design. Our answer lies in a combination of the ultimate user-friendly features and safety mechanisms: an advanced fingerprint sensor lock. Its high-speed CPU guarantees user convenience; a research-inspired design provides the pinnacle of security.

TRAVELOCK 2S is a lightweight, multifunctional fingerprint smart lock. Its portability makes it the perfect option for anything! Use it on front doors, backpacks, luggage, bicycles and much more. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing that your belongings are safe.

Compared with traditional locks, Bluetooth smart locks, and ordinary fingerprint locks, TRAVELOCK 2S is much safer and more convenient, as it’s truly keyless. Competitors have a variety of negative drawbacks: traditional locks have losable keys Bluetooth and password locks can be hacked, and ordinary fingerprint locks have sensors that can easily be tricked.

TRAVELOCK 2S is designed to protect your belongings. Physical keys and combination codes are redundant. TRAVELOCK 2S is superior to the simple match-and-unlock mechanism on ordinary locks, as access is only allowed through your unique fingerprint.

By using Spring Coils, not only does it locks many pieces of luggage, but saves space.

Notices: (The spring coils must be purchased after purchasing Travelock 2S. If the spring coil is queried without Travelock 2S purchase record, it will not be shipped)

Unlike Bluetooth smart locks that run on Bluetooth connectivity, TRAVELOCK 2S is operated by independent AI, which drastically reduces the chances of information disclosure.

TRAVELOCK 2S supports a new kind of capacitive fingerprint sensor: up to 508 DPI which allows TRAVELOCK 2S to recognize rich fingerprint textures. It only responds to the fingerprints of living people, so fake silicone or gelatin fingerprints will be rejected by the sensors.

TRAVELOCK 2S uses an integrated stamping method to create a full zinc alloy casing, which prevents the brute force from breaking the lock. Its shackle is made of 304 high-strength steel wire, which holds up to 100 kg.

Made with 304 high strength steel wire, TRAVELOCK 2S shackle can hold up to 100 kg and withdraws the impact force of 5,000N at the same time. No one can cut it off easily, which helps protect your personal items.

TRAVELOCK 2S has an advanced fingerprint sensor which can read fingerprints in a full 360° of orientation. Up to 10 fingerprints can be registered into the lock so that you can share it with friends and family.

TRAVELOCK 2S is IP65 waterproof, dustproof, and it even works between temperatures of -10°C-45°C. This means that your lock will keep your items safe in the rain, allowing you to enjoy outdoor adventures.

TRAVELOCK 2S is tested at temperatures below freezing, so you can trust its reliability even in extreme environments.

TRAVELOCK 2S uses a 260mAh built-in battery, which has a tiny energy consumption (0.5μm), allowing for one year of normal use (with more than 5000 times of unlocking /locking action) or two years standby on a single charge.

We tried to make our product’s every detail perfect through thousands of design draft modifications. With the newest material and technology,TRAVELOCK 2S is half the size of TRAVELOCK 2S making it seamless to use. We now have a team of professional engineers, product developers and software developers who will improve the product quality and user experience before the long-awaited release date.

     

Established in 2017, MOEN (HK) Limited is committed to providing customers with a safer and more convenient unlock experience. Since its establishment, it has innovated and produced more than 10 fingerprint locks as a security unlock method with some experience manufacturers, which are named as AnySafe. AnySafe is developed to overcome customers hurdle on the daily life, improving the security levels and improving the poor experience. It is hoping that fingerprint locks will gradually replace the traditional locks in the next five years, especially on price and security level, bringing customers a safer and better product and service.

story:
About us and our expedition

We are a 4 person team from Poland, which is planning a freeride trip to Indian Himalayas in August of current year.

We have already been in Atlas in Morocco, on the volcanoes in Mexico and in Georgian Caucasus. We have visited Carpathian Mountains, Swiss Alps and Spanish Sierra Nevada. However, it is still not enough for us. We want to ride in places where no one has ridden before, in places where the trails end and go far beyond the limits of our endurance.

This year, we are planning to conduct a bike-exploration of the Himalayan region of Ladakh to find some spots for freeride. Our main goal is reaching the summit of Chamser Kangri (6622m above sea level) and an attempt of downhill from the top of it. Most probably it will be a record of the highest summit fully ridden down on a mountain bike.

View on the Tso Moriri lake and Chamser Kangri on the left (photo:Paweł Goleman)

It will be the real freeride without compromises. We will redefine the boundaries of high mountain riding. We will show that freeride is not limited by altitude or rough terrain. We will prove that bike is not only fun. It is a challenge and a dream.

Media patronage

To make some noise about our project we decided to get some media patronage:

 

What We Need

To make our dream come true, we need your help and support. Flight from Poland to India, travel to Ladakh, mountaineering gear and bike parts. Everything is very expensive. 

What You Get

For your contribution in our project we may offer you different perks, for details see column on the right.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Donate us – each cent helps us realize our dream
  • If you can’t support us financially, share our expedition with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, E-mail, blog or whatever way you find appropriate. Make some noise!
  • Visit our Facebook fanpage and like it! - Fanpage

Finally

We will be thankfull for every, even the smallest one, support you decide to give us. Thank you!

story:
Hello, my name is Aaron Overstreet. Thank you for taking the time to view my Indiegogo campaign to raise funds for my trip to India.

I work in the Holistic Healing field as a Certified Breathworker. The style of breathwork I teach is called "Rebirthing". I have been practicing Rebirthing-Breathwork for over 20 years. For me it has become more than just a career. It has become my passion and a way of life. To learn more about Rebirthing please visit my website www.rebirthingbreathworkpdx.com or visit the website for Rebirthing Breathwork International www.rebirthingbreathwork.com

Rebirthing-Breathwork was founded by a man named Leonard Orr.  Leonard is my teacher, mentor and friend. The trip that I am requesting funding for is a four week adventure led by Leonard in northern India. The trip begins with a 9 day Rebirthing-Breathwork/Spiritual Purification training in Chandigarh, which those of us traveling with Leonard will be helping to facilitate.

In addition to the 9 day training we will be visiting holy sites and the ashram of my and Leonard's guru Haidakhan Babaji. I've felt a strong connection to Babaji even before my involvement in Rebirthing-Breathwork, which makes this trip a special opportunity for me. Babaji's energy and presence has always been a guiding force behind the Rebirthing-Breathwork movement.

This trip will benefit me personally as well as my work as a Breathworker. I believe that visiting the land where the practices I teach originated will deepen and expand what I am able to offer to others.

I have my plane tickets and I am committed to the trip. The funds that I am campaigning for will go towards guide fees, transportation, food and lodging and any unexpected expenses. Funds will also help with the expenses of bills to be paid at home during my absence.

I wanted to wait to launch this fundraising campaign until I had my plane tickets. It will be a short campaign and will run for about two weeks in order for me to receive the funds before leaving.

Your help is greatly appreciated and to thank you for your contributions I am offering special gifts. For a $900 contribution I am offering 10 Rebirthing sessions and a Personal Law Consultation. For a $108 contribution I am offering a Rebirthing session. And for a $40 contribution I am offering a Personal Law Consultation. The Rebirthing sessions will need to be redeemed in person and scheduled after I return on Oct 22nd. The Personal Law Consultation can be done in person, over the phone or via skype, also scheduled after I return.

Any amount helps. This campaign is designed so that I receive all contributions whether or not I reach my goal. You can also help by sharing this campaign with others.

Thank you for your time and contributions!

You are helping to enrich my life which in turn will enrich what I am able to offer others.

With Infinite Gratitude,

Aaron
story_txt:
Hello, my name is Aaron Overstreet. Thank you for taking the time to view my Indiegogo campaign to raise funds for my trip to India.
I work in the Holistic Healing field as a Certified Breathworker. The style of breathwork I teach is called "Rebirthing". I have been practicing Rebirthing-Breathwork for over 20 years. For me it has become more than just a career. It has become my passion and a way of life. To learn more about Rebirthing please visit my website www.rebirthingbreathworkpdx.com or visit the website for Rebirthing Breathwork International www.rebirthingbreathwork.com

Rebirthing-Breathwork was founded by a man named Leonard Orr.  Leonard is my teacher, mentor and friend. In addition to the 9 day training we will be visiting holy sites and the ashram of my and Leonard's guru Haidakhan Babaji. I've felt a strong connection to Babaji even before my involvement in Rebirthing-Breathwork, which makes this trip a special opportunity for me. Babaji's energy and presence has always been a guiding force behind the Rebirthing-Breathwork movement. 

This trip will benefit me personally as well as my work as a Breathworker. I believe that visiting the land where the practices I teach originated will deepen and expand what I am able to offer to others.

story:
COWAROBOT R1 is the world’s first carry-on size robotics suitcase that stays with you at all times. With high tech features like autonomous travel and obstacle avoidance, the R1 frees your hands and makes traveling more enjoyable.

 

 

 

 

 

 

COWAROBOT R1 is your trusty travel companion that always try to follow by your side so as to stay in your line of sight. Even if it lags behind while avoiding obstacles, it will quickly catch up to you and return to its place next to you.

●  Moves at a speed of 4.5mph

●  Go up and down slopes of 15°

●  Run for 12.5 continuous miles when fully charged

 

The R1 can see and feel the world around it. Using CO-EYE, our patented depth sensor, a set of sonar and cliff detection sensors, R1 is constantly collecting and sending data back to the CO-MOVE autonomous following system. 

It pays attention so you don't have to.

With a simple double tap on your R1 bracelet, the CO-MOVE system will plan a path, and navigate COWAROBOT R1 around obstacles, making its way back to you.

Relax, sit back and have your belongings come to you.

 

 

You can choose to have the R1 follow you when your hands are full or pull it on your own.

●  Autonomous when you have too many bags

●  Autonomous when you’re carrying your children

●  Manual when you’re in a rush to check-in

●  Manual when you’re going up stairs or escalators

 

 

COWAROBOT R1 is also equipped with our patented CO-SMART intelligent locks. 

●  Automatically locks to keep belongings safe

●  R1 bracelet can be used as a keyless remote

●  LED ring around the lock tells you if it’s locked or unlocked

 

Through the proximity alarm and GPS tracking, you can rest assured that your luggage can be easily located.

●  If your luggage is too far from you, it will automatically notify your R1 bracelet

●  You can track where the luggage is with our App

●  Say goodbye to lost luggage.

 

Separate Compartments Design：

 

Front Compartment

●  One push open protected by CO-SMART lock

●  Documents and electronics can be stored here

●  Get through security swiftly

Main Compartment

●  Secured with the CO-SMART lock

●  Clothes and personal belongings can be stored here

No need to carry multiple bags on your next trip, when all you really need is the R1. 

 

 

The robotic components in R1 only take 4% of the total volume of a normal 20-inch suitcase.

● 21.6-inches x 15-inches suitcase

● Fits in an airport overhead compartment

● Able to pack enough for your trip

 

 

Keep your R1 and portable devices fully charged with our portable power bank.

●  Can be removed or attached

●  Charges the iPhone 6S Plus 9 times

●  96.5 watt portable powerbank

●  Complies with airport regulations

 

 

The power bank is easily removable, making airport security checks a breeze.

 

 

                         

 

There are so many things that you can do with the R1's proprietary App 

●  Control the CO-SMART locks

●  Record and share your travel

●  Monitor the status of your suitcase 

 

 

COWAROBOT R1 features futuristic technology that bring it to life, like the CO-EYE depth sensor, CO-MOVE autonomous following system, and CO-SMART intelligent locks. The technology was developed to allow the R1 to “see” the world around it, “think” of the best way to get there and “walk” to its destination, while keeping your valuables safe at all times.

 

 

CO-MOVE system is the brains of the R1, in charge of sensing the environment, planning reasonable paths, and obstacle avoidance, all while following its user. 

 

 

The sensing ability of the CO-MOVE system is made possible by:

●   Multi-sensor fusion technology, which is mainly based on a set of sonars

●   A depth sensor CO-EYE

●  Cliff Detect sensors that allow R1 to avoid stairs and other dangerous drop-offs

 

A pair of active wheel units drives the R1

●  Navigates the path according to the data received from the sensing system.

●  When the Autonomous Mode is disabled, the active wheels will retract, similar to an airplane landing gear.

 

CO-SMART intelligent Lock features an ergonomic design for comfort and syncs with a bracelet that acts like a keyless remote.

●  The on-board LED lights on the lock tell you whether the suitcase is locked or open.

●  Integrates a TSA lock and a traditional combination lock

●  Specially designed to be opened effortlessly by you through simply twisting the R1’s main compartment lock. 

 

                                           

 

●  All-aluminum frame and 100% German Bayer polycarbonate

●  Top notch construction quality

●  Modular design for convenience and space

●  Ergonomic handle with sensors

●  Ultra quiet wheels

●  Miniaturized electronic components

 

 

We have done numerous tests on the R1 to ensure that quality and build will last you on your many adventures. We've smashed it, rolled it over rugged terrain, threw it repeatedly against the ground, and stressed each and every component in order to test its resilience and construction quality.

 

 

We will be contacting all R1 owners before the delivery date, for you to choose your favorite color.

Whether you are purchasing the R1 for yourself or a friend, we want to make sure you are receiving the best product possible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Launched in 2013, COWAROBOT is a robotics company that brings proprietary robotics technology to the consumer market. Comprised of robotics enthusiasts with experience in both industrial and commercial robotics, the founding team is passionate about finding interesting and useful ways to incorporate robotics into everyday life.

 

 

We have over 60 team members from various international corporations, prestigious robotic labs and top tier universities all over the world. They are specialized in different fields, including Mechanical Design, Industry Design, Electronics Engineering, Sensing & System Architecture and Branding.

 

 

1. How fast can it go?

For safety reasons, we capped the R1’s speed at 4.5 mph. Fast enough to keep up with most people.

2. Does the R1 follow behind or beside the user?

When COWAROBOT R1 is in the Autonomous Mode, it will identify your unique tracking bracelet and autonomously follow you by your side.

3. Can I control the R1 by remote?

No, due to safety concerns we decided not to enable remote function on the R1.

4. How does the R1 avoid obstacles?

When CO-EYE detects an obstacle, it will relay the information back to the CO-MOVE System which will plan a path, and navigate the R1 around the obstacles, while still keeping up with you.

5. Is the R1 a carry-on?

Yes, COWAROBOT R1 is a carry on luggage with TSA approved locks and a Removable Power Source. The one-push open lid allows you to access the front storage compartment quickly and conveniently, to take out the removable power bank, laptop, and other electronics for security checks. 

6. Where can I get the APP?

Download the COWAROBOT App from App Store (for iPhone users) or Google Play (for Android users).

7. Can I bring the battery on my flight?

Yes, the R1 battery pack complies with the UN 38.3, UL and FCC standards. The capacity of battery is also in accordance with the FAA regulations (up to 100Wh per battery).

8. How many times can I recharge my iPhone 6S Plus?

The R1’s portable power bank can fully charge an iPhone 6S plus up to 9 times.

9. How do I charge my R1? 

Remove the portable power bank from the front compartment of the suitcase, then use the included power adapter to charge your portable power bank. it will be fully charged in around 1 hour and 45 minutes.

10. How heavy is it / What are its dimensions?

The R1 is a 20-inch carry-on luggage (21.7*14.9*7.9in) that weighs 10.5 pounds, consisting of an easy access front compartment, a spacious main compartment, and robotic components which make it autonomous.

11. What do I do if my R1 requires maintenance?

Please send us an Email at service@cowarobot.com if you have encountered any quality issues regarding your suitcase. We will give you a reply within 24 hours.

12. Does it come with a warranty?

Yes, a 1-year warranty, and an additional year for pre-order customers.

 

"On time delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and are not guaranteed"

 

 

                                                                          LEMORE

story:
PowerSiesta is the best way to sleep while traveling on planes, trains, or buses. With PowerSiesta you'll sleep better, deeper, and longer without back or neck strain – so you can arrive at your destination feeling refreshed and ready to go!

PowerSiesta is eco-friendly, lightweight, and easy to use. Just pop it open, wrap your arms around it, rest your head on top, and relax.

PowerSiesta's ergonomic shape — designed by an actual rocket scientist — works with the natural form of your body to alleviate muscle tension, so you can rest more deeply.

Simply open, fit the inside flaps together, place on top of your tray table and relax! When you're done simply fold it flat and slip it into your laptop bag or carry-on luggage with no extra bulk. Embark on your adventure well-rested and refreshed!

Because sleeping while traveling shouldn’t be a nightmare! Aren’t you tired of sleeping on planes with your head flopped back and your mouth wide open? Of waking up with your face buried deep into a stranger’s shoulder? Aren’t you tired of arriving at your destination TIRED and aching all over from uncomfortable sleep? Of course you are – and so are your fellow passengers!

Say no to uncomfortable, embarrassing sleeping positions wreaking havoc on your wellbeing – and just say sí to PowerSiesta! PowerSiesta lets you sleep (almost) wherever, and whenever you like, in unparalleled comfort. The sturdy, ergonomically-designed PowerSiesta ensures you get the high-quality sleep you need, so you can relax completely and arrive at your destination looking fresh as a daisy, and feeling like a million bucks. Designed by travelers for travelers, PowerSiesta has worried about all the technical bits – so you can just focus on having an awesome nap.

Your PowerSiesta nap set includes the washable, ultra-compact and comfy slide-on PowerSiesta pillow that makes napping on the go even more comfortable!


 

 

When simply looking at PowerSiesta for the first time, some doubt its ability to support high-quality sleep. But after trying it out, users’ feedback has all been the same: that the PowerSiesta napper is an incredibly comfortable tool they would happily add to their travel essentials.

 

 

Get the sleep of your dreams — no matter how you choose to get there. PowerSiesta can be used in various ways depending on your mode of transportation and preference. From commuting train journeys to long haul flights – wherever you go, PowerSiesta is ready to come along with you.

 

PowerSiesta napper is the simple, lightweight, and affordable solution for comfortable napping on the go. Ergonomically designed to allow your head to rest at a natural angle, PowerSiesta protects your neck and shoulders from unnecessary strain and damage. When not in use, the lightweight PowerSiesta is the size of a magazine, easy to take with you wherever you go. Then, when it’s time for another siesta, it pops open in seconds.

Other solutions are not only uncomfortable, embarrassing and bulky, but many are also made with materials that have a negative impact on the environment. Typical neck pillows are usually made with PET synthetic stuffing; polyurethane memory foam that can emit VOCs and other harmful chemicals; or polystyrene microbeads that are notoriously slow to biodegrade.

PowerSiesta is the comfortable, easy-to-clean, and environmentally friendly alternative that you can use over and over again – a welcome change from old-fashioned plastic pillows or dorky inflatable doodads. It's is made from high-grade corrugated cardboard which is durable enough to be used over and over and resists stains thanks to its smooth finish, but still 100% recyclable.

 

Can’t wait to get snoozing on the go in comfort? Then join us and get your hands (and head) on your very own PowerSiesta nap set – we’ve got all your power nap needs covered.

Whether you want one just for yourself, or share the gift of good napping with friends and family, we’ll have a reward to fit you like a pair of snug pajamas. Our rewards are in stock and shipping now!

Shipping to the US? Buy 2x or more PowerSiesta nap sets and get FREE US SHIPPING! Outside the USA? We offer easy flat rate shipping - just $15 to Europe, Canada and Mexico, and $19 everywhere else, no matter how many sets you order!

Get your PowerSiesta nap set now. What are you waiting for? Never have another uncomfortable flight again! Join the sleep revolution and click that pink button.

Friends don’t let friends sleep in funny positions while pics are being taken of them. So take a few seconds to share the love (and the sleep) with your friends, too:

 

 

 

 

 

Horacio Trucco, Martina Trucco and Luigi Gonzalez

We are PowerSiesta, LLC – a sustainable and socially responsible, family-owned design company with a passion for helping to make travelers' journeys more comfortable. As frequent travelers ourselves, we know how difficult it can be to arrive at your destination feeling well-rested and refreshed when you’re sitting in economy class. Unsatisfied with other solutions on the market, we took it upon ourselves to come up with a more convenient and comfortable way to sleep on flights, buses, and trains.

We also want to make a positive impact on the world we live in. That's why after the campaign, once our business is up and running, we’re committed to making donations to children's shelters around the world, because we believe that everybody deserves a good night's sleep.

Our first charitable partner will be Hogar Infantil Jesus Nazareno in Isabela, Puerto Rico.

We plan to expand contributions to the following organizations among other highly effective children’s charities:

 

We started with the mission of finding a better, more comfortable way to sleep while traveling. Horacio, an aeronautical engineer with over 50 years of experience and 10 issued and pending patents for his inventions, came up with the first idea for the PowerSiesta. He and Luigi then spent over 18 months of research and development optimizing the design of the PowerSiesta for maximum comfort in the simplest form possible.

Now, almost two years later after lots of ideation and extensive testing and prototyping, we're thrilled to share our patent-pending PowerSiesta napper with you.

We can’t wait to have your support! Have questions or comments? Please leave a comment or send us a message!

Try it. If you don't love it, send it back. 100% Money Back guarantee.

Risks and Challenges

We have been developing and testing PowerSiesta for almost two years to ensure that our final product is the best possible design made with the best materials. It’s taken a lot of hard work...and a lot of test-naps to get there! Our team brings together the right kinds of experience we need to be successful: Horacio is an experienced engineer, Luigi is an expert in product development, manufacturing and problem-solving, and Martina brings a wealth of experience in strategy and marketing to the team.

Though there is always the possibility of setbacks when bringing a product to market, we've integrated mechanisms into our plan to avoid delays delivering rewards to backers should any unforeseen circumstances arise. PowerSiesta's design is finalized and our manufacturers are lined up and ready to go after the campaign. We are just waiting for you to let us know how many to produce. Our estimated delivery date is based on a conservative estimate - if we get our PowerSiestas sooner, our backers will be the first to know.

In the unlikely event that despite these measures, something comes up, we promise to keep our communication with backers both frequent and transparent throughout the fulfillment process.

Ergonomically designed to allow your head to rest at a natural angle, PowerSiesta protects your neck and shoulders from unnecessary strain and damage. When not in use, the lightweight PowerSiesta is the size of a magazine, easy to take with you wherever you go. Then, when it’s time for another siesta, it pops open in seconds.Other solutions are not only uncomfortable, embarrassing and bulky, but many are also made with materials that have a negative impact on the environment. Typical neck pillows are usually made with PET synthetic stuffing; polyurethane memory foam that can emit VOCs and other harmful chemicals; or polystyrene microbeads that are notoriously slow to biodegrade.PowerSiesta is the comfortable, easy-to-clean, and environmentally friendly alternative that you can use over and over again – a welcome change from old-fashioned plastic pillows or dorky inflatable doodads. It's is made from high-grade corrugated cardboard which is durable enough to be used over and over and resists stains thanks to its smooth finish, but still 100% recyclable. Can’t wait to get snoozing on the go in comfort? Then join us and get your hands (and head) on your very own PowerSiesta nap set – we’ve got all your power nap needs covered.Whether you want one just for yourself, or share the gift of good napping with friends and family, we’ll have a reward to fit you like a pair of snug pajamas. Our rewards are in stock and shipping now!Shipping to the US? Buy 2x or more PowerSiesta nap sets and get FREE US SHIPPING! Outside the USA? We offer easy flat rate shipping - just $15 to Europe, Canada and Mexico, and $19 everywhere else, no matter how many sets you order!Get your PowerSiesta nap set now. What are you waiting for? Never have another uncomfortable flight again! Join the sleep revolution and click that pink button.Friends don’t let friends sleep in funny positions while pics are being taken of them. So take a few seconds to share the love (and the sleep) with your friends, too:     Horacio Trucco, Martina Trucco and Luigi GonzalezWe are PowerSiesta, LLC – a sustainable and socially responsible, family-owned design company with a passion for helping to make travelers' journeys more comfortable. As frequent travelers ourselves, we know how difficult it can be to arrive at your destination feeling well-rested and refreshed when you’re sitting in economy class. Unsatisfied with other solutions on the market, we took it upon ourselves to come up with a more convenient and comfortable way to sleep on flights, buses, and trains.We also want to make a positive impact on the world we live in. That's why after the campaign, once our business is up and running, we’re committed to making donations to children's shelters around the world, because we believe that everybody deserves a good night's sleep.Our first charitable partner will be Hogar Infantil Jesus Nazareno in Isabela, Puerto Rico.We plan to expand contributions to the following organizations among other highly effective children’s charities: We started with the mission of finding a better, more comfortable way to sleep while traveling. Horacio, an aeronautical engineer with over 50 years of experience and 10 issued and pending patents for his inventions, came up with the first idea for the PowerSiesta. He and Luigi then spent over 18 months of research and development optimizing the design of the PowerSiesta for maximum comfort in the simplest form possible.Now, almost two years later after lots of ideation and extensive testing and prototyping, we're thrilled to share our patent-pending PowerSiesta napper with you.We can’t wait to have your support! Have questions or comments? Please leave a comment or send us a message!Try it. If you don't love it, send it back. 100% Money Back guarantee.Risks and ChallengesWe have been developing and testing PowerSiesta for almost two years to ensure that our final product is the best possible design made with the best materials. It’s taken a lot of hard work...and a lot of test-naps to get there! Our team brings together the right kinds of experience we need to be successful: Horacio is an experienced engineer, Luigi is an expert in product development, manufacturing and problem-solving, and Martina brings a wealth of experience in strategy and marketing to the team.Though there is always the possibility of setbacks when bringing a product to market, we've integrated mechanisms into our plan to avoid delays delivering rewards to backers should any unforeseen circumstances arise. PowerSiesta's design is finalized and our manufacturers are lined up and ready to go after the campaign. We are just waiting for you to let us know how many to produce. Our estimated delivery date is based on a conservative estimate - if we get our PowerSiestas sooner, our backers will be the first to know.In the unlikely event that despite these measures, something comes up, we promise to keep our communication with backers both frequent and transparent throughout the fulfillment process.

story:
A revolution can come in a small package. 
Zip Cup is a travel mug that fits YOUR life.

Make this project happen: pre-order today!    --->

People like us! Recent press includes Grist, Smart Planet, Earth Techling, Vitamin W, EcoPreneurist, Daily Shot of Coffee, The GearCaster & Guy Kawasaki

Inspired by the low-tech collapsible cup you had as a kid, Zip Cup (patent pending) is turbocharged for adults...and hot beverages. A twist-lock mechanism and sealing technology used on space shuttles and submarines means that Zip Cup can collapse to easily fit in your purse, backpack or briefase. 

Stylish, dishwasher safe and free from harmful additives like BPA, Zip Cup has a drinking spout that can be sealed to prevent sloshing while you walk. It's perfect for any hot or cold beverage -- at the beach, picnics, camping, sporting events, cycling, travel...and makes a fantastic gift.

 

What's the purpose of the campaign?

If you pre-order, you get your own Zip Cup(s) AND you're bringing the project to life. Factory tools cost tens of thousands of dollars, and Zip Cup manufacturing is even more costly because it's made of 3 separate sections plus a lid. 

Your support is crucial, and highly appreciated -- we've personally invested heavily in engineering, design and prototyping for Zip Cup, and now we need your help.

Please sign up today: see options on right hand side of this page.

 

Why did you make Zip Cup?

Travel mugs are too bulky and paper cups are flimsy and wasteful. The US tosses 58 billion paper cups each year. This image, representing just 15 minutes worth of paper cup waste in the US disgusted us and inspired us to create a reusable cup that would actually get used. Read more about Zip Cup founder's background here and the engineering team behind Zip Cup here. 

 

What else do I need to know about Zip Cup?

  • Ultra-convenient: collapses to fit in your pocket or bag
  • Versatile: holds 16 oz. (coffee shop size medium) hot or cold beverages on the go
  • Safe: Reinforced locking system means no leakage in your bag--uses the same technology used on spaceships and submarines
  • Stylish: eye-catching design available in a range of cool colors and customizable designs (coming soon)
  • Eco-friendly: BPA-free and recyclable
  • Dishwasher-safe
  • Pays for itself: save 10-25 cents on every cup of coffee you buy

Zip Cup could pay for itself? Tell me more!

Zip Cup may cost a bit more than some travel mugs, but it actually DOES a lot more than those cups, plus you'll actually use it on a daily basis. How many travel mugs are gathering dust in your cupboard because they're bulky and crappy?

In addition, if you start using Zip Cup every day you can take advantage of "Bring Your Own Cup" discounts from coffee shops. Almost every coffee shop will give you 10-25 cents off the price of your drink, amounting to $35+ in savings if you get coffee every day. Read more here.

 

We can't do this without you. Please sign up for a perk on the right hand side of this page today.

And just as important: tell anyone you know who might be interested in owning their own Zip Cup. 

Share Zip Cup with your friends:

You can learn more at zipcup.com, and stay in touch via email updates, Facebook and Twitter. You can also drop us a note at karla[AT]zipcup[DOT]com.

Thanks in advance--you're part of Zip Cup's success.

story:
Unique in its kind –

After months of designing, testing, and many failed versions, a portable, space-saving, and light-weighted hanger was born! 

 

 

 

 

Easy to use  ----

They don’t take much space at all.

Yet it’s indeed a hanger when unfolded!

story:
TravelHugg's mission is to bring people together through the gift of flexible travel gift cards!  One travel gift card that is redeemable for YOUR choice of airline, hotel and more.  No need to guess recipients preferred airline or hotel, no hidden gift card fees, no more guessing how to redeem your gift card; just easy, fun and flexible travel gifting for both the giver and recipient of the TravelHugg gift card.  

Help us get the word out to the market by making any size donation.  All donations will be used to increase digital marketing efforts.  If the campaign goal is reached, 10% of ALL contributions will be donated to Luke's Wings Charity (www.lukeswings.org)  as TravelHugg gift cards  to help bring soldiers and their families together for the holidays.

story:
Climbing IS For You!

Stonetree Climbing Center is a cutting edge, one-of-a-kind bouldering gym that incorporates innovative climbing trends that are safe, family friendly and accessible to people of all climbing abilities. 

Bouldering is a form of rock climbing that is performed without the use of ropes.  As a sport, bouldering builds strength and pushes physical limits.  On an interpersonal level it builds confidence, communication, determination, and trust.

All those benefits while having fun -Climbing is for everyone!

For our families, Stonetree is a realized dream that gives us an opportunity to enjoy and to share our passion of rock climbing.  With Helena being surrounded by beautiful outdoor spaces with amazing rock to climb, it is challenging to contain the desire to enjoy that during long Montana winters.  And as families with young children, their energy is challenging to contain indoors, and why should it be contained.  There are no other indoor climbing facilities within 100 miles of Helena.  Stonetree will bridge that gap by creating an indoor space where outdoor enthusiasts and energetic children can recreate year round.

This space has the climbing community excited, our vision is broaden this excitement and to provide an alternative form of recreation for the Helena community-families, teens, college students, working professionals-you! 

The families behind Stonetree


Bushillas-Zach, Tiffany and the girls.  Zach is a Helena native who has been climbing in and around Montana for the past 20 years.  He has been the coach for the local Helena Thunder Chickens rock climbing team, who are equally as excited to have a space to train and to be out of the Bushilla garage gym.  As president of the Helena Recreation Foundation Zach was instrumental in bringing the outdoor boulder to Centennial Park and sees Stonetree as another way to bring climbing to the Helena Community.  Tiffany has lived in Helena the past 10 years, originally from the Chicago area.  As a native flatlander, Tiffany enjoys spending time in the Montana outdoors making sure Zach and the girls have a good spotter while climbing.  As a stay-at-home mom for the past five years, Tiffany is thrilled to have an indoor space that will allow families with children to climb, explore and celebrate boundless energy.   The girls are a driving force of this project; their love of climbing and adventure has helped build this dream.

Tim and Barb Wetherill met in May of 1999 on a bike ride in Philadelphia and they have been loving the outdoors ever since.  After moves to Kansas and New Mexico they are settled in Helena, Montana with their 13 year old son Jackson.  While in New Mexico, Jackson was a competitive age group swimmer.  A coach suggested rock climbing as a cross training activity and he was hooked and walked away from

swimming.  He became a strong and dedicated climber quickly.  When we arrived in Helena a year ago, we were surprised to find that there was not a rock climbing gym within 100 miles.  After finding Zach and Tiffany Bushilla and talking to them about their passion for climbing and their desire for a rock climbing facility here we partnered up and are working to bring Stonetree Climbing Center to Helena in June.  We are so excited about this venture and our kids are thrilled to be able to climb inside year round.  

The Vision Unfolding

The Space-In working with local architects, designers and builders we are creating around 2100 climbable sq. ft. of 16-18ft. tall bouldering walls, top of the line climbing holds and industry standard safety features. 

Additionally, the gym will feature a beginner bouldering area that will cater to a variety of youth ages and abilities. This area will provide a fun and safe space for people who have little or no experience rock climbing. There will also be spaces throughout the gym for socializing, a fitness room with weights and some exercise machines, and a reserved room for parties.
There is also a fantastic exterior green space which will have patios to relax on and fun outdoor features to enjoy.

Additional Beta:

  • Memberships
  • Competitive Climbing Team
  • Classes/Private Instruction
  • Climbing Camps
  • Special Events Rental Space

What We Need To Create This Unique Space

As a grassroots effort, our families are putting in the financial backing and lots of sweat equity to make Stonetree live up to the dream that we know it can be; unique and authentically Helena. 

This is what we have in the works:

We are turning an old building into a new, safe and exciting space.  Everything is being renovated and reconstructed, from floor to ceiling while at the same time trying to retain the integrity of existing features in the building. There are many expenses in remodeling and revitalizing the building and the property of the gym as well as creating a versatile indoor space that the climbing community and public alike will be excited to use. 

This is where we need you!

We are designing and building a great gym but with your help we will have a spectacular gym in Helena.

Funding from this campaign will shape and impact two major facets of Stonetree. 

  1. Structural upgrades- Stonetree Climbing Center as currently designed is a bouldering gym.  We do however see the need for an area in the gym that can have ropes.  These would be used for classes, training and preparation for outdoor climbing camps.  The costs of these upgrades are around $10,000.
  2. Beginner Bouldering Area- This is a designated part of the gym that will be unique to Stonetree as compared to other climbing gyms across the country.  We see the possibilities for this space to be endless and changeable.  The playable structures we are looking to design and incorporate in this space are similar to outdoor sculptures and playscapes.  The cost of adding 1 structure to this area is around $20-30,000.

Community support can help take Stonetree to the next level!

Obstacles & Challenges-The Crux

We are invested and in full construction mode.  Every step of building this business is an opportunity. Any obstacles we come across may push us to make decisions that alter the physical appearance of the space, but the push to reach our goal is much like the determination needed to send a climb.  

Be A Part Of The Dream!

Thank you for checking out our campaign-please help us spread the word!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
I am so lucky

I get to spend my days and nights playing snuggling and caring for peoples furred , fanged, feathered and finned family members.     Driving Rover is my pet sitting company located in Southern Florida.   I do well on the average, plenty of pets that need a daytime playtime or overnight playdate with my dogs. I really want to expand, offer group day trips to the Dog Beach here in Estero.  Fresh water canals and lakes are everywhere, but not ideal for pets because of the alligator threat.  

We do have some of the most beautiful beaches in the world, and a great dog beach included.     Specifically  I need some repairs and improvements for the Driving Rover vehicle.  

Safety harnesses and dog seats.  Harnesses and leashes for moving between Buggy and Beach,  and some beach umbrellas and water bowls with our logo and contact info.   This idea is not new or mine,  but there are no services of this type here in Southwest Florida, so I will be the first.   Along with a vinyl wrap for the Beach buggy,  I am quite sure we will be successful and self sustaining quite quickly.  My Pups are currently the best advertising dollar I spend...  taking them around town, the way they flirt with everyone at every light or park.  Having a nicely done vinyl wrap with social media details is on target, direct marketing.  

 If we do not meet the goal for vehicle upgrades and vinyl wrap.  the money will be spent on #wannago4aride promo items and other marketing paths.   If we raise more than asked  YAY!!!   I will be expanding the company to add some flexible part time jobs for college students,  

My main objective is the upgrade to dog transport ( 2006 trailblazer already purchased for this project. It is very low miles,  comfortable for dogs of various sizes.) and  marketing to expand business.   Thank you for your contribution and I hope the incentives are fun and attractive.

story:
Hello everybody! We are two enthusiastic Romanians, crazy about traveling on 2 wheels and on the 23rd of May we started a daring project.

So far we've traveled through Europe, Asia and now we are in USA. After crossing 2 continents and half of the one we're now, we noticed that sometimes maybe your conventional map is not enough. Other travelers we met on the road shared the same opinion with us: sometimes you need more information for the perfect trip.

That is why we decided to develop a program, an online application, based on the information we gathered so far. We want to make it easy to use and accessible for everybody who wants to travel. 

How we will do that? Basically we will re-map every country crossed and in each country we will map the campings, the restaurants, the affordable hotels, the auto shops, the local attractions and so on. 

The start date for this application will be 1st of May 2017, both for Android and iOS.

Until than we will continue our expedition. The next country after the US will be Central and South America followed by Africa.

Considering the fact that this project will be both time and resource-consuming, a little bit of help from you all will be much appreciated. 

The live map progress can be tracked on http://worldride2016.com/en/live-map/ using the username and password written there.

We also have a Facebook page with the name: World Ride 2016 (https://www.facebook.com/GSworldriders/?ref=aym...)


Ride on!
Diana and Florin Moraru

The next country after the US will be Central and South America followed by Africa.Considering the fact that this project will be both time and resource-consuming, a little bit of help from you all will be much appreciated. The live map progress can be tracked on http://worldride2016.com/en/live-map/ using the username and password written there.We also have a Facebook page with the name: World Ride 2016 (https://www.facebook.com/GSworldriders/?ref=aym...)Ride on!Diana and Florin Moraru

story:
Health Care Workers have been the indisputable hero's during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Often having to sacrifice their own lives, safety and loved ones to provide optimal care for us. Lets show them some appreciation, and take away from that list of sacrifices and offer them one of the things they lose the most- REST! 

Introducing Dream Pods 

Compact sleeping units designed with soundproof technology that provides a safe space for our essential Health Care workers to rest during or between long shifts.

 

Our goal is to Install Dream Pods in major Hospitals across North America!

Designed with Innovative, Modern Technology 

Equipped with a comfortable single bed, adjustable light & heating and is easily sanitized, cleaned, & rented. Ideal for getting a quick rest when needed!

Other Convenient Features

Such as a mirror, reading light, foldable desk, storage space, & charging ports! 

 

Join Us On Our Journey to Make It Happen!

We want offer Dream Pods for FREE to Hospitals of YOUR CHOICE!

  • YOU choose which Hospital & Health Care Staff deserve to benefit most! With every $10 you pledge you will be awarded with a chance to vote. Hospitals with the most votes, in sequential order, will be awarded Dream Pods!
  • Once our achieved goal of $11,000 is reached, we plan to purchase, ship and install TWO Dream Pods and have them operate in hospitals for FREE!
  • For every additional $10,000 in funding, we will offer another Dream Pod to install.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Spread the word by sharing our story to your family and friends and make some noise about the benefits of Dream Pod Inc.!

Thank You 

For every dollar you pledge your helping Health Care Workers during the pandemic!
